  3390                                  
  3391                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3392                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3393                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3394                                  
  3395                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3396                                  
  3397                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3398                                  ;
  3399                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3400                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3401                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3402                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3403                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3404                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3405                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3406                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3407                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3408                                  ;
  3409                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3410                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3411                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3412                                  ;
  3413                                  ;	uses:	
  3414                                  ;
  3415                                  ;
  3416                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3417                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3418                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3419                                  ;
  3420                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3421                                  
  3422                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3423                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3424                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3425                                  
  3426                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3427                                  
  3428                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3429                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3430                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3431                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3432                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3433                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3434                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3435                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3436                                  
  3437                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3438                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3439                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3440                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3441                                  
  3442                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3443 000012DB 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3444 000012DE 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3445 000012E0 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3446 000012E3 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3447 000012E5 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3448 000012E8 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3449                                  atd1:
  3450 000012EA 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3451                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3452                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3453                                  
  3454                                  atd2:					
  3455 000012EF 53                      		push	bx
  3456 000012F0 51                      		push	cx
  3457 000012F1 52                      		push	dx
  3458 000012F2 57                      		push	di
  3459 000012F3 1E                      		push	ds
  3460 000012F4 06                      		push	es
  3461 000012F5 50                      		push	ax
  3462 000012F6 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3463                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3464 000012F9 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3465                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3466 000012FB C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3467                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3468                                  					; initially no error code.
  3469 00001300 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3470 00001303 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3471                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3472 00001307 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3473                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3474 00001309 C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3475 0000130E EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3476                                  					; return
  3477                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3478                                  
  3479                                  atd3:					
  3480 00001310 53                      		push	bx
  3481 00001311 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3482 00001313 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3483 00001316 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3484 00001318 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3485 0000131A 5B                      		pop	bx
  3486 0000131B 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3487 0000131E 0E                      		push	cs
  3488 0000131F E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3489 00001322 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3490 00001324 58                      		pop	ax
  3491 00001325 50                      		push	ax
  3492 00001326 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3493 00001329 BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3494 0000132C EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3495 0000132D E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3496                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3497                                  
  3498                                  atd4:	
  3499                                  
  3500                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3501                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3502                                  				
  3503 00001330 58                      		pop	ax
  3504                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3505 00001331 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3506 00001335 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3507 00001337 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3508 00001339 F9                      		stc
  3509                                  atd5:					
  3510 0000133A 07                      		pop	es
  3511 0000133B 1F                      		pop	ds
  3512 0000133C 5F                      		pop	di
  3513 0000133D 5A                      		pop	dx
  3514 0000133E 59                      		pop	cx
  3515 0000133F 5B                      		pop	bx
  3516 00001340 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3517                                  
  3518                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3519                                  
  3520                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3521                                  ;
  3522                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3523                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3524                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3525                                  ;	
  3526                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3527                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3528                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3529                                  ;
  3530                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3531                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3532                                  ;
  3533                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3534                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3535                                  
  3536                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3537                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3538                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3539 00001343 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3540                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3541 00001346 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3542 0000134B 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3543 0000134E 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3544 00001350 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3545                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3546                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3547                                  setc1:					
  3548 00001355 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3549 00001357 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3550                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3551                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3552 00001359 A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3553 0000135C 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3554 00001360 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3555 00001362 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3556                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3557 00001365 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3558 00001368 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3559 0000136A C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3560 0000136D 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3561 00001370 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3562 00001372 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3563                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3564 00001374 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3565 00001377 06                      		push	es
  3566 00001378 53                      		push	bx
  3567 00001379 0E                      		push	cs
  3568 0000137A E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3569 0000137D 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3570                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3571 00001381 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3572                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3573 00001384 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3574                                  					; only use low part
  3575 00001387 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3576                                  					; control byte modifier
  3577 0000138B 5B                      		pop	bx
  3578 0000138C 07                      		pop	es
  3579                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3580 0000138D 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3581 00001391 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3582 00001394 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3583                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3584 00001396 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3585 0000139A C3                      		retn
  3586                                  
  3587                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3588                                  
  3589                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3590                                  ;
  3591                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3592                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3593                                  ;
  3594                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3595                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3596                                  ;
  3597                                  ;	
  3598                                  ;
  3599                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3600                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3601                                  ;
  3602                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3603                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3604                                  
  3605                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3606 0000139B 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3607 0000139D 0E                      		push	cs
  3608 0000139E E84000                  		call	command
  3609 000013A1 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3610                                  doc1:					
  3611 000013A3 0E                      		push	cs
  3612 000013A4 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3613 000013A7 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3614 000013A9 B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3615 000013AC BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3616 000013AF FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3617 000013B0 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3618                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3619                                  
  3620                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3621                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3622                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3623                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3624                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3625                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3626                                  ;
  3627                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3628                                  
  3629                                  rsct_loop:				
  3630 000013B1 6D                      		insw
  3631 000013B2 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3632 000013B4 FB                      		sti
  3633                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3634 000013B5 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3635                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3636                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3637 000013BA 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3638 000013BC 0E                      		push	cs
  3639 000013BD E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3640 000013C0 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3641 000013C2 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3642 000013C5 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3643 000013C8 FA                      		cli
  3644 000013C9 F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3645 000013CB FB                      		sti
  3646                                  doc2:					
  3647 000013CC 0E                      		push	cs
  3648 000013CD E82900                  		call	check_status
  3649 000013D0 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3650                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3651 000013D2 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3652 000013D6 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3653                                  doc3:					
  3654 000013D8 C3                      		retn
  3655                                  
  3656                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3657                                  
  3658                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3659                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3660                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3661                                  
  3662                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3663                                  
  3664                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3665                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3666                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3667                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3668                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3669                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3670                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3671                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3672                                  
  3673                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3674                                  ;
  3675                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3676                                  ;
  3677                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3678                                  ;
  3679                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3680                                  ;
  3681                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3682                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3683                                  ;	
  3684                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3685                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3686                                  
  3687                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3688                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3689                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3690                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3691 000013D9 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3692 000013DC EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3693                                  
  3694                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3695                                  
  3696                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3697                                  ;
  3698                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3699                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3700                                  ;
  3701                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3702                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3703                                  ;
  3704                                  ;
  3705                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3706                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3707                                  ;
  3708                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3709                                  
  3710                                  command:	; proc near		
  3711                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3712                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3713                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3714 000013E1 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3715 000013E4 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3716                                  
  3717                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3718                                  
  3719                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3720                                  ;
  3721                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3722                                  ;
  3723                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3724                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3725                                  ;
  3726                                  ;
  3727                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3728                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3729                                  ;		
  3730                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3731                                  
  3732                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3733                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3734                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3735                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3736 000013E9 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3737 000013EC EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3738                                  
  3739                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3740                                  
  3741                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3742                                  ;
  3743                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3744                                  ;
  3745                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3746                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3747                                  ;
  3748                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3749                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3750                                  
  3751                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3752                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3753                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3754                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3755 000013F1 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3756 000013F4 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3757                                  
  3758                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3759                                  
  3760                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3761                                  ;
  3762                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3763                                  ;
  3764                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3765                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3766                                  ;
  3767                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3768                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3769                                  
  3770                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3771                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3772                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3773                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3774 000013F9 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3775 000013FC EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3776                                  
  3777                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3778                                  
  3779                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3780                                  ;
  3781                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3782                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3783                                  ;
  3784                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3785                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3786                                  ;
  3787                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3788                                  
  3789                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3790                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3791                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3792                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3793 00001401 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3794 00001404 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3795                                  
  3796                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3797                                  
  3798                                  endatrom:
  3799                                  
  3800                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3801                                  
  3802                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3803                                  ;;
  3804                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3805                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3806                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3807                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3808                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3809                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3810                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3811                                  
  3812                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3813 00001409 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3814                                  					;
  3815                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3816                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3817                                  					;
  3818                                  					; warning!!!
  3819                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3820 0000140C 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3821                                  no_hookit:				
  3822                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3823                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3824 0000140E 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3825                                  
  3826                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3827                                  
  3828                                  mebbe_hookit:				
  3829 00001413 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3830 00001416 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3831 00001418 1E                      		push	ds
  3832 00001419 50                      		push	ax
  3833 0000141A B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h
  3834 0000141D 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3835 0000141F 58                      		pop	ax
  3836 00001420 9C                      		pushf
  3837                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3838                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3839 00001421 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3840 00001426 1F                      		pop	ds
  3841 00001427 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3842                                  
  3843                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3844                                  
  3845 0000142A 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3846                                  
  3847                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3848                                  
  3849                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3850                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3851                                  
  3852                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3853                                  
  3854                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3855                                  ;
  3856                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3857                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3858                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3859                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3860                                  
  3861                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3862 0000142B 2EFF36[F004]            		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3863 00001430 2E813E[F004]891C        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3864                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3865 00001437 730E                    		jnb	short century20
  3866 00001439 2EC606[F404]13          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3867 0000143F 2EC606[F504]50          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3868 00001445 EB13                    		jmp	short years
  3869                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3870                                  		
  3871                                  century20:				
  3872 00001447 2EC606[F404]14          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3873 0000144D 2EC606[F504]00          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3874 00001453 2E812E[F004]891C        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3875                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3876                                  years:					
  3877 0000145A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3878 0000145C 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3879 00001460 BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3880                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3881 00001463 F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3882 00001465 2E8916[F004]            		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3883 0000146A B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  3884 0000146C F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3885 0000146E 2E0006[F504]            		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  3886 00001473 2EFF06[F004]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  3887 00001478 2E813E[F004]6E01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  3888 0000147F 7626                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  3889 00001481 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  3890 00001486 2E812E[F004]6E01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  3891 0000148D B90300                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  3892                                  regularyear:				
  3893 00001490 2E813E[F004]6D01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  3894 00001497 7614                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  3895 00001499 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  3896 0000149E 2E812E[F004]6D01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  3897 000014A5 E2E9                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  3898                                  					;
  3899                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3900                                  leapyear:				
  3901 000014A7 2EC606[F704]1D          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3902                                  					; change month table.
  3903                                  yeardone:				
  3904 000014AD 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  3905 000014AF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3906 000014B1 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3907                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3908 000014B5 BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3909 000014B8 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12
  3910                                  months:					
  3911 000014BB FEC3                    		inc	bl
  3912                                  
  3913                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3914                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3915                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3916                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3917                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3918                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3919                                  		
  3920 000014BD 8A14                    		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3921 000014BF 39D0                    		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3922                                  					; dh=0
  3923 000014C1 7605                    		jbe	short month_done
  3924 000014C3 46                      		inc	si		; next month
  3925 000014C4 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3926 000014C6 E2F3                    		loop	months		;
  3927                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3928                                  month_done:				
  3929 000014C8 2EC606[F704]1C          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3930                                  					; restore month table value
  3931 000014CE 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
  3932 000014D0 2E8A36[F504]            		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3933 000014D5 2E8A0E[F404]            		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3934 000014DA 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3935                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3936                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3937 000014DF 86D0                    		xchg	dl, al
  3938 000014E1 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3939                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3940 000014E6 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al
  3941 000014E8 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3942                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3943 000014ED 86C8                    		xchg	cl, al
  3944 000014EF 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3945                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3946 000014F4 88C5                    		mov	ch, al
  3947 000014F6 2E8F06[F004]            		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3948 000014FB CB                      		retf
  3949                                  
  3950                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3951                                  
  3952                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3953                                  
  3954                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3955                                  
  3956                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3957                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3958                                  		
  3959 000014FC 51                      		push	cx		
  3960 000014FD D40A                    		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bc
  3961 000014FF B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  3962 00001501 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3963 00001503 08E0                    		or	al, ah
  3964 00001505 59                      		pop	cx
  3965 00001506 CB                      		retf
  3966                                  
  3967                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3968                                  
  3969                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3970                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3971                                  
  3972                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3973                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3974                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3975                                  
  3976                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3977                                  
  3978                                  int6c:					
  3979 00001507 0E                      		push	cs
  3980 00001508 1F                      		pop	ds
  3981 00001509 8F06[BB06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3982 0000150D 8F06[BD06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3983 00001511 9D                      		popf
  3984 00001512 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  3985 00001515 FA                      		cli
  3986 00001516 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  3987 0000151A FB                      		sti
  3988 0000151B E8CB00                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  3989 0000151E FA                      		cli
  3990 0000151F B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  3991 00001521 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  3992                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  3993                                  					; Return: time of day set
  3994 00001523 FB                      		sti
  3995                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  3996                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3997 00001524 FF2E[BB06]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  3998                                  
  3999                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4000                                  
  4001                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  4002                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  4003                                  
  4004                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  4005 00001528 50                      		push	ax
  4006 00001529 51                      		push	cx
  4007 0000152A 52                      		push	dx
  4008 0000152B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  4009 0000152D CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  4010                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  4011                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  4012                                  					; midnight
  4013                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  4014 0000152F 5A                      		pop	dx
  4015 00001530 59                      		pop	cx
  4016 00001531 58                      		pop	ax
  4017 00001532 50                      		push	ax
  4018 00001533 53                      		push	bx
  4019 00001534 51                      		push	cx
  4020 00001535 52                      		push	dx
  4021 00001536 2EC706[DB06]0100        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  4022                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  4023 0000153D B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  4024 0000153F CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4025                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  4026                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  4027                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  4028                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  4029 00001541 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  4030 00001543 E99300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  4031                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4032                                  
  4033                                  read_ok:				
  4034 00001546 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  4035 0000154A 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  4036 0000154E 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  4037 00001552 8816[C206]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  4038 00001556 2EC706[DB06]0200        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  4039 0000155D E84201                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  4040 00001560 7277                    		jb	short r_d_ret	;  some	value out of range
  4041 00001562 2EC706[DB06]0300        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  4042 00001569 E8E600                  		call	date_verify
  4043 0000156C 726B                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  4044 0000156E 2EC706[DB06]0000        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  4045 00001575 E8AA00                  		call	in_bin
  4046 00001578 A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  4047 0000157B 98                      		cbw
  4048 0000157C 803E[BF06]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  4049 00001581 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  4050 00001583 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  4051                                  
  4052                                  century_19:				
  4053 00001586 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  4054 00001589 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  4055 0000158B F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  4056 0000158D 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  4057 0000158F 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  4058 00001590 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  4059                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  4060 00001593 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4061 00001595 2EA3[DB06]              		mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  4062 00001599 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  4063 0000159B 98                      		cbw
  4064 0000159C 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  4065 0000159E 740C                    		jz	short leap_year
  4066 000015A0 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  4067 000015A3 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4068 000015A5 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  4069 000015AA EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  4070                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  4071                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4072                                  
  4073                                  leap_year:				
  4074 000015AC 803E[C106]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  4075 000015B1 7605                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  4076                                  leap_adjustment:			
  4077 000015B3 2EFF06[DB06]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  4078                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  4079 000015B8 8A0E[C206]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  4080 000015BC 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4081 000015BE 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  4082 000015BF 2E010E[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  4083 000015C4 8A0E[C106]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  4084 000015C8 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4085 000015CA 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  4086 000015CB D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  4087 000015CD BE[C306]                		mov	si, month_table
  4088 000015D0 01CE                    		add	si, cx
  4089                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4090                                  		; ds must be same with cs here, if so..
  4091                                  		; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  4092                                  		; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  4093                                  		; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  4094 000015D2 8B04                    		mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  4095                                  					; get #	days in	previous months
  4096 000015D4 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax
  4097                                  r_d_ret:				
  4098 000015D9 2E8B36[DB06]            		mov	si, [cs:daycnt2]
  4099 000015DE 5A                      		pop	dx
  4100 000015DF 59                      		pop	cx
  4101 000015E0 5B                      		pop	bx
  4102 000015E1 58                      		pop	ax
  4103 000015E2 C3                      		retn
  4104                                  
  4105                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4106                                  
  4107                                  r_t_retj:				
  4108 000015E3 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4109 000015E5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  4110 000015E7 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  4111                                  
  4112                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4113                                  
  4114                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  4115                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  4116                                  
  4117                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  4118 000015E9 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  4119 000015EB CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4120                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  4121                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  4122                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  4123 000015ED 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4124 000015EF 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  4125 000015F3 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  4126 000015F7 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  4127 000015FB C606[C206]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  4128 00001600 E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  4129 00001603 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4130 00001605 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  4131 00001608 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4132 0000160A E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  4133 0000160D 8A2E[BF06]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  4134 00001611 8A0E[C006]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  4135 00001615 8A36[C106]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  4136 00001619 8A16[C206]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  4137                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4138                                  		; 17/09/2022
  4139                                  		; 31/05/2019
  4140 0000161D FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  4141                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  4142                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  4143                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  4144                                  r_t_ret:				
  4145 00001621 C3                      		retn
  4146                                  
  4147                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4148                                  
  4149                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  4150                                  
  4151                                  in_bin:		; proc near		
  4152 00001622 A0[BF06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  4153 00001625 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4154 00001628 A2[BF06]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  4155 0000162B A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  4156 0000162E E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4157 00001631 A2[C006]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  4158 00001634 A0[C106]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4159 00001637 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4160 0000163A A2[C106]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4161 0000163D A0[C206]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4162 00001640 E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4163 00001643 A2[C206]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4164 00001646 C3                      		retn
  4165                                  
  4166                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4167                                  
  4168                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4169                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4170                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4171                                  
  4172                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near		
  4173 00001647 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4174 00001649 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4175 0000164B B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4176 0000164D D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4177 0000164F D50A                    		aad
  4178 00001651 C3                      		retn
  4179                                  
  4180                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4181                                  
  4182                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4183                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4184                                  
  4185                                  date_verify:	; proc near		
  4186 00001652 803E[BF06]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4187 00001657 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4188 00001659 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4189 0000165B 803E[BF06]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4190                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4191                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4192 00001660 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4193 00001662 803E[C006]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4194                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4195                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4196 00001667 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4197                                  century_20:				
  4198 00001669 803E[C006]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4199 0000166E 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4200 00001670 803E[C106]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4201 00001675 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4202 00001677 803E[C106]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4203                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4204 0000167C 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4205 0000167E 803E[C206]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4206 00001683 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4207                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4208                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4209                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4210                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4211                                  		; cf=0
  4212                                  		;clc
  4213                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4214 00001685 803E[C206]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4215 0000168A C3                      		retn
  4216                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4217                                  
  4218                                  date_error:				
  4219 0000168B F9                      		stc
  4220                                  date_err2:
  4221 0000168C C3                      		retn
  4222                                  
  4223                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4224                                  
  4225                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4226                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4227                                  
  4228                                  time_verify:	; proc near		
  4229 0000168D 803E[BF06]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4230 00001692 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4231 00001694 803E[C006]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4232 00001699 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4233                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4234                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4235                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4236                                  		;clc
  4237                                  		;retn
  4238                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4239 0000169B 803E[C106]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4240                                  time_error:
  4241                                  bv_error:	
  4242 000016A0 F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4243 000016A1 C3                      		retn
  4244                                  
  4245                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4246                                  
  4247                                  ;time_error:				
  4248                                  		;stc
  4249                                  		;retn
  4250                                  
  4251                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4252                                  
  4253                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4254                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4255                                  
  4256                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near		
  4257 000016A2 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4258 000016A5 BB[BF06]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4259                                  bv_loop:				
  4260 000016A8 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4261 000016AA 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4262 000016AC 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4263                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4264 000016AF 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4265 000016B1 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4266 000016B3 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4267 000016B5 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4268 000016B7 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4269 000016B9 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4270 000016BB 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4271 000016BE 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4272 000016C1 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4273 000016C3 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4274 000016C4 49                      		dec	cx
  4275 000016C5 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4276 000016C7 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4277 000016C8 C3                      		retn
  4278                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4279                                  
  4280                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4281                                  ;bv_error:				
  4282                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4283                                  		;retn
  4284                                  
  4285                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

  4291                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4292                                  ;									:
  4293                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4294                                  ;									:
  4295                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4296                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4297                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4298                                  ;									:
  4299                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4300                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4301                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4302                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4303                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4304                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4305                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4306                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4307                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4308                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4309                                  ;		this program.						:
  4310                                  ;									:
  4311                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4312                                  
  4313                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4314                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4315

  4393                                  ; the following are the recommended bpbs for the media that we know of so far.
  4394                                  
  4395                                  ;struc bpbx
  4396                                  ;   resw 1 ; 512
  4397                                  ;   resb 1
  4398                                  ;   resw 1 ; 1

  4400                                  ;   resw 1

  4416                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0) IO.SYS
  4417                                  
  4418                                  ; 09/12/2022
  4419                                  BPB48T:
  4420                                  ;bpb48t:	; bpbx <512, 2, 1, 2, 112, 720, 0FDh, 2, 9, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0> 
  4421                                  		; 48 tpi diskettes	;
  4422                                  		dw	512		; physical sector size in bytes
  4423                                  		db	2		; sectors/allocation unit
  4424                                  		dw	1		; reserved sectors for dos
  4425                                  		db	2		; number of allocation tables
  4426                                  		dw	112		; number of directory entries
  4427                                  		dw	720 ; 2*9*40	; number of sectors (at 512 bytes each)
  4428                                  		db	0FDh		; media descriptor
  4429                                  		dw	2		; number of fat sectors
  4430                                  		dw	9		; sectors per track
  4431                                  		dw	2		; heads
  4432                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector count (low word)
  4433                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)
  4434                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (low)
  4435                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (high)					
  4436                                  
  4437                                  		db 90h
  4438                                  ;align 2
  4439                                  BPB96T:
  4440                                  ;bpb96t:	; bpbx <512, 1, 1, 2, 224, 2400, 0F9h, 7, 15, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0> 
  4441                                  		; 96 tpi diskettes	;
  4442                                  		dw	512		; physical sector size in bytes
  4443                                  		db	1		; sectors/allocation unit
  4444                                  		dw	1		; reserved sectors for dos
  4445                                  		db	2		; number of allocation tables
  4446                                  		dw	224		; number of directory entries
  4447                                  		dw	2400 ; 2*15*80	; number of sectors (at 512 bytes each)
  4448                                  		db	0F9h		; media descriptor
  4449                                  		dw	7		; number of fat sectors
  4450                                  		dw	15		; sectors per track
  4451                                  		dw	2		; heads
  4452                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector count (low word)
  4453                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)
  4454                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (low)
  4455                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (high)
  4456                                  
  4457                                  		db 90h
  4458                                  ;align 2
  4459                                  BPB35:
  4460                                  ;bpb35:		; bpbx <512, 2, 1, 2, 112, 1440, 0F9h, 3, 9, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0> 
  4461                                  		; 3.5" diskettes - 720 KB ;		
  4462                                  		dw	512		; physical sector size in bytes
  4463                                  		db	2		; sectors/allocation unit
  4464                                  		dw	1		; reserved sectors for dos
  4465                                  		db	2		; number of allocation tables
  4466                                  		dw	112		; number of directory entries
  4467                                  		dw	1440 ; 2*9*80	; number of sectors (at 512 bytes each)
  4468                                  		db	0F9h		; media descriptor
  4469                                  		dw	3		; number of fat sectors
  4470                                  		dw	9		; sectors per track
  4471                                  		dw	2		; heads
  4472                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector count (low word)
  4473                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)
  4474                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (low)
  4475                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (high)
  4476                                  
  4477                                  		db 90h
  4478                                  ;align 2
  4479                                  
  4480                                  ;align 2
  4481                                  ;BPB144:
  4482                                  ;bpb144:	; Retro DOS v4.0 feature only !	; 1.44MB diskettes
  4483                                  ;
  4484                                  ;		dw	512		; physical sector size in bytes
  4485                                  ;		db	1		; sectors/allocation unit
  4486                                  ;		dw	1		; reserved sectors for dos
  4487                                  ;		db	2		; number of allocation tables
  4488                                  ;		dw	224		; number of directory entries
  4489                                  ;		dw	2880 ; 2*18*80	; number of sectors (at 512 bytes each)
  4490                                  ;		db	0F0h		; media descriptor
  4491                                  ;		dw	9		; number of fat sectors
  4492                                  ;		dw	18		; sectors per track
  4493                                  ;		dw	2		; heads
  4494                                  ;		dw	0		; hidden sector count (low word)
  4495                                  ;		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)
  4496                                  ;		dw	0		; number of sectors (low)
  4497                                  ;		dw	0		; number of sectors (high)
  4498                                  ;
  4499                                  ;		db 90h
  4500                                  ;align 2
  4501                                  
  4502                                  BPB288:
  4503                                  ;bpb288:	; bpbx <512, 2, 1, 2, 240, 5760, 0F0h, 9, 36, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0>
  4504                                  		; 3.5" diskettes - 2.88 MB ;	 
  4505                                  		dw	512		; physical sector size in bytes
  4506                                  		db	2		; sectors/allocation unit
  4507                                  		dw	1		; reserved sectors for dos
  4508                                  		db	2		; number of allocation tables
  4509                                  		dw	240		; number of directory entries
  4510                                  		dw	5760 ; 2*36*80	; number of sectors (at 512 bytes each)
  4511                                  		db	0F0h		; media descriptor
  4512                                  		dw	3		; number of fat sectors
  4513                                  		dw	9		; sectors per track
  4514                                  		dw	2		; heads
  4515                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector count (low word)
  4516                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)
  4517                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (low)
  4518                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (high)
  4519                                  
  4520                                  		db 90h			;
  4521                                  ;align 2
  4522                                  
  4523                                  %endif
  4524                                  
  4525                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4526                                  					; align	2
  4527                                  ; 09/12/2022
  4528                                  %if 0
  4529                                  bpbtable:	dw bpb48t		; 48tpi	drives
  4530                                  		dw bpb96t		; 96tpi	drives
  4531                                  		dw bpb35		; 3.5" drives
  4532                                  		dw bpb35		; unused 8" diskette
  4533                                  		dw bpb35		; unused 8" diskette
  4534                                  		dw bpb35		; used for hard	disk
  4535                                  		dw bpb35		; used for tape	drive
  4536                                  		dw bpb35		; FFOTHER
  4537                                  		dw bpb35		; ERIMO
  4538                                  		dw bpb288		; 2.88MB drive
  4539                                  		;

  4541                                  %endif
  4542                                  
  4543                                  ; 13/12/2022
  4544                                  %if 0
  4545                                  BPBTABLE:	dw BPB48T		; 48tpi	drives
  4546                                  		dw BPB96T		; 96tpi	drives
  4547                                  		dw BPB35		; 3.5" drives
  4548                                  		dw BPB35		; unused 8" diskette
  4549                                  		dw BPB35		; unused 8" diskette
  4550                                  		dw BPB35		; used for hard	disk
  4551                                  		dw BPB35		; used for tape	drive
  4552                                  		dw BPB35		; FFOTHER
  4553                                  		dw BPB35		; ERIMO
  4554                                  		dw BPB288		; 2.88MB drive
  4555                                  		;

  4557
