  7114 00001FA4 886D08                  		mov	[di+8],	ch	; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  7115                                  					; save sectors per cluster
  7116                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7117 00001FA7 F606[D216]40            		test	byte [fbigfat], 40h
  7118                                  		;test	ds:fbigfat, 40h	; fbig
  7119                                  					; if (fbigfat)
  7120 00001FAC 751E                    		jnz	short dobig	; goto dobig; (16 bit fat)
  7121                                  
  7122                                  ; we don't need to change "small fat" logic since it is gauranteed
  7123                                  ; that double word total sector will not use 12 bit fat (unless
  7124                                  ; it's sectors/cluster >= 16 which will never be in this case.)
  7125                                  ; so in this case we assume dx = 0 !!
  7126                                  
  7127 00001FAE 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; (12 bit fat)
  7128 00001FB0 88EB                    		mov	bl, ch
  7129 00001FB2 4B                      		dec	bx
  7130 00001FB3 01C3                    		add	bx, ax		; dx=0
  7131 00001FB5 D3EB                    		shr	bx, cl		; bx = 1+(bpb->maxsec+BDS.secperclus-1)/
  7132 00001FB7 43                      		inc	bx		; BDS.secperclus
  7133 00001FB8 80E3FE                  		and	bl, 0FEh	; bx &= ~1; (=number of clusters)
  7134 00001FBB 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
  7135 00001FBD D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1
  7136 00001FBF 01F3                    		add	bx, si
  7137 00001FC1 81C3FF01                		add	bx, 511		; bx +=	511 + bx/2
  7138 00001FC5 D0EF                    		shr	bh, 1		; bh >>= 1; (=bx/512)
  7139 00001FC7 887D11                  		mov	[di+11h], bh	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  7140                                  					; save number of fat sectors
  7141 00001FCA EB35                    		jmp	short massage_bpb
  7142                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7143                                  
  7144                                  ; for bigfat we do need to extend this logic to 32 bit sector calculation.
  7145                                  
  7146                                  dobig:					
  7147 00001FCC B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 (2^4) directory entries per sector
  7148 00001FCE 52                      		push	dx		; save total sectors (high)
  7149 00001FCF 8B550C                  		mov	dx, [di+0Ch]	; [di+BDS.direntries]
  7150 00001FD2 D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl		; root dir sectors = BDS.direntries / 16;
  7151 00001FD4 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
  7152 00001FD6 5A                      		pop	dx
  7153 00001FD7 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= total	sectors	- root dir sectors
  7154 00001FDA 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  7155 00001FDD 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= t - r	- d
  7156                                  					; total	secs - reserved	secs - root dir	secs
  7157 00001FE0 B302                    		mov	bl, 2
  7158 00001FE2 8A7D08                  		mov	bh, [di+8]	; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  7159                                  					; bx = 256 * BDS.secperclus + 2
  7160                                  
  7161                                  ; I don't understand why to add bx here!!!
  7162                                  
  7163                                  		; 29/12/2018 - Erdogan Tan (Retro DOS v4.0)
  7164                                  		; 27/09/2022
  7165                                  		; (Microsoft FAT32 File	System Specification,
  7166                                  		; December 2000, Page 21)
  7167                                  		; TmpVal1 = DskSize - (BPB_ResvdSecCnt+RootrDirSectors)
  7168                                  		; TmpVal2 = (256*BPB_SecPerClus)+BPB_NumFATs
  7169                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  7170                                  		; (If FATType == FAT16,	BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz))
  7171                                  		
  7172                                  					; dx:ax = TmpVal1, bx = TmpVal2
  7173 00001FE5 01D8                    		add	ax, bx		; 
  7174 00001FE7 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2
  7175 00001FEA 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1		
  7176 00001FED 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2-1
  7177                                  
  7178                                  ; assuming dx in the table will never be bigger than bx.
  7179                                  
  7180 00001FF0 F7F3                    		div	bx		; BDS.fatsecs =
  7181                                  					; ceil((total-dir-res)/(256*BDS.secperclus+2))
  7182 00001FF2 894511                  		mov	[di+11h], ax	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  7183                                  					; number of fat	sectors
  7184                                  
  7185                                  ; now, set the default filesys_id, volume label, serial number
  7186                                  
  7187                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7188                                  		; [di+1Fh] = [fbigfat]
  7189                                  		;
  7190                                  		;;mov	bl, ds:fbigfat
  7191                                  		;; 17/10/2022
  7192                                  		;mov	bl, [fbigfat]
  7193                                  		;mov	[di+1Fh], bl	; [di+BDS.fatsiz] ; fat	size flag
  7194                                  
  7195                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7196                                  		;push	ds ; ds = cs = BIOSDATA
  7197 00001FF5 1E                      		push	ds
  7198 00001FF6 07                      		pop	es
  7199                                  		; 14/08/2023 
  7200                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA
  7201                                  		;push	cs
  7202                                  		;pop	ds
  7203                                  		; 11/09/2023
  7204 00001FF7 A0[D216]                		mov	al, [fbigfat]
  7205 00001FFA BD[D005]                		mov	bp, CLEARIDS_X	; clear_ids_x (uses AL value here)
  7206                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7207                                  		;mov	bp, CLEARIDS
  7208                                  		;;mov	bp, 5D9h	; clear_ids
  7209                                  					; at 2C7h:5D9h = 70h:2B49h
  7210                                  					; at BIOSCODE:06ABh
  7211                                  					;	in PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
  7212 00001FFD 0E                      		push	cs
  7213 00001FFE E862F7                  		call	call_bios_code
  7214                                  
  7215                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7216                                  		;pop	ds ; ds = cs = BIOSDATA
  7217                                  
  7218                                  ; at this point, in bpb of bds table, BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS which is
  7219                                  ; set according to the partition information. we are going to
  7220                                  ; see if (hidden sectors + total sectors) > a word. if it is true,
  7221                                  ; then no change. otherwise, BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be moved
  7222                                  ; to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be set to 0.
  7223                                  ; we don't do this for the bpb information from the boot record. we
  7224                                  ; are not going to change the bpb information from the boot record.
  7225                                  
  7226                                  massage_bpb:
  7227                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7228                                  		; [di+1Fh] = [fbigfat]
  7229                                  		;
  7230                                  		;; 12/12/2022

  7232                                  		;mov	[di+1Fh], bl	; [di+BDS.fatsiz]
  7233                                  		;			; set size of fat on media
  7234                                  		;
  7235 00002001 8B551D                  		mov	dx, [di+1Dh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  7236 00002004 8B451B                  		mov	ax, [di+1Bh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]

  7239 00002009 7514                    		jnz	short goodret	
  7240                                  		;cmp	dx, 0		; double word total sectors?
  7241                                  		;;ja	short goodret	; don't have to change it.
  7242                                  		;; 12/12/2022
  7243                                  		;ja	short short goodret2
  7244                                  		;cmp	word [di+19h], 0 ; [di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  7245                                  		;ja	short goodret	; don't have to change it.
  7246                                  		; 12/12/2022
  7247 0000200B 395519                  		cmp	[di+19h], dx ; 0
  7248                                  		;ja	short goodret2
  7249 0000200E 770F                    		ja	short goodret	; 11/09/2023
  7250 00002010 034517                  		add	ax, [di+17h]	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  7251                                  		;jb	short goodret
  7252                                  		; 12/12/2022
  7253                                  		;jc	short goodret

  7256 00002018 89450E                  		mov	[di+0Eh], ax	; [di+BDS.totalsecs16]

  7258                                  		; 12/12/2022

  7260                                  goodret_clc:
  7261                                  		; 11/09/2023

  7270                                  					; set size of fat on media
  7271                                  		; 11/09/2023
  7272                                  		;clc
  7273                                  ret_hard_err:
  7274                                  		; 12/12/2022
  7275                                  goodret2:					
  7276 00002026 07                      		pop	es

  7287                                  ;sector that can be handled by pc dos 3.3 ibmbio should be 0ffffh.
  7288                                  ;instead, sometimes fdisk use 10000h to calculate the maximum number.

  7350                                  ; the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the various form factors
  7351                                  ; are present in the bpbtable. for hard files, the recommended bpb is the same

  7546                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7547                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7548                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7549                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  7550                                  
  7551                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7552                                  ;
  7553                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7554                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7555                                  ;
  7556                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7557                                  ;
  7558                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7559                                  ;   initialize it.
  7560                                  ;
  7561                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7562                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7563                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7564                                  ;
  7565                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7566                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7567                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7568                                  ;
  7569                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7570                                  ;   save coding.
  7571                                  ;
  7572                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7573                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7574                                  ;
  7575                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7576                                  ;
  7577                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7578                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7579                                  ;
  7580                                  ; called modules:
  7581                                  ;		  getboot
  7582                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7583                                  ;
  7584                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7585                                  ;
  7586                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7587                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7588                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7589                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7590                                  ;
  7591                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7592                                  
  7593                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7594                                  domini:	
  7595 00002133 8A36[4F17]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7596                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7597 00002137 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7598                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7599 00002139 7431                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7600 0000213B B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7601                                  domini_loop:				
  7602 0000213D 52                      		push	dx
  7603 0000213E 8816[4E17]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7604 00002142 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7605 00002144 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7606                                  					; DL = drive number
  7607                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7608                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7609                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7610 00002146 FEC6                    		inc	dh
  7611 00002148 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7612 0000214A 88F0                    		mov	al, dh
  7613 0000214C A3[5417]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7614 0000214F 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  7615 00002152 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7616 00002154 A3[5617]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7617 00002157 06                      		push	es
  7618 00002158 8A16[4E17]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7619 0000215C E87CFB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7620                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7621 0000215F 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7622 00002161 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7623                                  domininext:				
  7624 00002164 07                      		pop	es
  7625 00002165 5A                      		pop	dx
  7626 00002166 FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7627 00002168 FECE                    		dec	dh
  7628 0000216A 75D1                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7629                                  dominiret:				
  7630 0000216C C3                      		retn
  7631                                  
  7632                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7633                                  
  7634                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7635                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7636                                  
  7637                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7638                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7639                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7640                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7641                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7642                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7643                                  ;
  7644                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7645                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7646                                  
  7647                                  
  7648                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7649 0000216D 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7650                                  fmpnext:				
  7651 00002171 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7652 00002175 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7653 00002177 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7654 0000217A 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7655 0000217E 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7656                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7657                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7658                                  fmpnextfound:
  7659 00002180 C3                      		retn
  7660                                  
  7661                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7662                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7663                                  ;fmpret:
  7664                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7665                                  
  7666                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7667                                  
  7668                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7669                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7670 00002181 E89D00                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7671 00002184 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7672 00002186 8B3E[5217]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7673 0000218A C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7674                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7675 0000218F 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7676                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7677                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7678 00002193 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7679                                  					; ffHardFile
  7680 00002197 C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7681 0000219C A1[5417]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7682 0000219F 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7683 000021A2 A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7684 000021A5 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7685 000021A8 A0[4E17]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7686 000021AB 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7687                                  					; set physical number
  7688 000021AE A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7689 000021B1 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7690                                  					; set logical number
  7691 000021B4 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7692 000021B9 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7693 000021BB 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7694                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7695 000021C0 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7696                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7697                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7698 000021C2 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7699 000021C5 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7700 000021C9 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7701 000021CC D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7702 000021CE D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7703 000021D0 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7704 000021D4 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7705                                  					; set hidden trks
  7706 000021D7 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7707 000021DB 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7708 000021DF 8A16[4E17]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7709 000021E3 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7710 000021E6 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7711 000021E9 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7712                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7713                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7714                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7715 000021EB 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7716 000021ED BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7717                                  
  7718                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7719                                  		;push	es
  7720 000021F0 E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7721                                  					; bx value saved.
  7722                                  		;pop	es  ; 14/08/2023
  7723 000021F3 7203                    		jb	short fmpnextchain
  7724 000021F5 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7725                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7726 000021F8 E976FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7727                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7728                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7729                                  
  7730                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7731                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7732                                  		;retn

  7739                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7740

  7742 000021FC 53                      		push	bx

  7745                                  		;push	ds
  7746 000021FD 06                      		push	es

  7749 00002202 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2

  7751 00002208 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2

  7753 0000220E 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2

  7774                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7775                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7776                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7777                                  ;

  7779                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7780                                  ;			trash ax

  7785 00002228 06                      		push	es

  7799                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1

  7809                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7810                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7811                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7812                                  ;								 
  7813                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7814                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7815                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.

  7817                                  xinstall_bds:

  7819 00002237 53                      		push	bx
  7820 00002238 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7821                                  xinstall_bds_1:

  7823 0000223F 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7824                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7825 00002241 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7826 00002243 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1

  7828                                  
  7829                                  xinstall_bds_2:

  7833 00002247 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7834                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7835 0000224A C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7836                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7837 0000224E 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7838                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7839                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7840 00002251 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7841 00002254 8B36[5017]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7842 00002258 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7843 0000225A 8306[5017]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7844 0000225F FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]

  7846 00002268 5B                      		pop	bx

  7851                                  
  7852                                  ; 17/10/2022

  7854                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0

  7857                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7858 0000226B 50                      		push	ax
  7859 0000226C 51                      		push	cx
  7860 0000226D 52                      		push	dx
  7861 0000226E 55                      		push	bp
  7862 0000226F 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7863                                  loop_clock:				
  7864 00002271 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7865 00002273 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7866 00002275 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7867 00002277 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7868                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7869                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7870                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7871 00002279 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7872 0000227C 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7873 0000227E 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7874 00002281 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7875 00002283 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7876 00002286 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7877 00002288 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7878 00002289 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7879                                  delay:					
  7880 0000228C E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7881 0000228E EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7882                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7883                                  
  7884                                  clock_present:				
  7885 00002290 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7886 00002296 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7887                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7888                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7889 00002299 56                      		push	si
  7890 0000229A E88BF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7891 0000229D FA                      		cli
  7892                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7893 0000229E 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7894 000022A2 FB                      		sti
  7895 000022A3 5E                      		pop	si
  7896                                  
  7897                                  no_readdate:				
  7898 000022A4 5D                      		pop	bp
  7899 000022A5 5A                      		pop	dx
  7900 000022A6 59                      		pop	cx
  7901 000022A7 58                      		pop	ax
  7902 000022A8 C3                      		retn
  7903                                  
  7904                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7905                                  
  7906                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7907                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7908                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7909                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7910                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7911                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7912                                  ;
  7913                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7914                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7915                                  ;
  7916                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7917                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7918                                  ;
  7919                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7920                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7921                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7922                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7923                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7924                                  ;
  7925                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7926                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7927                                  
  7928                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7929                                  
  7930                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7931                                  
  7932                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7933                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7934                                  			
  7935 000022A9 50                      		push	ax
  7936 000022AA 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7937 000022B0 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7938 000022B2 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7939                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7940 000022B8 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7941 000022BA 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7942                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7943 000022C0 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7944                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7945                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7946                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7947                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7948                                  cmosck4:				
  7949 000022C2 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7950                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7951 000022C4 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7952                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7953 000022C6 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7954 000022C9 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7955                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7956 000022CB E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7957 000022CE 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7958                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7959 000022D0 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7960 000022D2 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7961                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7962 000022D4 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7963                                  cmosck9:				
  7964 000022D7 58                      		pop	ax
  7965 000022D8 C3                      		retn
  7966                                  
  7967                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7968                                  
  7969                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7970                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7971                                  ;									       :
  7972                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7973                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7974                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7975                                  ;									       :
  7976                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7977                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7978                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7979                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7980                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7981                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7982                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7983                                  
  7984                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7985 000022D9 9C                      		pushf
  7986 000022DA FA                      		cli
  7987 000022DB 53                      		push	bx
  7988 000022DC 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7989 000022DD 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7990 000022DF E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7991                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7992 000022E1 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7993 000022E2 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7994 000022E4 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7995 000022E6 58                      		pop	ax
  7996 000022E7 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7997 000022E9 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7998 000022EB E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7999                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8000 000022ED 90                      		nop
  8001 000022EE E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8002 000022F0 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  8003 000022F2 5B                      		pop	bx
  8004 000022F3 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  8005 000022F4 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  8006 000022F7 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  8007                                  
  8008                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8009                                  
  8010                                  cmos_popf:				
  8011 000022F8 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  8012                                  					; return far and restore flags
  8013                                  
  8014                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8015                                  
  8016                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  8017                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  8018                                  ;									       :
  8019                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  8020                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  8021                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  8022                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  8023                                  ;									       :
  8024                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  8025                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  8026                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  8027                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  8028                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  8029                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  8030                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8031                                  
  8032                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  8033 000022F9 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  8034 000022FA 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  8035 000022FB FA                      		cli
  8036 000022FC 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  8037 000022FD 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  8038 000022FF E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8039                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8040 00002301 90                      		nop
  8041 00002302 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  8042 00002304 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8043 00002306 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  8044 00002307 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  8045 00002309 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  8046 0000230B E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8047                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8048 0000230D 90                      		nop
  8049 0000230E E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8050 00002310 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  8051 00002311 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  8052 00002312 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  8053 00002315 C3                      		retn
  8054                                  
  8055                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8056                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8057                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8058                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  8059                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8060                                  
  8061                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8062                                  ;
  8063                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  8064                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  8065                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  8066                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  8067                                  
  8068                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8069                                  
  8070                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  8071                                  ;
  8072                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  8073                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  8074                                  ;  es:di = load location
  8075                                  
  8076                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8077                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8078                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8079                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  8080                                  
  8081                                  
  8082                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8083                                  getclus:
  8084                                  		; 13/12/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8085                                  		; ds = cs
  8086                                  				
  8087 00002316 51                      		push	cx
  8088 00002317 57                      		push	di
  8089                                  		;mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  8090 00002318 890E[D016]              		mov	[doscnt], cx ; 13/12/2023
  8091 0000231C 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  8092 0000231E 48                      		dec	ax
  8093 0000231F 48                      		dec	ax
  8094 00002320 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  8095                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  8096                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  8097                                  		;add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  8098                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  8099                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8100 00002322 0306[CC16]              		add	ax, [bios_l]
  8101 00002326 1316[CE16]              		adc	dx, [bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  8102                                  unpack:					
  8103 0000232A 1E                      		push	ds ; ds = cs ; 13/12/2023
  8104 0000232B 52                      		push	dx ; * ; 13/12/2023
  8105 0000232C 50                      		push	ax
  8106 0000232D 53                      		push	bx
  8107                                  		;mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  8108 0000232E 8B36[D316]              		mov	si, [fatloc] ; 13/12/2023
  8109 00002332 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  8110 00002334 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  8111 00002336 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  8112                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  8113 0000233C 752F                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  8114 0000233E D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  8115                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  8116 00002340 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  8117                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  8118                                  		;push	dx ; 13/12/2023
  8119 00002342 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8120                                  		; 12/12/2023
  8121                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  8122 00002344 E86500                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8123                                  		;pop	dx ; 12/12/2023
  8124                                  
  8125 00002347 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  8126 00002349 750C                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  8127                                  		; 25/06/2023
  8128                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  8129                                  
  8130                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8131                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  8132 0000234B 50                      		push	ax ; **	; al = low 8 bits of 12 bits cluster number
  8133                                  
  8134 0000234C 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  8135                                  
  8136                                  		;push	dx ; 13/12/2023
  8137 0000234D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8138 0000234F E85A00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8139                                  		;pop	dx ; 13/12/2023
  8140                                  
  8141                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  8142                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8143                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  8144                                  		;mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  8145                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  8146                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  8147                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8148                                  		;mov	al, [cs:temp_cluster]
  8149 00002352 58                      		pop	ax  ; ** ; al = low 8 bits of 12 bits cluster number
  8150 00002353 8A260000                		mov	ah, [0] ; high 4 bits (bits 7 to 11) of 12 bits cluster num
  8151                                  even_odd:				
  8152 00002357 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  8153 00002358 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  8154 00002359 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  8155 0000235B 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  8156 0000235D D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  8157                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  8158 0000235F D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8159 00002361 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8160 00002363 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8161                                  havclus:				
  8162 00002365 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  8163 00002367 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  8164 0000236B EB0B                    		jmp	short unpackx
  8165                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8166                                  
  8167                                  unpack16:				
  8168                                  		;push	dx	; 13/12/2023	
  8169 0000236D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx ; 0
  8170 0000236F D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  8171                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  8172                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8173 00002371 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  8174                                  
  8175                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8176                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  8177 00002373 E83600                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8178                                  		;pop	dx	; 13/12/2023
  8179 00002376 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  8180                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  8181                                  unpackx:				
  8182 00002378 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  8183 00002379 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  8184 0000237A 5A                      		pop	dx ; * ; 13/12/2023
  8185 0000237B 1F                      		pop	ds
  8186                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8187                                  		; (this is a fast kernel loading method by the MSDOS programmer)
  8188                                  		; ((consequtive clusters --> consequtive sectors))
  8189                                  		; ds = cs
  8190 0000237C 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  8191 0000237E 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart? (consequtive?)
  8192                                  					; (current = previous+1)
  8193 00002381 7506                    		jnz	short getcl2	; no, read [doscnt] sectors 
  8194                                  		;add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  8195 00002383 010E[D016]              		add	[doscnt], cx ; 13/12/2023 ; add to read count
  8196 00002387 EBA1                    		jmp	short unpack
  8197                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8198                                  
  8199                                  getcl2:					
  8200 00002389 53                      		push	bx
  8201 0000238A 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  8202 0000238B 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  8203                                  
  8204                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8205                                  		; ds = cs
  8206                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  8207                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  8208 0000238C A1[CA16]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  8209 0000238F 8B0E[D016]              		mov	cx, [doscnt]
  8210                                  
  8211 00002393 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  8212                                  		;pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  8213                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8214 00002394 8F06[2B05]              		pop	word [start_sec_h]
  8215                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  8216                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8217                                  		; ds = cs
  8218                                  		;push	ds
  8219                                  		;push	cs
  8220                                  		;pop	ds
  8221                                  
  8222 00002398 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8223                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8224 00002399 BD[C308]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8225                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8226                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8227 0000239C E8C4F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  8228                                  		
  8229                                  		;pop	ds
  8230                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8231                                  		; ds = cs
  8232 0000239F 5B                      		pop	bx
  8233 000023A0 5F                      		pop	di
  8234                                  
  8235                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  8236                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8237 000023A1 A1[D016]                		mov	ax, [doscnt]
  8238 000023A4 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  8239 000023A6 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  8240 000023A8 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  8241 000023AA 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  8242 000023AB C3                      		retn
  8243                                  
  8244                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8245                                  
  8246                                  
  8247                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  8248                                  ;
  8249                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  8250                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  8251                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  8252                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  8253                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  8254                                  ;
  8255                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  8256                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  8257                                  ;      other registera saved.
  8258                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  8259                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  8260                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  8261                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  8262                                  
  8263                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8264                                  get_fat_sector:	
  8265                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8266                                  		; ds = fat buffer segment
  8267                                  
  8268                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8269                                  		;push	ax ; (not necessary)
  8270 000023AC 51                      		push	cx ; read count (sectors per cluster)
  8271 000023AD 57                      		push	di ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load offset
  8272 000023AE 56                      		push	si ; FAT offset value (from fat entry 0)
  8273 000023AF 06                      		push	es ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load segment
  8274 000023B0 1E                      		push	ds ; FAT buffer segment
  8275                                  
  8276                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8277 000023B1 0E                      		push	cs
  8278 000023B2 1F                      		pop	ds
  8279                                  
  8280 000023B3 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  8281                                  		;;mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8282                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8283                                  		;mov	cx, [md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8284                                  		;div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  8285                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8286                                  		;nop
  8287                                  
  8288                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8289 000023B5 F736[D816]              		div	word [md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8290                                  
  8291                                  		; ax = FAT sector (sequence/index) number
  8292                                  		; dx = cluster number offset
  8293                                  
  8294                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  8295                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  8296                                  
  8297                                  		; 13/12/2023 ; *
  8298                                  		;push	es ; *
  8299                                  		;push	ds ; *
  8300                                  		;push	di ; *
  8301 000023B9 50                      		push	ax
  8302                                  		;push	cs ; *
  8303                                  		;pop	ds ; *
  8304                                  
  8305                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  8306                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8307 000023BA A1[CA16]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id 
  8308 000023BD BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  8309                                  		;;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  8310                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  8311 000023C0 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8312 000023C1 E89FF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  8313 000023C4 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  8314 000023C5 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  8315                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  8316                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8317                                  		;pop	di ; *
  8318                                  		;pop	ds ; *
  8319                                  		;pop	es ; *
  8320                                  
  8321                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8322                                  		; ds = cs
  8323 000023C9 3B06[DA16]              		cmp	ax, [last_fat_sec_num]
  8324                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  8325 000023CD 741C                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  8326 000023CF A3[DA16]                		mov	[last_fat_sec_num], ax
  8327                                  		;mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax
  8328                                  					; sector number
  8329                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8330                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8331 000023D2 07                      		pop	es ; FAT buffer segment (DS on top of the stack)
  8332 000023D3 06                      		push	es ; (put it on top of the stack again)
  8333                                  
  8334 000023D4 52                      		push	dx ; cluster number offset
  8335                                  
  8336                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8337 000023D5 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  8338 000023D7 890E[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], cx ;0 
  8339                                  		;mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8340                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8341                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8342 000023DB 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8343                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8344 000023DD 41                      		inc	cx ; cx = 1
  8345                                  		;mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8346                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8347 000023DE A1[CA16]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]
  8348                                  		;push	ds
  8349                                  		;pop	es
  8350                                  
  8351 000023E1 31FF                    		xor	di, di	; 0	; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8352                                  		
  8353                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8354                                  		;push	ds
  8355                                  		;push	cs
  8356                                  		;pop	ds
  8357                                  		
  8358 000023E3 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8359 000023E4 BD[C308]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8360                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8361                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8362 000023E7 E879F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  8363                                  
  8364                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8365                                  		;pop	ds
  8366                                  		; ds = cs = biosdata segment
  8367                                  
  8368 000023EA 5A                      		pop	dx ; cluster number offset 
  8369                                  
  8370                                  gfs_split_chk:
  8371                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8372                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8373 000023EB 8B0E[D816]              		mov	cx, [md_sectorsize]
  8374                                  ;gfs_split_chk:				
  8375 000023EF 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  8376 000023F0 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8377                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8378                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8379 000023F2 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8380                                  		
  8381                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8382                                  		; bx = dx = cluster number offset in the FAT buffer
  8383 000023F4 1F                      		pop	ds ; FAT buffer segment
  8384 000023F5 07                      		pop	es ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load segment
  8385 000023F6 5E                      		pop	si ; FAT offset value (from fat entry 0)
  8386 000023F7 5F                      		pop	di ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load offset
  8387 000023F8 59                      		pop	cx ; read count (sectors per cluster)
  8388                                  		;pop	ax
  8389                                  
  8390 000023F9 C3                      		retn
  8391                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8392                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8393

  8395

  8435                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8436 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8437 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8438                                  
  8439                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8440                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8441                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8442                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8443                                  
  8444                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8445                                  
  8446                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8447                                  
  8448                                  ;************************************************************************
  8449                                  ;*									*
  8450                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8451                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8452                                  ;*									*
  8453                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8454                                  ;*									*
  8455                                  ;************************************************************************
  8456                                  
  8457                                  _seg_reinit:
  8458 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8459                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8460                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8461 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8462 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8463                                  
  8464                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  8465 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8466 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8467 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8468 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8469 00000042 CB                      		retf
  8470                                  
  8471                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8472                                  
  8473                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8474                                  
  8475                                  ;************************************************************************
  8476                                  ;*									*
  8477                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8478                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8479                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8480                                  ;*									*
  8481                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8482                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8483                                  ;*									*
  8484                                  ;************************************************************************
  8485                                  
  8486                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8487 00000043 56                      		push	si
  8488 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  8489 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  8490 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  8491 00000047 57                      		push	di
  8492 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  8493 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  8494 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  8495 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  8496 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8497 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8498                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8499                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8500 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8501 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8502 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8503 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8504 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8505 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8506 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8507 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8508 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8509 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8510                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8511 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8512                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8513                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8514 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8515                                  
  8516                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8517                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8518                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8519                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8520                                  ;
  8521                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8522                                  ;
  8523                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8524                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8525                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8526                                  ;
  8527                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8528                                  
  8529                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8530 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8531 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8532 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8533 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8534                                  					; 32 bits dsk req

  8538                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8539                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8540 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8541 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8542 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  8543 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error

  8547 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di

  8563                                  					; mark operation complete
  8564 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  8565 000000BD 07                      		pop	es

  8572 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si

  8574                                  	
  8575                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8576                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8577                                  bc_retf:
  8578 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  8579                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8580                                  
  8581                                  command_error:				
  8582 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8583 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8584                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8585                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8586                                  
  8587                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8588                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8589                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8590                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8591                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8592                                  ; high.
  8593                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8594                                  
  8595                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8596                                  
  8597                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8598                                  
  8599 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8600                                  
  8601 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8602                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8603                                  		
  8604                                  
  8605                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8606                                  
  8607                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8608                                  
  8609                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8610 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8611                                  					; unknown command error
  8612                                  
  8613                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8614                                  
  8615                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8616                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8617                                  
  8618                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8619                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8620                                  
  8621                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8622                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8623                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8624 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8625 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8626                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8627 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8628 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8629 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8630                                  
  8631                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8632
