  8636                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8637                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8638                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8639                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8640                                  
  8641                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8642                                  
  8643                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8644                                  
  8645                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8646                                  
  8647                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8648                                  
  8649                                  ;************************************************************************
  8650                                  ;*									*
  8651                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8652                                  ;*									*
  8653                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8654                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8655                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8656                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8657                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8658                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8659                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8660                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8661                                  ;*									*
  8662                                  ;************************************************************************
  8663                                  
  8664                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8665                                  		;db 0
  8666                                  
  8667                                  		; 13/12/202
  8668 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8669                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8670 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8671                                  					; 00 init
  8672 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8673 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8674 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8675                                  					; 03
  8676 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8677                                  					; 04
  8678 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8679                                  					; 05
  8680 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8681 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8682                                  					; 07
  8683 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8684                                  					; 08
  8685 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8686 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8687                                  con_table_end:
  8688 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8689                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8690 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8691 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8692 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8693 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8694 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8695                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8696 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8697                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8698 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8699 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8700 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8701 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8702 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8703 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8704 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8705 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8706 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8707 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8708 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8709 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8710 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8711 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8712 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8713 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8714 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8715 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8716 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8717 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8718                                  prn_table_end:
  8719 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8720                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8721 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8722 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8723 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8724 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8725 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8726 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8727 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8728 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8729 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8730 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8731 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8732                                  aux_table_end:
  8733 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8734                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8735 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00

  8740 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8741 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06

  8744 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09

  8746                                  
  8747                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8748                                  
  8749                                  ;************************************************************************
  8750                                  ;*									*
  8751                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8752                                  ;*									*
  8753                                  ;************************************************************************
  8754                                  
  8755                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8756                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8757 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8758                                  con_loop:				
  8759 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8760 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8761 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8762                                  con_exit:				
  8763 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8764 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8765                                  
  8766                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8767                                  
  8768                                  ;************************************************************************
  8769                                  ;*									*
  8770                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8771                                  ;*									*
  8772                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8773                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8774                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8775                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8776                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8777                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8778                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8779                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8780                                  ;*									*
  8781                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8782                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8783                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8784                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8785                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8786                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8787                                  ;*									*
  8788                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8789                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8790                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8791                                  ;*									*
  8792                                  ;************************************************************************
  8793                                  
  8794                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8795                                  chrin:		
  8796 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8797 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8798 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8799 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8800 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8801 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8802 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8803 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8804 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8805 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8806 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8807 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8808                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8809                                  
  8810                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8811                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8812                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8813                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8814                                  ;      else
  8815                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8816                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8817                                  ;      endif
  8818                                  ;    endif
  8819                                  ;  endif
  8820                                  
  8821                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8822 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8823 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8824 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8825 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8826 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8827 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8828 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8829 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8830                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8831                                  
  8832                                  not_ext:				
  8833 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8834 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8835                                  alt_save:				
  8836 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8837                                  keyret:					
  8838 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8839                                  
  8840                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8841                                  
  8842                                  ;************************************************************************
  8843                                  ;*									*
  8844                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8845                                  ;*									*
  8846                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8847                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8848                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8849                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8850                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8851                                  ;*									*
  8852                                  ;************************************************************************
  8853                                  
  8854                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8855                                  con_rdnd:				
  8856 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8857 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8858 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8859 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8860 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8861 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8862 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8863 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8864 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8865                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8866 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8867                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8868 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8869 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8870 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8871 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8872                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8873                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8874                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8875                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8876 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8877 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8878 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8879                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8880                                  
  8881                                  gotchr:					
  8882 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8883 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8884 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8885 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8886 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8887                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8888                                  
  8889                                  notbrk:					
  8890 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8891 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8892 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8893 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8894                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8895                                  
  8896                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8897 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8898 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8899 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8900 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8901 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8902 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8903 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8904                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8905                                  rdexit:					
  8906 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8907 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8908                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8909                                  bc_exvec:				
  8910 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8911                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8912 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8913                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8914                                  
  8915                                  ;************************************************************************
  8916                                  ;*									*
  8917                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8918                                  ;*									*
  8919                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8920                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8921                                  ;*									*
  8922                                  ;************************************************************************
  8923                                  
  8924                                  con_writ:
  8925                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8926 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8927                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8928                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8929                                  con_lp:					
  8930 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8931 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8932 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8933                                  					; AL = character to display
  8934 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8935                                  cc_ret:					
  8936 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8937 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8938                                  
  8939                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8940                                  
  8941                                  ;************************************************************************
  8942                                  ;*									*
  8943                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8944                                  ;*									*
  8945                                  ;************************************************************************
  8946                                  
  8947                                  con_flush:
  8948 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8949                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8950 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8951 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8952                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8953                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8954                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8955 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8956 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8957 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8958                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8959 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8960                                  
  8961                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8962                                  
  8963                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8964                                  
  8965                                  ;************************************************************************
  8966                                  ;*									*
  8967                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8968                                  ;*									*
  8969                                  ;************************************************************************
  8970                                  
  8971                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8972                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8973                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8974                                  
  8975                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8976                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8977                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8978                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8979                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8980                                  ;
  8981                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8982                                  
  8983                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8984                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8985                                  
  8986                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8987                                  
  8988                                  ;************************************************************************
  8989                                  ;*									*
  8990                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8991                                  ;*									*
  8992                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8993                                  ;*									*
  8994                                  ;************************************************************************
  8995                                  
  8996                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8997 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8998                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8999                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9000                                  prn_done:
  9001 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  9002 0000021C C3                      		retn
  9003                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9004                                  
  9005                                  ;************************************************************************
  9006                                  ;*									*
  9007                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  9008                                  ;*									*
  9009                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  9010                                  ;*									*
  9011                                  ;************************************************************************
  9012                                  
  9013                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  9014                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  9015 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  9016                                  prn_loop:				
  9017 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  9018                                  prn_out:				
  9019 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  9020 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  9021 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  9022 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9023 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  9024 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  9025 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  9026 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  9027 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  9028 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  9029 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  9030                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9031                                  
  9032                                  _prnwf:					
  9033 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  9034 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  9035                                  TestPrnError:

  9037 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  9038                                  pmessg:					
  9039 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  9041

  9044 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  9045                                  ;prn_done:				
  9046                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9047                                  prn_done2:
  9048                                  		;clc
  9049                                  		; cf=0
  9050 0000024D C3                      		retn
  9051                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9052                                  
  9053                                  ;************************************************************************
  9054                                  ;*									*
  9055                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  9056                                  ;*									*
  9057                                  ;************************************************************************
  9058                                  
  9059                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  9060 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  9061 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  9062 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  9063                                  		;jnz	short prn_done

  9066 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit

  9068                                  
  9069                                  ;************************************************************************
  9070                                  ;*									*
  9071                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  9072                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  9073                                  ;*									*
  9074                                  ;************************************************************************
  9075                                  
  9076                                  prnstat:				
  9077 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  9078                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  9079                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  9080                                  					; Return: AH = status
  9081                                  
  9082                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9083                                  
  9084                                  ;************************************************************************
  9085                                  ;*									*
  9086                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  9087                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  9088                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  9089                                  ;*									*
  9090                                  ;************************************************************************
  9091                                  
  9092                                  prnop:	
  9093 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  9094 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  9095                                  
  9096                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  9097                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  9098                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  9099                                  
  9100 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  9101 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  9102 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  9103 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  9104 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  9105 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  9106 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  9107                                  
  9108                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  9109                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  9110                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  9111                                  
  9112                                  NextTest:				
  9113 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  9114                                  					; i/o error?
  9115 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  9116                                  
  9117                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  9118                                  
  9119 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  9120                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  9121 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  9122 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  9123 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  9124                                  ret1:					
  9125 00000281 C3                      		retn
  9126                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9127                                  
  9128                                  checknotready:				
  9129 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  9130 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  9131 00000287 C3                      		retn
  9132                                  
  9133                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9134                                  
  9135                                  ;************************************************************************
  9136                                  ;*									*
  9137                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  9138                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  9139                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  9140                                  ;*									*
  9141                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  9142                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  9143                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  9144                                  ;*									*
  9145                                  ;************************************************************************
  9146                                  
  9147                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9148                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  9149 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  9150                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  9151 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  9152 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  9153 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  9154 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  9155 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  9156                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  9157 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  9158 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  9159                                  prn_getstat:				
  9160 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  9161 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  9162 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  9163 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  9164 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  9165 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  9166 000002A6 26                      		es
  9167 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  9168                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  9169                                  					; lodsb
  9170 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9171 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  9172 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  9173 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  9174                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9175                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  9176                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  9177 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  9178                                  
  9179                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9180                                  
  9181                                  prn_bperr:				
  9182 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  9183                                  prn_berr:				
  9184 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9185                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9186                                  
  9187                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9188                                  
  9189                                  ;************************************************************************
  9190                                  ;*									*
  9191                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  9192                                  ;*									*
  9193                                  ;************************************************************************
  9194                                  
  9195                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  9196                                  ; 11/01/2019
  9197                                  
  9198                                  ;********************************;*
  9199                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  9200                                  ;********************************;*
  9201                                  
  9202                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  9203                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  9204                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  9205                                  
  9206                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  9207                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  9208                                  ;;endstruc
  9209                                  
  9210                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  9211                                  
  9212                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9213                                  
  9214                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9215                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  9216 000002B6 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  9217 000002BA 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  9218                                  					; ioc_pc
  9219 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  9220                                  
  9221                                  prnfuncerr:				
  9222 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  9223                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9224                                  
  9225                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  9226 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  9227 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  9228 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  9229                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  9230 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  9231 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  9232                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  9233 000002D4 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  9234 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  9235 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  9236 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  9237 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  9238 000002E0 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  9239                                  prngetcount:				
  9240                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  9241 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  9242 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  9243                                  					; return current retry count
  9244                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9245                                  		; cf=0
  9246                                  		;clc
  9247 000002EA C3                      		retn
  9248                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9249                                  
  9250                                  ;************************************************************************
  9251                                  ;*									*
  9252                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*

  9255                                  ;************************************************************************
