 10517                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10518                                  
 10519                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10520                                  
 10521                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 10522                                  ; read in the boot sector. set carry if error in reading sector.
 10523                                  ; bx is set to 1 if the boot sector is invalid, otherwise it is 0.
 10524                                  ;
 10525                                  ;	assumes es:di -> bds, ds-> Bios_Data
 10526                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 10527                                  
 10528                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10529                                  
 10530                                  readbootsec:	
 10531 000006B1 B600                    		mov	dh, 0		; head 0
 10532 000006B3 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; cylinder 0, sector 1
 10533 000006B6 E8BF00                  		call	read_sector
 10534 000006B9 7243                    		jb	short err_ret
 10535 000006BB 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; assume valid boot sector
 10536                                  
 10537                                  		; put a sanity check for the boot sector in here to detect
 10538                                  		; boot sectors that do not have valid bpbs. we examine the
 10539                                  		; first two bytes - they must contain a long jump (69h) or a
 10540                                  		; short jump (EBh) followed by a nop (90h), or a short jump
 10541                                  		; (E9h). if this test is passed, we further check by examining
 10542                                  		; the signature at the end of the boot sector for the word
 10543                                  		; AA55h. if the signature is not present, we examine the media
 10544                                  		; descriptor byte to see if it is valid. for dos 3.3, this
 10545                                  		; logic is modified a little bit. we are not going to check
 10546                                  		; signature. instead we are going to sanity check the media
 10547                                  		; byte in bpb regardless of the validity of signature. this is
 10548                                  		; to save the already developed commercial products that have
 10549                                  		; good jump instruction and signature but with the false bpb
 10550                                  		; informations
 10551                                  
 10552                                  ; that will crash the diskette drive operation. (for example, symphony diskette).
 10553                                  
 10554                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10555                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10556                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 69h ; is it a direct jump?
 10557                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; don't need to find a nop
 10558                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0E9h ; dos 2.0 jump?
 10559                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; no need for	nop
 10560                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0EBh ; how about a short jump?
 10561                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10562                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10563                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10564                                  
 10565                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10566 000006BD A0[4E01]                		mov	al, [disksector]
 10567 000006C0 3C69                    		cmp	al, 69h		; is it a direct jump?
 10568 000006C2 740F                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10569                                  					; don't need to find a nop
 10570 000006C4 3CE9                    		cmp	al, 0E9h	; dos 2.0 jump?
 10571 000006C6 740B                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10572                                  					; no need for nop
 10573 000006C8 3CEB                    		cmp	al, 0EBh	; how about a short jump?
 10574 000006CA 7530                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10575 000006CC 803E[5001]90            		cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10576 000006D1 7529                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10577                                  
 10578                                  ; 15/10/5022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10579                                  ;
 10580                                  ;; 10/03/2019
 10581                                  ;; (MSDOS 3.3, MSDISK.ASM, 1988)
 10582                                  ;;
 10583                                  ;; Don't have to perform the following signature check since
 10584                                  ;; we need to check the media byte even with the good signatured diskette.
 10585                                  ;;
 10586                                  ;;check_signature:
 10587                                  ;;		cmp	word [cs:disksector+1FEh],0AA55h ; see if non-ibm
 10588                                  ;;							 ; disk or 1.x media.
 10589                                  ;;		jz	short checksinglesided ; go see if single sided medium.
 10590                                  ;;					       ; may need some special handling
 10591                                  
 10592                                  ; check for non-ibm disks which do not have the signature AA55h at the
 10593                                  ; end of the boot sector, but still have a valid boot sector. this is done
 10594                                  ; by examining the media descriptor in the boot sector.
 10595                                  
 10596                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10597                                  check_bpb_mediabyte:			
 10598 000006D3 A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10599                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10600 000006D6 50                      		push	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10601 000006D7 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h
 10602 000006D9 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; allow	for strange media
 10603 000006DB 58                      		pop	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10604 000006DC 751E                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10605                                  
 10606                                  ; there were some (apparently a lot of them) diskettes that had been formatted
 10607                                  ; under dos 3.1 and earlier versions which have invalid bpbs in their boot
 10608                                  ; sectors. these are specifically diskettes that were formatted in drives
 10609                                  ; with one head, or whose side 0 was bad. these contain bpbs in the boot
 10610                                  ; sector that have the sec/clus field set to 2 instead of 1, as is standard
 10611                                  ; in dos. in order to support them, we have to introduce a "hack" that will
 10612                                  ; help our build bpb routine to recognise these specific cases, and to
 10613                                  ; set up out copy of the bpb accordingly.
 10614                                  ; we do this by checking to see if the boot sector is off a diskette that
 10615                                  ; is single-sided and is a pre-dos 3.20 diskette. if it is, we set the
 10616                                  ; sec/clus field to 1. if not, we carry on as normal.
 10617                                  
 10618                                  checksinglesided:
 10619                                  		;mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10620                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10621                                  		; al = [disksector+15h]
 10622 000006DE 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h
 10623 000006E0 741B                    		jz	short gooddsk
 10624 000006E2 A801                    		test	al, 1
 10625 000006E4 7517                    		jnz	short gooddsk
 10626 000006E6 813E[5601]332E          		cmp	word [disksector+8], 2E33h ; "3."
 10627 000006EC 7507                    		jnz	short mustbeearlier
 10628 000006EE 803E[5801]32            		cmp	byte [disksector+0Ah], 32h ; "2"
 10629 000006F3 7308                    		jnb	short gooddsk
 10630                                  
 10631                                  ; we must have a pre-3.20 diskette. set the sec/clus field to 1
 10632                                  
 10633                                  mustbeearlier:				
 10634 000006F5 C606[5B01]01            		mov	byte [disksector+0Dh], 1
 10635                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10636 000006FA EB01                    		jmp	short gooddsk
 10637                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10638                                  
 10639                                  invalidbootsec:				
 10640 000006FC 43                      		inc	bx		; indicate that boot sector invalid
 10641                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10642                                  movbpb_ret:
 10643                                  gooddsk:				
 10644 000006FD F8                      		clc
 10645                                  err_ret:
 10646 000006FE C3                      		retn
 10647                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10648                                  
 10649                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10650                                  ;err_ret:				
 10651                                  		;retn

 10653                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10654                                  
 10655                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10656                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10657                                  ; 'movbpb' moves the bpb read from the boot sector into registers for use by
 10658                                  ; getbp routine at has1
 10659                                  ;
 10660                                  ; if the set_id_flag is 1, and if an extended boot record, then set volume
 10661                                  ; serial number, volume label, file system id in bds according to
 10662                                  ; the boot record.  after that, this routine will set the set_id_flag to 2
 10663                                  ; to signal that volume label is set already from the extended boot record
 10664                                  ; (so, don't set it again by calling "set_volume_id" routine which uses
 10665                                  ; the volume label in the root directory.)
 10666                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10667                                  
 10668                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10669                                  
 10670                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10671                                  movbpb:	
 10672 000006FF 8A36[5B01]              		mov	dh, [disksector+0Dh]
 10673                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10674                                  					; sectors per unit
 10675 00000703 8A3E[5F01]              		mov	bh, [disksector+11h]
 10676                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
 10677                                  					; number of directory entries
 10678 00000707 8B0E[6101]              		mov	cx, [disksector+13h]
 10679                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
 10680                                  					; size of drive
 10681 0000070B 8A26[6301]              		mov	ah, [disksector+15h]
 10682                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10683                                  					; media	descriptor
 10684 0000070F A0[6401]                		mov	al, [disksector+16h];
 10685                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
 10686                                  					; number of fat	sectors
 10687 00000712 8A1E[6601]              		mov	bl, [disksector+18h]
 10688                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERTRACK]
 10689                                  					; sectors per track

 10691                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.HEADS]
 10692                                  					; number of heads

 10703                                  		; cf = 0
 10704                                  ;movbpb_ret:

 10708                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10709                                  
 10710                                  ;copy the boot_serial number, volume id, and filesystem id from the
 10711                                  ;***extended boot record*** in ds:disksector to the bds table pointed
 10712                                  ;by es:di.
 10713                                  
 10714                                  ;in.) es:di -> bds
 10715                                  ;     ds:disksector = valid extended boot record.
 10716                                  ;out.) vol_serial, bds_volid and bds_system_id in bds are set according to
 10717                                  ;      the boot record information.
 10718                                  ;     carry flag set if not an extended bpb.
 10719                                  ;     all registers saved except the flag.
 10720                                  
 10721                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10722                                  mov_media_ids:		
 10723 00000736 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 10724                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 10725                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE

 10729                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 10730 00000742 26894D57                		mov	[es:di+57h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
 10731 00000746 8B0E[7701]              		mov	cx, [disksector+29h]
 10732                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 10733 0000074A 26894D59                		mov	[es:di+59h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 10734 0000074E 57                      		push	di
 10735 0000074F 56                      		push	si
 10736 00000750 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL

 10738                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+2Bh) ;
 10739                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.VOL_LABEL

 10741 00000759 F3A4                    		rep movsb

 10746                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+36h) ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SYSTEM_ID

 10763                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10764                                  
 10765                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10766                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10767                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
 10768                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
 10769                                  ; output:
 10770                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
 10771                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
 10772                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10773                                  
 10774                                  readfat:	
 10775                                  		;mov	dh, 0
 10776                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10777 0000076B 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10778 0000076D B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
 10779                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2
 10780 00000770 E80500                  		call	read_sector
 10781 00000773 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 10782 00000775 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
 10783                                  bad_fat_ret:				
 10784 00000777 C3                      		retn
 10785                                  
 10786                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10787                                  
 10788                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10789                                  
 10790                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10791                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 10792                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 10793                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 10794                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 10795                                  ;		dh has head
 10796                                  ;		es:di has bds
 10797                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 10798                                  ;
 10799                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 10800                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 10801                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 10802                                  ;
 10803                                  ;		carry set
 10804                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 10805                                  ;
 10806                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 10807                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10808                                  
 10809                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10810                                  
 10811                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10812                                  read_sector:	
 10813 00000778 55                      		push	bp
 10814 00000779 BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 10815 0000077C 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10816 00000780 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 10817                                  rd_ret:					
 10818 00000783 06                      		push	es
 10819 00000784 1E                      		push	ds
 10820 00000785 07                      		pop	es
 10821 00000786 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10822 00000789 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10823                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10824                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10825                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10826 0000078B 07                      		pop	es
 10827 0000078C 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 10828                                  rd_rty:					
 10829 0000078E E87404                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 10830 00000791 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 10831 00000793 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10832                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10833                                  					; fnon_removable
 10834 00000798 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 10835 0000079A 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10836 0000079F 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 10837 000007A1 50                      		push	ax
 10838 000007A2 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 10839 000007A3 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10840                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10841                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10842                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 10843                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10844 000007A7 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 10845 000007A9 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 10846                                  		; 
 10847 000007AC 1F                      		pop	ds
 10848 000007AD A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 10849 000007B0 58                      		pop	ax
 10850                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 10851 000007B1 06                      		push	es
 10852 000007B2 1E                      		push	ds
 10853 000007B3 07                      		pop	es
 10854 000007B4 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10855 000007B7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10856                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10857                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10858                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10859 000007B9 07                      		pop	es
 10860 000007BA 9C                      		pushf
 10861 000007BB 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10862 000007C0 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 10863 000007C2 50                      		push	ax
 10864 000007C3 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 10865 000007C6 1E                      		push	ds
 10866 000007C7 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10867 000007CB 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10868 000007CE 1F                      		pop	ds
 10869 000007CF 58                      		pop	ax
 10870                                  rd_skip2_dpt:				
 10871 000007D0 9D                      		popf
 10872 000007D1 7305                    		jnb	short okret2
 10873 000007D3 EBB9                    		jmp	short rd_rty
 10874                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10875                                  
 10876                                  err_rd_ret:				
 10877 000007D5 B2FF                    		mov	dl, 0FFh	; make sure we ask rom if media	has changed
 10878                                  					; return error
 10879 000007D7 F9                      		stc
 10880                                  
 10881                                  ; update information pertaining to last drive accessed, time of access, last
 10882                                  ; track accessed in that drive.
 10883                                  
 10884                                  okret2:					
 10885 000007D8 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl	; set up for head settle logic in disk
 10886 000007DC 8816[1E01]              		mov	[tim_drv], dl	; save drive last accessed
 10887 000007E0 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10888                                  					; save last track accessed on this drive
 10889                                  					; preserve flags in case error occurred

 10891 000007E5 E8FD03                  		call	set_tim
 10892 000007E8 9D                      		popf			; restore flags
 10893 000007E9 5D                      		pop	bp
 10894 000007EA C3                      		retn

 10918 00000809 7404                    		jz	short exitjx	; watch	out for	wrap
 10919 0000080B 26FF4D20                		dec	word [es:di+20h]
 10920                                  exitjx:					
 10921                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10922                                  		; cf = 0
 10923                                  		;clc		; CF is	already	ZERO here (18/09/2022, MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10924                                  				; (19/07/2019 -	Erdogan	Tan - MSDOS 6.0	IO.SYS - retrodos4.s)
 10925 0000080F C3                      		retn

 10984                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10985                                  
 10986                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10987                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10988                                  
 10989                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10990                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
 10991                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 10992                                  
 10993                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 10994                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 10995                                  ;
 10996                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data
 10997                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10998                                  
 10999                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11000                                  checksingle:		
 11001 0000083A 50                      		push	ax
 11002 0000083B 53                      		push	bx
 11003 0000083C 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11004                                  
 11005                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 11006                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 11007                                  
 11008 00000840 F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 11009 00000843 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 11010 00000845 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 11011                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 11012 00000848 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 11013                                  
 11014                                  
 11015                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 11016                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 11017                                  
 11018 0000084A 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11019                                  					; get physical drive number
 11020 0000084E 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 11021 0000084F 57                      		push	di
 11022 00000850 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 11023                                  scan_list:				
 11024 00000854 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 11025 00000858 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 11026 0000085A B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 11027 0000085C 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 11028 00000860 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 11029 00000862 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 11030 00000866 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 11031 00000867 07                      		pop	es
 11032 00000868 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 11033                                  
 11034                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 11035                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 11036                                  ; in this case.
 11037 0000086C 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1
 11038 00000871 7517                    		jnz	short not_fsetowner
 11039                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
 11040 00000873 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 11041 00000878 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 11042 0000087A 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 11043                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 11044                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 11045 0000087E 06                      		push	es
 11046 0000087F 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 11047 00000883 26A20405                		mov	[es:LSTDRV], al
 11048                                  		;mov	es:504h, al	; [es:LSTDRV]
 11049                                  					; set up sdsb
 11050 00000887 07                      		pop	es		; restore bds pointer
 11051 00000888 EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret
 11052                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11053                                  
 11054                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 11055                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 11056                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb
 11057                                  
 11058                                  not_fsetowner:				
 11059 0000088A 803E[7800]02            		cmp	byte [single], 2 ; if (single_drive_system)
 11060 0000088F 7517                    		jnz	short ignore_sdsb
 11061 00000891 50                      		push	ax
 11062 00000892 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; if (curr_drv == req_drv)
 11063 00000896 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 11064 00000898 06                      		push	es
 11065 00000899 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 11066 0000089D 2686060405              		xchg	al, [es:LSTDRV]
 11067                                  		;xchg	al, es:504h	; [es:LSTDRV]
 11068                                  					; then swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 11069 000008A2 07                      		pop	es
 11070 000008A3 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; else
 11071 000008A5 58                      		pop	ax		; swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 11072 000008A6 7410                    		jz	short singleret	; issue	swap_dsk_msg
 11073                                  ignore_sdsb:				
 11074 000008A8 E85C0E                  		call	swpdsk
 11075 000008AB EB0B                    		jmp	short singleret
 11076                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11077                                  
 11078                                  scan_skip:	
 11079 000008AD 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]			
 11080                                  		;les	di, es:[di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 11081                                  					; go to	next bds
 11082 000008B0 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; end of list?
 11083 000008B3 759F                    		jnz	short scan_list	; ontinue until	hit end	of list
 11084 000008B5 F9                      		stc
 11085 000008B6 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 11086 000008B7 07                      		pop	es
 11087                                  
 11088                                  singleret:				
 11089 000008B8 5B                      		pop	bx
 11090 000008B9 58                      		pop	ax
 11091 000008BA C3                      		retn
 11092

 11094                                  
 11095                                  baddrive:

 11097 000008BD EB02                    		jmp	short baddrive_ret

 11099

 11109                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11110                                  
 11111                                  ; 15/10/52022
 11112                                  
 11113                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11114                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 11115                                  ;
 11116                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 11117                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 11118                                  ;	cx = sector count
 11119                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 11120                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 11121                                  ;	ds = cs
 11122                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 11123                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 11124                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 11125                                  ;
 11126                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 11127                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 11128                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11129                                  
 11130                                  diskrd:	
 11131                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread

 11550 00000AF4 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 11551 00000AF8 FEC6                    		inc	dh
 11552 00000AFA 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 11553 00000AFE 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 11554 00000B00 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 11555 00000B02 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 11556                                  noxor:					
 11557 00000B06 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 11558                                  disk_ret:				
 11559 00000B0A F8                      		clc
 11560 00000B0B C3                      		retn
 11561                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11562                                  
 11563                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11564                                  
 11565                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11566                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 11567                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 11568                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11569                                  
 11570                                  do_write:				
 11571 00000B0C 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 11572 00000B10 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 11573 00000B12 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11574 00000B16 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 11575                                  
 11576                                  do_norm:				
 11577 00000B18 E87500                  		call	normspeed
 11578 00000B1B EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 11579                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11580                                  
 11581                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11582                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 11583                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11584                                  
 11585                                  doverify:				
 11586 00000B1D 58                      		pop	ax
 11587 00000B1E 50                      		push	ax
 11588 00000B1F B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11589 00000B21 E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 11590 00000B24 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11591                                  
 11592                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11593                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11594                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11595                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11596                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11597                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11598                                  
 11599 00000B26 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11600 00000B29 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11601 00000B2B FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11602 00000B2F 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11603 00000B31 E83705                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11604 00000B34 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11605                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11606                                  
 11607                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 11608 00000B36 E83205                  		call	ResetDisk
 11609 00000B39 FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11610 00000B3D EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11611                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11612                                  
 11613                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11614                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11615                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11616                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11617                                  
 11618                                  dskerr:					
 11619 00000B3F 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 11620 00000B44 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11621 00000B46 E8FE0C                  		call	checkio
 11622                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 11623 00000B49 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11624 00000B4E 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11625 00000B50 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11626 00000B53 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11627                                  dochkagain:				
 11628 00000B58 E8AA00                  		call	again
 11629                                  dskerr0:				
 11630 00000B5B 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11631 00000B5D 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11632                                  					; fnon_removable
 11633 00000B62 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11634 00000B64 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11635 00000B67 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11636                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 11637 00000B69 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11638 00000B6C 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11639 00000B6E C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11640                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11641                                  dskerr1:				
 11642 00000B74 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11643                                  		;jmp	retry
 11644                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11645 00000B75 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11646                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11647                                  
 11648                                  write_fault_err:			
 11649 00000B78 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11650                                  					; for write fault error.
 11651 00000B7B EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11652                                  
 11653                                  		; fall into harderr
 11654                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11655                                  
 11656                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11657                                  
 11658                                  harderr:				
 11659 00000B7D E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11660                                  harderr2:				
 11661 00000B80 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11662                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11663 00000B85 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11664 00000B89 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11665                                  
 11666                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11667                                  
 11668                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11669                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11670 00000B8D E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11671                                  
 11672                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11673                                  
 11674                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11675                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11676                                  
 11677                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11678                                  normspeed:
 11679 00000B90 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11680 00000B95 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11681 00000B97 06                      		push	es
 11682 00000B98 50                      		push	ax
 11683 00000B99 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11684 00000B9C C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11685 00000BA0 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11686 00000BA4 58                      		pop	ax
 11687 00000BA5 07                      		pop	es
 11688 00000BA6 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11689 00000BA9 06                      		push	es
 11690 00000BAA C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11691 00000BAE 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11692                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11693 00000BB3 07                      		pop	es
 11694 00000BB4 C3                      		retn
 11695                                  
 11696                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11697                                  
 11698                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11699                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11700                                  
 11701                                  fastspeed:		
 11702 00000BB5 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11703                                  					; ftoobig
 11704 00000BBA 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11705 00000BBC 06                      		push	es
 11706 00000BBD 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11707 00000BC1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11708 00000BC3 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11709 00000BC7 07                      		pop	es
 11710 00000BC8 C3                      		retn
 11711                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11712                                  
 11713                                  notready:				
 11714 00000BC9 F9                      		stc
 11715 00000BCA B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11716 00000BCC C3                      		retn
 11717                                  
 11718                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11719                                  
 11720                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11721                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11722                                  
 11723                                  maperror:	
 11724 00000BCD 51                      		push	cx
 11725 00000BCE 06                      		push	es
 11726 00000BCF 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11727 00000BD0 07                      		pop	es
 11728 00000BD1 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11729 00000BD3 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11730 00000BD6 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11731                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11732 00000BD9 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11733 00000BDC F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11734                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11735 00000BDE 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11736                                  					; get translation
 11737                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11738                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11739 00000BE1 07                      		pop	es
 11740 00000BE2 59                      		pop	cx
 11741 00000BE3 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11742 00000BE4 C3                      		retn
 11743                                  
 11744                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11745                                  
 11746                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11747                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11748                                  
 11749                                  set_tim:		
 11750 00000BE5 50                      		push	ax
 11751 00000BE6 E891F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11752                                  
 11753                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11754                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11755                                  
 11756 00000BE9 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11757 00000BED 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11758 00000BEF 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11759                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11760                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11761 00000BF3 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11762                                  setaccess:				
 11763 00000BF5 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11764 00000BFA 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11765 00000BFE 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11766                                  done_set:				
 11767 00000C02 F8                      		clc
 11768                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11769 00000C03 58                      		pop	ax
 11770 00000C04 C3                      		retn
 11771                                  
 11772                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11773                                  
 11774                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11775                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11776                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11777                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11778                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11779                                  
 11780                                  again:	
 11781 00000C05 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11782 00000C08 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11783 00000C0B 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11784                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11785 00000C0D 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11786 00000C0E C3                      		retn
 11787                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11788                                  
 11789                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11790 00000C0F 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11791 00000C11 C3                      		retn

 11804                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11805                                  ;
 11806                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11807                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11808                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11809                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11810                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11811                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11812                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11813                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 11817

 11827                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 11828                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	; ReadTrack
 11829                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack

 11897                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11898                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11899                                  ;
 11900                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11901                                  ;
 11902                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11903                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11904                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11905                                  ;
 11906                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11907                                  
 11908                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11909                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11910                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11911 00000C42 E886F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11912 00000C45 06                      		push	es
 11913 00000C46 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11914 00000C4A 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11915                                  					; RAWIO
 11916 00000C4F 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11917 00000C53 07                      		pop	es
 11918 00000C54 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11919                                  
 11920                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11921                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11922                                  
 11923                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11924 00000C56 BE[130C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11925                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11926                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11927 00000C59 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11928 00000C5B 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11929                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11930 00000C5D BE[260C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11931                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11932                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11933                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11934 00000C60 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11935 00000C62 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11936 00000C64 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11937 00000C67 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11938 00000C69 98                      		cbw
 11939 00000C6A D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11940 00000C6C 46                      		inc	si
 11941 00000C6D 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11942 00000C6F 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11943                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11944 00000C72 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11945                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11946                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11947 00000C77 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11948 00000C79 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11949                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11950                                  
 11951                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11952                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11953                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11954 00000C7A 5A                      		pop	dx
 11955                                  
 11956                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11957 00000C7B E957F4                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 11958                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11959                                  
 11960                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11961                                  
 11962                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11963                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11964                                  ;
 11965                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11966                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11967                                  ;
 11968                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11969                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11970                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11971                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11972                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11973                                  
 11974                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11975                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11976                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11977                                  
 11978 00000C7E C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11979 00000C82 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11980                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11981 00000C85 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11982 00000C89 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11983 00000C8C 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11984 00000C90 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11985                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11986 00000C93 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11987 00000C96 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]

 12195                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12196                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12197                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12198                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12199                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12200                                  ;
 12201                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12202                                  ;
 12203                                  ; output:
 12204                                  ;	for status call:
 12205                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12206                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12207                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12208                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12209                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12210                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12211                                  ;
 12212                                  ;	for format track:
 12213                                  ;		carry set if error
 12214                                  ;
 12215                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12216                                  
 12217                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12218                                  
 12219                                  		; 19/10/2022

 12368                                  
 12369                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12370                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12371                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12372                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12373                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12374                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12375                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 12376                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 12377                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 12378                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 12379                                  		; register.
 12380                                  
 12381                                  					; Special function requested?

 12482                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

 12484                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12485                                  
 12486                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12487                                  ;
 12488                                  ; TrackIo:
 12489                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12490                                  ;
 12491                                  ;   input:
 12492                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12493                                  ;		  3 = write
 12494                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12495                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12496                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12497                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12498                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12499                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12500                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12501                                  ;
 12502                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12503                                  
 12504                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12505                                  		
 12506                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12507                                  TrackIo:	
 12508                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12509 00000EF4 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error

 12518 00000F08 58                      		pop	ax

 12524                                  
 12525                                  		; WE WANT:
 12526                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12527                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12528

 12530                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12531 00000F15 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8

 12542                                  					; the track table

 12547                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12548                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12549                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.

 12655                                  ;
 12656                                  ; SetDASD
 12657                                  ;

 12660                                  ;

 12664                                  
 12665                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12666                                  SetDasd:	
 12667 00000F79 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12668                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12669 00000F7E 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12670                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12671 00000F80 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h

 12673                                  					; set_dasd_true

 12678                                  					; ~set_dasd_true

 12682 00000F96 B004                    		mov	al, 4

 12731 00000FCC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12732                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12733                                  DasdHasBeenSet:

 12738                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12739                                  
 12740                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12741                                  
 12742                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12743                                  ;
 12744                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12745                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12746                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12747                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12748                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12749                                  ;
 12750                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12751                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12752                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12753                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12754                                  ;
 12755                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12756                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12757                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12758                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12759                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12760                                  ;
 12761                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12762                                  
 12763                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12764                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12765 00000FD7 51                      		push	cx
 12766 00000FD8 52                      		push	dx
 12767                                  
 12768                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12769                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12770                                  
 12771 00000FD9 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12772 00000FDE 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12773 00000FE0 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12774 00000FE2 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12775 00000FE7 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12776 00000FE9 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12778                                  
 12779                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12780 00000FEB 06                      		push	es
 12781 00000FEC 56                      		push	si
 12782                                  
 12783                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12784                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12785 00000FED 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12786 00000FEF 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12787                                  
 12788 00000FF1 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12789                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12790                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12791 00000FF6 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12792 00000FFA 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12793                                  
 12794                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12795                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12796                                  
 12797 00000FFE 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12798 00001003 5E                      		pop	si
 12799 00001004 07                      		pop	es
 12800                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 12801 00001005 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12802 00001009 49                      		dec	cx
 12803 0000100A 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12804 0000100D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12805 0000100F D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1

 12807 00001013 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]

 12812 0000101E 57                      		push	di
 12813 0000101F B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12814 00001021 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12815                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12816 00001023 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12817 00001025 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12818 0000102A 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting

 12829                                  					; Get current disk base	table

 12832

 12834                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12835                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12836                                  		;mov	es, si
 12837 0000103F 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12838

 12900                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12901                                  ;
 12902                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12903                                  ;
 12904                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12905                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12906                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12907                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12908                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!

 12928                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)

 12938                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12939                                  ;
 12940                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12941                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12942                                  ;
 12943                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12944                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12945                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12946                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12947                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12948                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12949                                  ;
 12950                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12951                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12952                                  ;
 12953                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12954                                  
 12955                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12956                                  ToRom:	
 12957 00001081 53                      		push	bx
 12958 00001082 56                      		push	si

 12961                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.

 13007                                  
 13008                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13009                                  
 13010                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13011                                  
 13012                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13013                                  ;
 13014                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13015                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13016                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13017                                  ;
 13018                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13019                                  
 13020                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13021                                  ioctl_getown:
 13022 000010D9 E8EFF3                  		call	SetDrive
 13023 000010DC 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13024                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13025 000010E0 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13026                                  ownloop:				
 13027 000010E4 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13028 000010E8 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13029                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13030 000010EA 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13031                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13032                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13033 000010EF 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13034                                  getnextBDS:				
 13035 000010F1 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13036 000010F4 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13037                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13038                                  
 13039                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13040                                  ;
 13041                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13042                                  ; in al to al.
 13043                                  ;
 13044                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13045                                  
 13046                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13047                                  ioctl_setown:
 13048 000010F6 E8D2F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13049 000010F9 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13050                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13051 000010FE E839F7                  		call	checksingle
 13052                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13053 00001101 FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13054                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13055                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13056                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13057                                  
 13058                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13059                                  ;
 13060                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13061                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13062                                  ;
 13063                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13064                                  
 13065                                  exitown:				
 13066 00001105 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 13067                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13068 00001107 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 13069                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13070                                  					; fi_am_mult
 13071 0000110C 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 13072 0000110E 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13073                                  					; Get logical drive number
 13074                                  					; Get it 1-based
 13075 00001112 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 13076                                  exitnomult:				
 13077 00001114 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 13078 00001118 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 13079                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13080                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13081                                  		; cf=0
 13082                                  		;clc
 13083 0000111B C3                      		retn
