 14397                                  goterr13_xxxx:				
 14398 0000151B 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; ecc error?
 14399 0000151E 75DB                    		jnz	short i13_ret_error ; other error. just	return back.
 14400 00001520 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1 ; formatting?
 14401 00001525 74D4                    		jz	short i13_ret_error
 14402                                  
 14403 00001527 803E[1F00]02            		cmp	byte [prevoper+1], 2
 14404                                  		;cmp	byte ptr ds:prevoper+1,	2 ; ecc-corrected error
 14405                                  					; (2 = romread)
 14406                                  					; ECC correction only applies to reads
 14407 0000152C 75CD                    		jnz	short i13_ret_error
 14408                                  
 14409 0000152E 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 14410                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:15ABh
 14411                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14412 00001530 9A[9707]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14413                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14414                                  					; call far 70:797h
 14415 00001535 A1[1E00]                		mov	ax, [prevoper]
 14416 00001538 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; return code =	no error
 14417 0000153A 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1		; if request for one sector, assume ok
 14418 0000153C 74B7                    		jz	short ret_from_i13 ; return with carry clear
 14419 0000153E 53                      		push	bx
 14420 0000153F 51                      		push	cx
 14421 00001540 52                      		push	dx
 14422 00001541 A2[2000]                		mov	[number_of_sec], al
 14423                                  loop_ecc:				
 14424 00001544 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h	; read one sector
 14425                                  
 14426                                  ; we do reads one sector at a time. this ensures that we will eventually
 14427                                  ; finish the request since ecc errors on one sector do read in that sector.
 14428                                  ;
 14429                                  ; we need to put in some "intelligence" into the ecc handler to handle reads
 14430                                  ; that attempt to read more sectors than are available on a particular
 14431                                  ; track.
 14432                                  ;
 14433                                  ; we call check_wrap to set up the sector #, head # and cylinder # for
 14434                                  ; this request.
 14435                                  ;
 14436                                  ; at this point, all registers are set up for the call to orig13, except
 14437                                  ; that there may be a starting sector number that is bigger than the number
 14438                                  ; of sectors on a track.
 14439                                  ;
 14440 00001547 E88FFE                  		call	check_wrap	; get correct parameters for int 13
 14441                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:15C5h
 14442                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14443 0000154A 9A[9707]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14444                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14445 0000154F 730C                    		jnb	short ok11_op
 14446 00001551 80FC09                  		cmp	ah, 9		; DMA error during ECC read?
 14447 00001554 741B                    		jz	short handle_dma_during_ecc
 14448 00001556 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; only allow ecc errors
 14449 00001559 7510                    		jnz	short ok11_exit_err
 14450                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14451                                  		; xor ax ax -> ah = 0
 14452                                  		;mov	ah, 0		; ecc error. reset the system again.
 14453 0000155B 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; clear	the error code so that if this
 14454                                  					; was the last sector, no error	code
 14455                                  					; will be returned for the corrected
 14456                                  					; read.	(clear carry too.)
 14457                                  ok11_op:				
 14458 0000155D FE0E[2000]              		dec	byte [number_of_sec]
 14459 00001561 7409                    		jz	short ok11_exit	; all done?
 14460 00001563 FEC1                    		inc	cl		; advance sector number
 14461                                  					; add 200h to address
 14462 00001565 FEC7                    		inc	bh
 14463 00001567 FEC7                    		inc	bh
 14464 00001569 EBD9                    		jmp	short loop_ecc
 14465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14466                                  
 14467                                  ; locate error returns centrally
 14468                                  
 14469                                  ok11_exit_err:				
 14470 0000156B F9                      		stc			; set carry bit again.
 14471                                  ok11_exit:				
 14472 0000156C 5A                      		pop	dx
 14473 0000156D 59                      		pop	cx
 14474 0000156E 5B                      		pop	bx
 14475 0000156F EB88                    		jmp	short i13ret_ck_chglinerr
 14476                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14477                                  
 14478                                  ; do the single sector read again, this time into our temporary
 14479                                  ; buffer, which is guaranteed not to have a DMA error, then
 14480                                  ; move the data to its proper location and proceed
 14481                                  
 14482                                  handle_dma_during_ecc:			
 14483 00001571 06                      		push	es
 14484 00001572 53                      		push	bx
 14485 00001573 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector
 14486 00001576 1E                      		push	ds
 14487 00001577 07                      		pop	es		; point es:bx to buffer
 14488 00001578 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h	; read one sector
 14489                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:15F8h
 14490                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14491 0000157B 9A[9707]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14492                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14493 00001580 5B                      		pop	bx
 14494 00001581 07                      		pop	es
 14495 00001582 7305                    		jnb	short handle_dma_during_ecc_noerr
 14496 00001584 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h
 14497 00001587 75E2                    		jnz	short ok11_exit_err ; if anything but ecc error, bomb out
 14498                                  
 14499                                  ; now we're kosher. Copy the data to where it belongs and resume
 14500                                  ; the ECC looping code.
 14501                                  
 14502                                  handle_dma_during_ecc_noerr:		
 14503 00001589 56                      		push	si
 14504 0000158A 57                      		push	di
 14505 0000158B 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
 14506 0000158D BE[4E01]                		mov	si, disksector
 14507 00001590 E82BFE                  		call	move_sector
 14508 00001593 5F                      		pop	di
 14509 00001594 5E                      		pop	si
 14510 00001595 EBC6                    		jmp	short ok11_op
 14511                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14512                                  
 14513                                  ; we truly have a dma violation. restore register ax and retry the
 14514                                  ; operation as best we can.
 14515                                  
 14516                                  gotdmaerr:				
 14517 00001597 A1[1E00]                		mov	ax, [prevoper]	; 19/10/2022
 14518 0000159A FB                      		sti
 14519 0000159B 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 14520 0000159E 723B                    		jb	short i13_done_dmaerr
 14521                                  					; just pass dma error thru for
 14522                                  					; functions we don't handle
 14523 000015A0 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 14524 000015A3 743C                    		jz	short intverify
 14525 000015A5 80FC05                  		cmp	ah, 5		; romformat
 14526 000015A8 7448                    		jz	short intformat
 14527 000015AA 772F                    		ja	short i13_done_dmaerr
 14528                                  
 14529                                  ; we are doing a read/write call. check for dma problems
 14530                                  
 14531                                  ;	******** set up stack frame here!!! ********
 14532                                  
 14533 000015AC 52                      		push	dx
 14534 000015AD 51                      		push	cx
 14535 000015AE 53                      		push	bx
 14536 000015AF 50                      		push	ax
 14537 000015B0 55                      		push	bp
 14538 000015B1 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
 14539 000015B3 8CC2                    		mov	dx, es		; check	for 64k	boundary error
 14540 000015B5 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 14541 000015B7 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 14542 000015B9 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 14543 000015BB D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1		; segment converted to absolute	address
 14544 000015BD 01DA                    		add	dx, bx		; combine with offset
 14545 000015BF 81C2FF01                		add	dx, 511		; simulate a transfer
 14546                                  
 14547                                  ; if carry is set, then we are within 512 bytes of the end of the segment.
 14548                                  ; we skip the first transfer and perform the remaining buffering and transfer
 14549                                  
 14550 000015C3 7303                    		jnb	short no_skip_first
 14551 000015C5 E98300                  		jmp	bufferx		; restore dh=head & do buffer
 14552                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14553                                  
 14554                                  no_skip_first:				
 14555 000015C8 D0EE                    		shr	dh, 1		; dh = number of sectors before	address
 14556 000015CA B480                    		mov	ah, 128		; ah = max number of sectors in	segment
 14557 000015CC 28F4                    		sub	ah, dh
 14558                                  
 14559                                  ; ah is now the number of sectors that we can successfully write in this
 14560                                  ; segment. if this number is above or equal to the requested number, then we
 14561                                  ; continue the operation as normal. otherwise, we break it into pieces.
 14562                                  ;
 14563                                  ; wait a sec. this is goofy. the whole reason we got here in the
 14564                                  ; first place is because we got a dma error. so it's impossible
 14565                                  ; for the whole block to fit, unless the dma error was returned
 14566                                  ; in error.
 14567                                  
 14568 000015CE 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; can we fit it	in?
 14569 000015D0 7236                    		jb	short doblock	; no, perform blocking.
 14570                                  
 14571                                  ; yes, the request fits. let it happen.
 14572                                  
 14573 000015D2 8A7609                  		mov	dh, [bp+9]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx+1]
 14574                                  					; set up head number
 14575 000015D5 E888FE                  		call	doint
 14576 000015D8 E9D900                  		jmp	bad13		; and return from this place
 14577                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14578                                  
 14579                                  i13_done_dmaerr:			
 14580 000015DB B409                    		mov	ah, 9		; pass dma error thru to caller
 14581 000015DD F9                      		stc
 14582 000015DE E914FF                  		jmp	ret_from_i13	; return with error,
 14583                                  					; we know it's not a changeline error
 14584                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14585                                  
 14586                                  ; verify the given sectors. place the buffer pointer into our space.
 14587                                  
 14588                                  intverify:				
 14589 000015E1 06                      		push	es		; save caller's dma address
 14590 000015E2 53                      		push	bx
 14591 000015E3 1E                      		push	ds		; es:bx	-> Bios_Data:disksector
 14592 000015E4 07                      		pop	es
 14593                                  dosimple:				
 14594 000015E5 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector
 14595                                  					; do the i/o from Bios_Data:disksector
 14596                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:1665h
 14597                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14598 000015E8 9A[9707]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14599                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14600 000015ED 5B                      		pop	bx
 14601 000015EE 07                      		pop	es
 14602 000015EF E907FF                  		jmp	i13ret_ck_chglinerr
 14603                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14604                                  
 14605                                  ; format operation. copy the parameter table into Bios_Data:disksector
 14606                                  
 14607                                  intformat:				
 14608 000015F2 06                      		push	es
 14609 000015F3 53                      		push	bx
 14610 000015F4 56                      		push	si
 14611 000015F5 57                      		push	di
 14612 000015F6 1E                      		push	ds
 14613                                  
 14614                                  ; point ds to the caller's dma buffer, es to Bios_Data
 14615                                  ; in other words, swap (ds, es)
 14616                                  
 14617 000015F7 06                      		push	es
 14618 000015F8 1E                      		push	ds
 14619 000015F9 07                      		pop	es
 14620 000015FA 1F                      		pop	ds
 14621 000015FB 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
 14622 000015FD BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector
 14623 00001600 E8BBFD                  		call	move_sector	; user's data into Bios_Data:disksector
 14624 00001603 1F                      		pop	ds
 14625 00001604 5F                      		pop	di
 14626 00001605 5E                      		pop	si		; do the i/o from
 14627 00001606 EBDD                    		jmp	short dosimple	; Bios_Data:disksector
 14628                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14629                                  
 14630                                  ; we can't fit the request into the entire block. perform the operation on
 14631                                  ; the first block.
 14632                                  ;
 14633                                  ; doblock is modified to correctly handle multi-sector disk i/o.
 14634                                  ; old doblock had added the number of sectors i/oed (ah in old doblock) after
 14635                                  ; the doint call to cl. observing only the lower 6 bits of cl(=max. 64) can
 14636                                  ; represent a starting sector, if ah was big, then cl would be clobbered.
 14637                                  ; by the way, we still are going to use cl for this purpose since checkwrap
 14638                                  ; routine will use it as an input. to prevent cl from being clobbered, a
 14639                                  ; safe number of sectors should be calculated like "63 - # of sectors/track".
 14640                                  ; doblock will handle the first block of requested sectors within the
 14641                                  ; boundary of this safe value.
 14642                                  
 14643                                  doblock:
 14644                                  
 14645                                  ; try to get the # of sectors/track from bds via rom drive number.
 14646                                  ; for any mini disks installed, here we have to pray that they have the
 14647                                  ; same # of sector/track as the main dos partition disk drive.
 14648                                  				
 14649 00001608 8B5608                  		mov	dx, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 14650                                  					; get head #, drive #
 14651 0000160B 51                      		push	cx
 14652 0000160C 06                      		push	es
 14653 0000160D 57                      		push	di		; ah - # of sectors before dma boundary
 14654                                  					; al - requested # of sectors for i/o.
 14655 0000160E E83BFE                  		call	find_bds
 14656 00001611 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14657                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14658 00001615 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 14659                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags],fnon_removable
 14660 0000161A 5F                      		pop	di
 14661 0000161B 07                      		pop	es
 14662 0000161C 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; set al=ah for	floppies
 14663 0000161E 7404                    		jz	short doblockflop ; they are track by track operation
 14664 00001620 B43F                    		mov	ah, 63		; ah = 63-secpt	(# safe	sectors??)
 14665 00001622 28CC                    		sub	ah, cl		; al - # of sectors before dma boundary
 14666                                  doblockflop:				
 14667 00001624 59                      		pop	cx
 14668                                  doblockcontinue:			
 14669 00001625 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; if safe_# >= #_of_sectors_to_go_before dma,
 14670 00001627 7305                    		jnb	short doblocklast ; then #_of_sectors_to_go as it is for doint.
 14671 00001629 50                      		push	ax
 14672 0000162A 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; otherwise, set al to ah to operate.
 14673 0000162C EB03                    		jmp	short doblockdoint
 14674                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14675                                  
 14676                                  doblocklast:				
 14677 0000162E 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 14678 00001630 50                      		push	ax
 14679                                  doblockdoint:				; let ah = al =	# of sectors for this shot	
 14680 00001631 E82CFE                  		call	doint
 14681 00001634 727E                    		jb	short bad13	; something happened, bye!
 14682 00001636 58                      		pop	ax
 14683 00001637 286602                  		sub	[bp+2],	ah	; sub [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax], ah
 14684                                  					; decrement by the successful operation
 14685 0000163A 00E1                    		add	cl, ah		; advance sector #. safety gauranteed.
 14686 0000163C 00E7                    		add	bh, ah		; advance dma addres
 14687 0000163E 00E7                    		add	bh, ah		; twice	for 512	byte sectors
 14688 00001640 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; check	the previous value
 14689 00001642 740A                    		jz	short buffer	; if #_of_sectors_to_go	< safe_#,
 14690                                  					; then we are done already.
 14691 00001644 28E0                    		sub	al, ah		; otherwise,
 14692                                  					; #_sector_to_go = #_of_sector_to_go - safe_#
 14693 00001646 E890FD                  		call	check_wrap	; get new cx, dh for the next operation.
 14694 00001649 EBDA                    		jmp	short doblockcontinue ;	handles	next sectors left.
 14695                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14696                                  
 14697                                  bufferx:				
 14698 0000164B 8A7609                  		mov	dh, [bp+9]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx+1]
 14699                                  					; set up head number
 14700                                  buffer:					
 14701 0000164E 53                      		push	bx
 14702 0000164F 8A6603                  		mov	ah, [bp+3]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax+1]
 14703 00001652 80FC03                  		cmp	ah, 3		; romwrite
 14704 00001655 7525                    		jnz	short doread	;
 14705                                  					
 14706                                  ; copy the offending sector into local buffer
 14707                                  
 14708 00001657 06                      		push	es
 14709 00001658 1E                      		push	ds
 14710 00001659 56                      		push	si
 14711 0000165A 57                      		push	di
 14712 0000165B 1E                      		push	ds		; exchange segment registers
 14713 0000165C 06                      		push	es
 14714 0000165D 1F                      		pop	ds
 14715 0000165E 07                      		pop	es
 14716 0000165F BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; where to move
 14717 00001662 57                      		push	di		; save it
 14718 00001663 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; source
 14719 00001665 E856FD                  		call	move_sector	; move sector into local buffer
 14720 00001668 5B                      		pop	bx		; new transfer address
 14721                                  					; (es:bx = Bios_Data:diskbuffer)
 14722 00001669 5F                      		pop	di		; restore caller's di & si
 14723 0000166A 5E                      		pop	si
 14724 0000166B 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore Bios_Data
 14725                                  
 14726                                  ; see if we are wrapping around a track or head
 14727                                  
 14728 0000166C B001                    		mov	al, 1		; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 14729                                  					; get drive number
 14730 0000166E 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]
 14731 00001671 E865FD                  		call	check_wrap	; sets up registers if wrap-around
 14732                                  					;
 14733                                  					; ah is	function
 14734                                  					; al is	1 for single sector transfer
 14735                                  					; es:bx	is local transfer addres
 14736                                  					; cx is	track/sector number
 14737                                  					; dx is	head/drive number
 14738                                  					; si,di	unchanged
 14739 00001674 E8E9FD                  		call	doint
 14740 00001677 07                      		pop	es		; restore caller's dma segment
 14741 00001678 723A                    		jb	short bad13	; go clean up
 14742 0000167A EB22                    		jmp	short dotail
 14743                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14744                                  
 14745                                  ; reading a sector. do int first, then move things around
 14746                                  
 14747                                  doread:					
 14748 0000167C 06                      		push	es
 14749 0000167D 53                      		push	bx
 14750 0000167E 1E                      		push	ds		; es = Bios_Code
 14751 0000167F 07                      		pop	es
 14752 00001680 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector
 14753 00001683 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 14754 00001685 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 14755                                  					; get drive number
 14756 00001688 E84EFD                  		call	check_wrap	;
 14757                                  					; ah = function
 14758                                  					; al = 1 for single sector
 14759                                  					; es:bx	points to local	buffer
 14760                                  					; cx, dx are track/sector, head/drive
 14761 0000168B E8D2FD                  		call	doint
 14762 0000168E 5B                      		pop	bx
 14763 0000168F 07                      		pop	es
 14764 00001690 7222                    		jb	short bad13
 14765 00001692 56                      		push	si
 14766 00001693 57                      		push	di
 14767 00001694 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
 14768 00001696 BE[4E01]                		mov	si, disksector
 14769 00001699 E822FD                  		call	move_sector
 14770 0000169C 5F                      		pop	di
 14771 0000169D 5E                      		pop	si
 14772                                  
 14773                                  ; note the fact that we've done 1 more sector
 14774                                  
 14775                                  dotail:					
 14776 0000169E 5B                      		pop	bx		; retrieve new dma area
 14777 0000169F 80C702                  		add	bh, 2		; advance over sector
 14778 000016A2 41                      		inc	cx
 14779 000016A3 8A4602                  		mov	al, [bp+2]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax]
 14780 000016A6 F8                      		clc
 14781 000016A7 FEC8                    		dec	al
 14782 000016A9 7409                    		jz	short bad13	; no more i/o
 14783                                  
 14784                                  ; see if we wrap around a track or head boundary with starting sector
 14785                                  ; we already have the correct head number to pass to check_wrap
 14786                                  
 14787 000016AB 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 14788 000016AE E828FD                  		call	check_wrap
 14789 000016B1 E8ACFD                  		call	doint
 14790                                  
 14791                                  ; we are done. ax has the final code; we throw away what we got before
 14792                                  
 14793                                  ; M046  -- okay gang. Now we've either terminated our DMA loop,
 14794                                  ;	   or we've finished. If carry is set now, our only
 14795                                  ;	   hope for salvation is that it was a read operation
 14796                                  ;	   and the error code is ECC error. In that case, we'll
 14797                                  ;	   just pop the registers and go do the old ECC thing.
 14798                                  ;	   When the DMA error that got us here in the first
 14799                                  ;	   place occurs, it'll handle it.
 14800                                  
 14801                                  bad13:					
 14802 000016B4 89EC                    		mov	sp, bp
 14803 000016B6 5D                      		pop	bp
 14804 000016B7 5B                      		pop	bx
 14805 000016B8 5B                      		pop	bx
 14806 000016B9 59                      		pop	cx
 14807 000016BA 5A                      		pop	dx
 14808 000016BB 7203                    		jb	short xgoterr13_xxxx ; go handle ECC errors
 14809 000016BD E935FE                  		jmp	ret_from_i13	; non-error exit
 14810                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14811                                  
 14812                                  xgoterr13_xxxx:				
 14813 000016C0 E958FE                  		jmp	goterr13_xxxx
 14814                                  
 14815                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14816                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14817                                  		;db 	0
 14818                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14819                                  
 14820                                  ;Bios_Code ends

 14837                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14838                                  
 14839                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14840                                  ; install_bds installs a bds at location es:di into the current linked list of
 14841                                  ; bds maintained by this device driver. it places the bds at the end of the
 14842                                  ; list. Trashes (at least) ax, bx, di, si
 14843                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14844                                  
 14845                                  install_bds:		
 14846 000016CF 1E                      		push	ds		; save Bios_Data segment
 14847 000016D0 BE[1901]                		mov	si, start_bds	; beginning of chain
 14848                                  
 14849                                  		; ds:si now points to link to first bds
 14850                                  		; assume bds list is non-empty
 14851                                  loop_next_bds:				
 14852 000016D3 C534                    		lds	si, [si]	; [si+BDS.link]
 14853                                  					; fetch	next bds
 14854 000016D5 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14855 000016D9 384404                  		cmp	[si+4],	al	; does this one	share a	physical
 14856                                  					; drive	with new one?
 14857 000016DC 7518                    		jnz	short next_bds
 14858 000016DE B310                    		mov	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 14859 000016E0 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14860                                  					; set both of them to i_am_mult	if so
 14861 000016E4 085C23                  		or	[si+23h], bl	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14862 000016E7 26806523DF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0DFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags],~fi_own_physical
 14863                                  					; we don't own it
 14864 000016EC 8A5C23                  		mov	bl, [si+23h]	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14865                                  					; determine if changeline available
 14866 000016EF 80E302                  		and	bl, 2		; fchangeline
 14867 000016F2 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14868                                  next_bds:				
 14869                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14870 000016F6 B8FFFF                  		mov	ax, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14871 000016F9 3904                    		cmp	[si], ax	; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14872                                  		;cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14873                                  					; are we at end	of list?
 14874 000016FB 75D6                    		jnz	short loop_next_bds
 14875 000016FD 8C4402                  		mov	[si+2], es	; [si+BDS.link+2],es
 14876                                  					; install bds
 14877 00001700 893C                    		mov	[si], di
 14878 00001702 268905                  		mov	[es:di], ax	; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14879                                  		;mov	word [es:di], 0FFFFh ; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14880                                  					; set next pointer to null
 14881 00001705 1F                      		pop	ds
 14882                                  
 14883                                  ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 6.0 Code)
 14884                                  ;
 14885                                  ; **** If the new drive has a higher EOT value, we must alter the
 14886                                  ;      'eot' variable appropriately.
 14887                                  ;
 14888                                  ;		; 01/06/2019
 14889                                  ;		;mov	al,[es:di+52]
 14890                                  ;		mov	al,[es:di+BDS.rsecpertrack]
 14891                                  ;
 14892                                  ;		cmp	al,[eot]
 14893                                  ;		jbe	short _eot_ok
 14894                                  ;		mov	[eot],al
 14895                                  
 14896 00001706 C3                      		retn

 14987                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
