 14989                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14990                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14991                                  
 14992                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14993 00001749 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14994 0000174B 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14994 00001754 736B6574746520666F-
 14994 0000175D 7220647269766520   
 14995                                  
 14996                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14997 00001765 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14997 0000176E 65737320616E79206B-
 14997 00001777 6579207768656E2072-
 14997 00001780 656164790D0A       
 14998 00001786 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14999                                  
 15000                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15001                                  
 15002                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15003                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15004                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15005                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15006                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15007                                  
 15008                                  chkopcnt:		
 15009 00001788 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15010 0000178D C3                      		retn
 15011                                  
 15012                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15013                                  
 15014                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15015                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15016                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15017                                  ;
 15018                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15019                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15020                                  
 15021                                  mediacheck:	
 15022 0000178E E8A9F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15023 00001791 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15024 00001793 E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15025 00001796 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15026 00001798 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15027 0000179B 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15028 0000179D 50                      		push	ax
 15029 0000179E 52                      		push	dx
 15030 0000179F 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15031                                  					; set logical drive number
 15032 000017A3 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15033 000017A5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15034                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15035                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15036 000017A7 5A                      		pop	dx
 15037 000017A8 58                      		pop	ax
 15038 000017A9 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15039 000017AB BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15040                                  
 15041                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15042                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15043                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15044                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15045                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15046                                  ; status.
 15047                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15048 000017AE 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15049 000017B2 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15050                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15051                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15052                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15053                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15054 000017B6 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15055                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15056                                  
 15057                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15058                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15059                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15060                                  
 15061 000017B8 50                      		push	ax
 15062 000017B9 51                      		push	cx
 15063 000017BA 52                      		push	dx
 15064 000017BB E895ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15065 000017BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 15066 000017BF 59                      		pop	cx
 15067 000017C0 58                      		pop	ax
 15068 000017C1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15069 000017C3 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15070                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15071 000017C5 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15072                                  mediaret:				
 15073 000017C7 C3                      		retn
 15074                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15075                                  
 15076                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15077                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15078                                  ; or write.
 15079                                  
 15080                                  mediadovolid:				
 15081 000017C8 E82DEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15082 000017CB 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15083 000017CD E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15084 000017D0 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15085 000017D2 E9F8F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15086                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15087                                  
 15088                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15089                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15090                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15091                                  ; dos.
 15092                                  ;
 15093                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15094                                  
 15095                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15096                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15097                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15098                                  
 15099                                  checklatchio:	
 15100                                  
 15101                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15102                                  			
 15103 000017D5 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15104 000017D8 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15105                                  
 15106                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15107                                  
 15108 000017DA E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15109 000017DD 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15110                                  
 15111                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15112                                  ; expensive verification.
 15113                                  
 15114 000017DF E816EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15115 000017E2 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15116 000017E4 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15117 000017E7 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15118 000017E9 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15119 000017EB 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15120 000017ED E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15121                                  checklatchret:				
 15122 000017F0 E8DAF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15123                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15124 000017F3 F9                      		stc
 15125 000017F4 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15126                                  checkret:				
 15127 000017F5 C3                      		retn
 15128                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15129                                  
 15130                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15131                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15132                                  ;
 15133                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15134                                  
 15135                                  checkfatvid:				
 15136 000017F6 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15137 000017F9 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15138 000017FB 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15139                                  
 15140                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15141                                  
 15142                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15143                                  
 15144                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15145                                  
 15146                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15147                                  ;
 15148                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15149                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15150                                  ;
 15151                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15152                                  ;
 15153                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15154                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15155                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15156                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15157                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15158                                  ;
 15159                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15160                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15161                                  ; routine.)
 15162                                  ;
 15163                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15164                                  
 15165                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15166                                  check_vid:
 15167                                  
 15168                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15169                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15170                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15171                                  
 15172 000017FD 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15173                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15174                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15175 00001802 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15176 00001804 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15177 00001807 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15178 00001809 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15179 0000180B 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15180                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15181 00001810 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15182                                  					; if not fat system
 15183 00001812 E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15184 00001815 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15185 00001817 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15186 0000181A BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15187                                  					; definitely changed
 15188 0000181D 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15189                                  
 15190 0000181F 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15191                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15192 00001820 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15193                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15194                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15195                                  		;clc
 15196                                  checkfatret:				
 15197 00001823 C3                      		retn
 15198                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15199                                  
 15200                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15201                                  changed_drv:
 15202 00001824 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15203 00001825 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15204                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15205 0000182A C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15206                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15207                                  
 15208                                  ; extended id check
 15209                                  
 15210                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15211                                  
 15212                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15213                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15214                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15215                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15216                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15217                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15218                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15219                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15220                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15221                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15222                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15223                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15224                                  ;
 15225                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15226                                  
 15227                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15228                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 15229 0000182B 50                      		push	ax
 15230                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15231                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15232 0000182C A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15233                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15234 0000182F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15235 00001831 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15236 00001835 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15237 00001837 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15238 0000183A 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15239 0000183E 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15240                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15241                                  					; don't know
 15242 00001840 58                      		pop	ax
 15243 00001841 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15244                                  					; reset the flag
 15245                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15246                                  
 15247                                  ext_changed:
 15248 00001843 58                      		pop	ax
 15249                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15250 00001844 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15251                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15252                                  					; disk changed!
 15253                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15254                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15255                                  		;clc
 15256 00001845 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15257                                  
 15258                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15259                                  
 15260                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15261                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15262                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15263                                  ;
 15264                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15265                                  
 15266                                  checkio:				
 15267 00001847 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15268 0000184A 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15269 0000184C E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15270 0000184F 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15271 00001851 E8A4ED                  		call	GetBp
 15272 00001854 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15273 00001856 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15274 00001859 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15275 0000185B 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15276 0000185D 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15277 0000185F 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15278 00001860 C3                      		retn
 15279                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15280                                  
 15281                                  checkioerr:				
 15282 00001861 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15283                                  
 15284                                  checkioret:				
 15285 00001864 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15286 00001865 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15287                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15288                                  
 15289                                  no_error_map:				
 15290 00001868 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15291                                  
 15292                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15293                                  
 15294                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15295                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15296                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15297                                  
 15298                                  returnvid:		
 15299 0000186B BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15300                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15301 0000186E E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15302 00001871 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15303 00001873 F9                      		stc
 15304 00001874 C3                      		retn
 15305                                  
 15306                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15307                                  
 15308                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15309                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15310                                  ;
 15311                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15312                                  ; **trashes si**
 15313                                  
 15314                                  media_set_vid:				
 15315 00001875 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15316                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15317                                  
 15318                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15319                                  
 15320                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15321                                  
 15322                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15323                                  
 15324                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15325                                  vid_into_packet:
 15326 00001878 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15327 00001879 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15328 0000187D 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15329 00001880 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15330 00001882 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15331 00001885 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15332 00001888 1F                      		pop	ds
 15333                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15334 00001889 C3                      		retn
 15335                                  
 15336                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15337                                  
 15338                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15339                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15340                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15341                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15342                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15343                                  ;
 15344                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15345                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15346                                  ;
 15347                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15348                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15349                                  ;		carry set
 15350                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15351                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15352                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15353                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15354                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15355                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15356                                  ;
 15357                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15358                                  
 15359                                  hidensity:
 15360                                  
 15361                                  ; check for correct drive
 15362                                  		
 15363                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15364 0000188A 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15365                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15366                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15367 0000188F 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15368                                  
 15369                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15370                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15371                                  
 15372 00001891 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15373 00001896 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15374                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15375                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15376 00001898 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15377 0000189B 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15378                                  
 15379                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15380                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15381                                  
 15382                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15383 0000189D 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15384 000018A1 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15385                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15386                                  					; ffOther
 15387 000018A3 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15388 000018A5 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15389                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15390                                  					; ff288
 15391 000018A7 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15392 000018A9 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15393 000018AB BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15394                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15395                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15396 000018AE B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15397                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15398                                  					; 2 sides
 15399                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15400 000018B1 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15401 000018B2 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15402                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15403                                  					; & head max
 15404                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15405 000018B5 E9B2ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15406                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15407                                  
 15408                                  Is720K:
 15409                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15410 000018B8 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15411                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15412 000018B9 E975ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15413                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15414                                  
 15415                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15416                                  ;dofloppy:
 15417                                  		;retn
 15418                                  
 15419                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15420                                  
 15421                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15422                                  
 15423                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15424                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15425                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15426                                  ;
 15427                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15428                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15429                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15430                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15431                                  ;
 15432                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15433                                  ;
 15434                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15435                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15436                                  
 15437                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15438 000018BC 06                      		push	es
 15439 000018BD 57                      		push	di
 15440                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15441                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15442 000018BE C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15443                                  
 15444                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15445                                  
 15446                                  scan_bds:				
 15447 000018C2 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15448 000018C6 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15449                                  
 15450                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15451                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15452                                  
 15453 000018C8 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15454                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15455                                  get_next_bds:				
 15456 000018CC 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15457                                  					; go to	next bds
 15458 000018CF 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15459 000018D2 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15460 000018D4 5F                      		pop	di
 15461 000018D5 07                      		pop	es
 15462 000018D6 C3                      		retn
 15463                                  
 15464                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15465                                  
 15466                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15467                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15468                                  ;
 15469                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15470                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15471                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15472                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15473                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15474                                  
 15475                                  checkromchange:	
 15476                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15477                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15478 000018D7 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15479                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15480                                  					; fchanged
 15481 000018DC C3                      		retn
 15482                                  
 15483                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15484                                  
 15485                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15486                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15487                                  ;
 15488                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15489                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15490                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15491                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15492                                  
 15493                                  resetchanged:	
 15494                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15495                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15496 000018DD 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15497                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15498                                  					; ~fchanged
 15499 000018E2 C3                      		retn
 15500                                  
 15501                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15502                                  
 15503                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15504                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15505                                  ;
 15506                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15507                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15508                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15509                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15510                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15511                                  
 15512                                  haschange:
 15513                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15514                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15515 000018E3 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15516                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15517                                  					; fchangeline
 15518 000018E8 C3                      		retn
 15519                                  
 15520                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15521                                  
 15522                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15523                                  
 15524                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15525                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15526                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15527                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15528                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15529                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15530                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15531                                  
 15532                                  ; set_volume_id
 15533                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15534                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15535                                  ;
 15536                                  ;   on entry:
 15537                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15538                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15539                                  ;
 15540                                  ;   on exit:
 15541                                  ;	carry clear:
 15542                                  ;	   successful call
 15543                                  ;	carry set
 15544                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15545                                  
 15546                                  set_volume_id:				
 15547 000018E9 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15548 000018EA 50                      		push	ax
 15549 000018EB E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15550 000018EE 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15551 000018F0 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15552 000018F3 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15553 000018F5 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15554 000018F8 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15555                                  setvret:				
 15556                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15557                                  		; cf = 0
 15558                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15559 000018FB 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15560 000018FC 5A                      		pop	dx
 15561 000018FD C3                      		retn
 15562                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15563                                  
 15564                                  seterr:					
 15565 000018FE 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15566 000018FF 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15567 00001900 C3                      		retn
 15568                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15569 00001901 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15570                                  
 15571                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15572                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15573                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15574                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15575                                  
 15576                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15577                                  
 15578                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15579                                  
 15580                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15581                                  ;
 15582                                  ;   on entry:
 15583                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15584                                  ;
 15585                                  ;   on exit:
 15586                                  ;	carry clear
 15587                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15588                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15589                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15590                                  ;
 15591                                  ;	carry set:
 15592                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15593                                  
 15594                                  read_volume_id:
 15595 00001903 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15596 00001904 51                      		push	cx
 15597 00001905 53                      		push	bx
 15598 00001906 50                      		push	ax
 15599 00001907 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15600 00001908 57                      		push	di
 15601 00001909 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15602 0000190A 07                      		pop	es
 15603 0000190B BF[0909]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15604 0000190E BE[FD08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15605 00001911 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15606 00001914 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15607 00001916 5F                      		pop	di
 15608 00001917 07                      		pop	es
 15609 00001918 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15610                                  					; # of fats
 15611 0000191C 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15612                                  					; sectors / fat
 15613 00001920 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15614 00001922 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15615                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15616                                  					;
 15617                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15618                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15619 00001926 2EA3[0119]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15620                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15621                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15622 0000192A 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15623                                  					; # root dir entries
 15624 0000192E B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15625 00001930 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15626                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15627                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15628 00001932 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15629                                  next_sec:				
 15630 00001933 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15631 00001934 2EA1[0119]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15632                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15633                                  					; get sector #
 15634 00001938 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15635                                  					; sectors / track
 15636 0000193C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15637 0000193E F7F1                    		div	cx
 15638                                  
 15639                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15640                                  
 15641 00001940 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15642                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15643 00001941 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15644 00001943 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15645 00001945 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15646                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15647 00001949 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15648 0000194B 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15649 0000194D E828EE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15650                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15651 00001950 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15652 00001952 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15653 00001955 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15654                                  fvid_loop:
 15655                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15656 00001957 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0
 15657                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15658 00001959 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15659 0000195B 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15660 0000195E 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15661 00001960 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15662 00001963 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15663                                  ent_loop:				
 15664 00001965 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15665 00001968 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15666 0000196A 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15667 0000196B 2EFF06[0119]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15668                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15669                                  					; next sector
 15670 00001970 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15671                                  notfound:
 15672                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15673                                  		;xor	si, si
 15674 00001972 EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15675                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15676                                  
 15677                                  found_vid:
 15678                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15679                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  				
 15680 00001974 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15681 00001975 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15682 00001977 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15683 00001978 57                      		push	di
 15684 00001979 1E                      		push	ds
 15685 0000197A 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15686 0000197B BF[0909]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15687 0000197E B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15688                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15689 00001981 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15690                                  		;xor	al, al
 15691                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15692 00001983 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15693 00001984 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15694                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15695                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15696                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15697 00001985 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15698 00001986 07                      		pop	es
 15699                                  fvid_ret:
 15700                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15701 00001987 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15702                                  				
 15703 00001989 58                      		pop	ax
 15704                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15705                                  		; cf = 0
 15706                                  		;clc
 15707                                  rvidret:
 15708 0000198A 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15709 0000198B 59                      		pop	cx
 15710 0000198C 5A                      		pop	dx
 15711 0000198D C3                      		retn
 15712                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15713                                  
 15714                                  no_vid:
 15715 0000198E 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15716                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15717                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15718 0000198F EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15719                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15720                                  
 15721                                  readviderr:				
 15722 00001991 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15723 00001992 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15724 00001993 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15725                                  
 15726                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15727                                  
 15728                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15729                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15730                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15731 00001995 BE[0909]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15732                                  		;
 15733                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15734                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15735                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15736                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15737 00001998 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15738 0000199B B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15739                                  		;
 15740 0000199E FC                      		cld
 15741 0000199F C3                      		retn
 15742                                  
 15743                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15744                                  
 15745                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15746                                  ;
 15747                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15748                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15749                                  
 15750                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15751 000019A0 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15752 000019A1 56                      		push	si
 15753 000019A2 51                      		push	cx
 15754                                  		
 15755                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15756                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15757                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15758                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15759                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15760                                  		;cld
 15761                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15762 000019A3 E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15763                                  
 15764 000019A6 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15765 000019A8 59                      		pop	cx
 15766 000019A9 5E                      		pop	si
 15767 000019AA 5F                      		pop	di
 15768 000019AB C3                      		retn
 15769                                  
 15770                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15771                                  
 15772                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15773                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15774                                  ;
 15775                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15776                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15777                                  
 15778                                  check_volume_id:
 15779 000019AC 57                      		push	di
 15780 000019AD 51                      		push	cx
 15781                                  		
 15782                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15783                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15784                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15785                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15786                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15787                                  		;cld
 15788                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15789 000019AE E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15790                                  
 15791 000019B1 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15792 000019B3 59                      		pop	cx
 15793 000019B4 5F                      		pop	di
 15794 000019B5 C3                      		retn
 15795                                  
 15796                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15797                                  
 15798                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15799                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15800                                  ;
 15801                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15802                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15803                                  ;
 15804                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15805                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15806                                  ;
 15807                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15808                                  
 15809                                  fat_check:		
 15810 000019B6 50                      		push	ax
 15811 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15812 000019B9 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15813 000019BC 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15814                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15815 000019C0 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15816 000019C2 4E                      		dec	si
 15817                                  okret1:					
 15818 000019C3 58                      		pop	ax
 15819 000019C4 C3                      		retn
 15820                                  
 15821                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15822                                  
 15823                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15824                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15825                                  
 15826                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15827                                  
 15828                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15829                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15830                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15831                                  
 15832                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15833                                  
 15834                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15835                                  		;db 0
 15836                                  
 15837                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15838                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15839                                  
 15840                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15841 000019C5 00<rep Bh>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15842                                  %endif
 15843                                  
 15844                                  ;align 16
 15845                                  
 15846                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15847                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15848                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15849                                  BCODEEND:
 15850                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15851                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15852                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15853                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15854                                  
 15855                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 15856                                  
 15857                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15858                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 15859                                  ; ============================================================================
 15860                                  ; end of BIOSCODE
