 31386                                  	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 31387                                  
 31388                                  	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 31389                                  	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 31390                                  
 31391                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31392                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31393                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 31394                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 31395                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31396                                  
 31397                                  bf10:	
 31398                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 31399                                  	jz	short bf30
 31400                                  
 31401                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31402                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31403                                  	jnz	short bf20
 31404                                  
 31405                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31406                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 31407                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 31408                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 31409                                  
 31410                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 31411                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 31412                                  	mov	cx,ax
 31413                                  
 31414                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31415                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 31416                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 31417                                  
 31418                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31419                                  	mov     ax,es
 31420                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31421                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31422                                  	inc     ax
 31423                                  	mov     es,ax
 31424                                  
 31425                                  	jmp	short bf10
 31426                                  
 31427                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 31428                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 31429                                  	or	bx,bx
 31430                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 31431                                  bfE:	
 31432                                  	stc
 31433                                  bfX:
 31434                                  	pop	cx
 31435                                  	pop	bx
 31436                                  	retn
 31437                                  
 31438                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31439                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 31440                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31441                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31442                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 31443                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31444                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31445                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31446                                  
 31447                                  isSpecified:
 31448                                  	push	ax
 31449                                  
 31450                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31451                                  	mov	bl,al
 31452                                  
 31453                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 31454                                  	;
 31455                                  	;push	ds
 31456                                  	;push	cs
 31457                                  	;pop	ds
 31458                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 31459                                  	;pop	ds
 31460                                  	
 31461                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 31462                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 31463                                  
 31464                                  	pop	ax
 31465                                  	retn
 31466                                  
 31467                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31468                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 31469                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31470                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 31471                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 31472                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 31473                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31474                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31475                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 31476                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 31477                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 31478                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 31479                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 31480                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31481                                  
 31482                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 31483                                  
 31484                                  shrinkMCB:
 31485                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 31486                                  	push	bx
 31487                                  	push	cx
 31488                                  	push	es
 31489                                  
 31490                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 31491                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 31492                                  
 31493                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31494                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 31495                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 31496                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 31497                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31498                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 31499                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 31500                                  
 31501                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31502                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31503                                  
 31504                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 31505                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 31506                                  
 31507                                  	add	ax,bx
 31508                                  	inc	ax
 31509                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 31510                                  
 31511                                  	mov	ax,cx
 31512                                  	sub	ax,bx
 31513                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31514                                  	; ax > 0
 31515                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 31516                                  
 31517                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31518                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 31519                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 31520                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 31521                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31522                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 31523                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 31524                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 31525                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 31526                                  
 31527                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31528                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 31529                                  
 31530                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31531                                  	; cf=0
 31532                                  	;clc
 31533                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31534                                  	;jmp	short smX
 31535                                  smE:	
 31536                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31537                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 31538                                  	;stc
 31539                                  smX:	
 31540                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 31541                                  	pop	es
 31542                                  	pop	cx
 31543                                  	pop	bx
 31544                                  	retn
 31545                                  
 31546                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31547                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 31548                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31549                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 31550                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 31551                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31552                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 31553                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31554                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 31555                                  ;
 31556                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 31557                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 31558                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 31559                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 31560                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 31561                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 31562                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 31563                                  ;       Endif
 31564                                  ;    Endif
 31565                                  ; Endif
 31566                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 31567                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 31568                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 31569                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 31570                                  ;    ENDIF
 31571                                  ; ENDIF
 31572                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31573                                  
 31574                                  _hideUMB_:
 31575                                  	push	bx
 31576                                  	push	dx
 31577                                  	push	es
 31578                                  
 31579                                  	mov	al,cl
 31580                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 31581                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31582                                  
 31583                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 31584                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 31585                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 31586                                  
 31587                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 31588                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 31589                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 31590                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 31591                                  
 31592                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 31593                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 31594                                  
 31595                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 31596                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 31597                                  
 31598                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 31599                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 31600                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 31601                                  hu_10:	
 31602                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 31603                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31604                                  
 31605                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 31606                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 31607                                  
 31608                                  	mov	dx,es
 31609                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 31610                                  
 31611                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 31612                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 31613                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 31614                                  
 31615                                  	xor	dx,dx
 31616                                  hu_30:	
 31617                                  	mov	al,cl
 31618                                  
 31619                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 31620                                  
 31621                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 31622                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 31623                                  
 31624                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 31625                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 31626                                  hu_X:	
 31627                                  	pop	es
 31628                                  	pop	dx
 31629                                  	pop	bx
 31630                                  	retn
 31631                                  
 31632                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31633                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 31634                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31635                                  ; Entry:  None
 31636                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 31637                                  ; Error:  None
 31638                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31639                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31640                                  
 31641                                  UnFreeze:
 31642                                  	push	ax
 31643                                  	push	es
 31644                                  
 31645                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31646                                  	jc	short ufX
 31647                                  
 31648                                  	mov	es,ax
 31649                                  
 31650                                  ; ------------------------------
 31651                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31652                                  ; ------------------------------
 31653                                  
 31654                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 31655                                  	jnz	short uf20
 31656                                  	call	unHideMCB
 31657                                  uf20:	
 31658                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31659                                  
 31660                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31661                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31662                                  
 31663                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31664                                  	mov     ax,es
 31665                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31666                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31667                                  	inc     ax
 31668                                  	mov     es,ax
 31669                                  
 31670                                  	jmp	short uf10
 31671                                  ufX:	
 31672                                  	pop	es
 31673                                  	pop	ax
 31674                                  	retn
 31675                                  
 31676                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31677                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 31678                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31679                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31680                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 31681                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31682                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31683                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31684                                  
 31685                                  isFrozMCB:
 31686                                  	;push	ax
 31687                                  
 31688                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 31689                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 31690                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 31691                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31692                                  
 31693                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 31694                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 31695                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31696                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31697                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31698                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 31699                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31700                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31701                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31702                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31703                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31704                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31705                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31706                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31707                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31708                                  ifmX:	
 31709                                  	;pop	ax
 31710                                  	retn
 31711                                  
 31712                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31713                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 31714                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31715                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31716                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 31717                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31718                                  ; USES:     None
 31719                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31720                                  
 31721                                  frezMCB:
 31722                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 31723                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31724                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31725                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31726                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31727                                  	retn
 31728                                  
 31729                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31730                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 31731                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31732                                  ; Entry:  None
 31733                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 31734                                  ; Error:  None
 31735                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31736                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31737                                  
 31738                                  FreezeUM:
 31739                                  	push	ax
 31740                                  	push	cx
 31741                                  	push	dx
 31742                                  	push	es
 31743                                  
 31744                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 31745                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31746                                  
 31747                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 31748                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 31749                                  
 31750                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 31751                                  	mov	es,ax
 31752                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 31753                                  
 31754                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31755                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 31756                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 31757                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 31758                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31759                                  
 31760                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 31761                                  	jnz	short fum20
 31762                                  
 31763                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31764                                  fum20:	
 31765                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 31766                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 31767                                  
 31768                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 31769                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31770                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 31771                                  
 31772                                  	call	frezMCB
 31773                                  fum30:	
 31774                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31775                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31776                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31777                                  
 31778                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31779                                  	mov     ax,es
 31780                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31781                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31782                                  	inc     ax
 31783                                  	mov     es,ax
 31784                                  	
 31785                                  	jmp	short fum10
 31786                                  
 31787                                  fumX:	pop	es
 31788                                  	pop	dx
 31789                                  	pop	cx
 31790                                  	pop	ax
 31791                                  	retn
 31792                                  
 31793                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31794                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 31795                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31796                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31797                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 31798                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31799                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 31800                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31801                                  
 31802                                  UmbTest:
 31803                                  	push	ax
 31804                                  	push	bx
 31805                                  	push	ds
 31806                                  	push	es
 31807                                  
 31808                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 31809                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 31810                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 31811                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 31812                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 31813                                  
 31814                                  	pop	es
 31815                                  	pop	ds
 31816                                  	pop	bx
 31817                                  	pop	ax
 31818                                  	retn
 31819                                  
 31820                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31821                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 31822                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31823                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31824                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 31825                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31826                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31827                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31828                                  
 31829                                  WalkMem:
 31830                                  	push	ax ; ?
 31831                                  	push	bx ; ?
 31832                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 31833                                  		   	
 31834                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31835                                  	int	21h
 31836                                  
 31837                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 31838                                  	mov	es,ax
 31839                                  
 31840                                  ; ------------------------------
 31841                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 31842                                  ; ------------------------------
 31843                                  
 31844                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31845                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 31846                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 31847                                  
 31848                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 31849                                  
 31850                                  	mov     bx,es
 31851                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 31852                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31853                                  	inc     bx
 31854                                  	mov     es,bx
 31855                                  		
 31856                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 31857                                  um20:	
 31858                                  	mov	ax,es
 31859                                  
 31860                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 31861                                  
 31862                                  	pop	es ; ?
 31863                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 31864                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 31865                                  	retn
 31866                                  
 31867                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31868                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 31869                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31870                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31871                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31872                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31873                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31874                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31875                                  
 31876                                  hl_unlink:
 31877                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31878                                  
 31879                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 31880                                  	;
 31881                                  	;push	ds
 31882                                  	;push	cs
 31883                                  	;pop	ds
 31884                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 31885                                  	;pop	ds
 31886                                  
 31887                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 31888                                  
 31889                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31890                                  	int	21h
 31891                                  	retn
 31892                                  
 31893                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31894                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31895                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31896                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31897                                  
 31898                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 31899                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 31900                                  
 31901                                  ;   Modification log:
 31902                                  ;
 31903                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 31904                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 31905                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 31906                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 31907                                  
 31908                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 31909                                  
 31910                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31911                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 31912                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31913                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 31914                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 31915                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 31916                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31917                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 31918                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31919                                  
 31920                                  UnHideUMBs:
 31921                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 31922                                  
 31923                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31924                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 31925                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 31926                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 31927                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 31928                                  ;    every command execution.
 31929                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31930                                  
 31931                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 31932                                  	;
 31933                                  	;push	ds
 31934                                  	;push	cs
 31935                                  	;pop	ds
 31936                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 31937                                  	;pop	ds	
 31938                                  
 31939                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 31940                                  
 31941                                  	or	al,al
 31942                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 31943                                  
 31944                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 31945                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 31946                                  	retn			; that.
 31947                                  uhu10:	
 31948                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 31949                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 31950                                  
 31951                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 31952                                  	;
 31953                                  	;push	es
 31954                                  	;push	cs
 31955                                  	;pop	es
 31956                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 31957                                  	;pop	ds	
 31958                                  
 31959                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 31960                                  
 31961                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 31962                                  
 31963                                  	pop	ax
 31964                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31965                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 31966                                  	retn
 31967                                  
 31968                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31969                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 31970                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31971                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31972                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31973                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31974                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31975                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31976                                  
 31977                                  he_unlink:
 31978                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31979                                  
 31980                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31981                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31982                                  
 31983                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31984                                  	int	21h
 31985                                  	retn
 31986                                  
 31987                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31988                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31989                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31990                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31991                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31992                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31993                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31994                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31995                                  
 31996                                  FreeUMBs:
 31997                                  	push	ax
 31998                                  	push	es
 31999                                  
 32000                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 32001                                  	jc	short fusX
 32002                                  
 32003                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 32004                                  fus10:	
 32005                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32006                                  	jnz	short fus20
 32007                                  	call	freeMCB
 32008                                  fus20:	   
 32009                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32010                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32011                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 32012                                  
 32013                                  	mov	ax,es
 32014                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32015                                  	inc	ax
 32016                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32017                                  
 32018                                  	jmp	short fus10
 32019                                  fusX:	
 32020                                  	pop	es
 32021                                  	pop	ax
 32022                                  	retn
 32023                                  
 32024                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32025                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 32026                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32027                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32028                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 32029                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32030                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32031                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32032                                  
 32033                                  isHideMCB:
 32034                                  	;push	ax
 32035                                  
 32036                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 32037                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 32038                                  
 32039                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 32040                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 32041                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 32042                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 32043                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 32044                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 32045                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 32046                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 32047                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 32048                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 32049                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32050                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 32051                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 32052                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32053                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32054                                  ihm_x:	
 32055                                  	;pop	ax
 32056                                  	retn
 32057                                  
 32058                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32059                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 32060                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32061                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32062                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 32063                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32064                                  ; USES:     AX
 32065                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32066                                  
 32067                                  freeMCB:
 32068                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32069                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 32070                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 32071                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 32072                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 32073                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 32074                                  	retn
 32075                                  
 32076                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32077                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 32078                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32079                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 32080                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 32081                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 32082                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX

 32084                                  
 32085                                  HeadUmb:
 32086                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32087                                  
 32088                                  	;push	si ; ?

 32091                                  	;push	bx ; *
 32092                                  
 32093                                  	; 09/04/2019
 32094                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 32095

 32097                                  	int	21h

 32100                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]

 32102                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh

 32117                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32118                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 32119                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32120                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 32121                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 32122                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32123                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 32124                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32125                                  
 32126                                  linkumb:
 32127                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 32128                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 32129                                  
 32130                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 32131                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 32132                                  
 32133                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 32134                                  	mov	bx,1
 32135                                  	int	21h
 32136                                  lumbX:
 32137                                  	retn

 32141                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 32144                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32145                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991)

 32149                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32150                                  ;
 32151                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 32152                                  ;
 32153                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 32154                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 32155                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 32156                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 32157                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 32158                                  ;
 32159                                  ;	Output : none
 32160                                  ;
 32161                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 32162                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 32163                                  ;
 32164                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32165                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 32166                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 32167                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 32168                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 32169                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32170                                  
 32171                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32172                                  InitDevLoad:
 32173                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32174                                  	; ds = cs
 32175 0000276B 803E[7D1E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 32176                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 32177                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 32178 00002770 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 32179                                  
 32180                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32181                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 32182                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 32183                                  ;
 32184                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 32185                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 32186                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 32187                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 32188                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 32189                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 32190                                  ;
 32191                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 32192                                  ;
 32193                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 32194                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 32195                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 32196                                  ;	pushf
 32197                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 32198                                  ;	popf
 32199                                  ;
 32200                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 32201                                  ;
 32202                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 32203                                  
 32204                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32205                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 32206                                  InitForConv:
 32207                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32208                                  	; ds = cs
 32209 00002772 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 32210                                  					;  current UMB ?
 32211 00002775 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 32212 00002777 E83C04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 32213 0000277A E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 32214 0000277D 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 32215                                  					;  in low memory
 32216                                  InitForHi:
 32217                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32218                                  	; ds = cs
 32219                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 32220                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 32221                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 32222 0000277F A1[731E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 32223 00002782 8B16[6F1E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32224 00002786 0316[711E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 32225 0000278A EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 32226                                  
 32227                                  InitForLo:
 32228                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32229                                  	; ds = cs
 32230                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 32231 0000278C C606[7D1E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 32232                                  initforlo_x:
 32233                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32234                                  	; ds = cs
 32235                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 32236                                  					;  we are loading low
 32237                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 32238                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 32239 00002791 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 32240 00002794 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 32241                                  idl1:
 32242 00002798 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 32243                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32244                                  	; ds = cs
 32245                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 32246                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 32247                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 32248                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 32249 0000279B A3[621E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 32250 0000279E 8916[641E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 32251 000027A2 C706[661E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 32252 000027A8 A3[681E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 32253 000027AB C3                      	retn
 32254                                  
 32255                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32256                                  ;
 32257                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 32258                                  ;
 32259                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 32260                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 32261                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 32262                                  ;		   current UMB
 32263                                  ;
 32264                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32265                                  
 32266                                  SpaceInUMB:
 32267                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32268                                  	; ds = cs
 32269                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 32270                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 32271                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 32272 000027AC A1[711E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 32273 000027AF 0306[6F1E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 32274 000027B3 2B06[731E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 32275                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32276                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 32277                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 32278                                  	;stc
 32279                                  	;retn
 32280                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32281 000027B7 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 32282 000027BA 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 32283                                  spcinumb1:
 32284 000027BC 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 32285                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32286                                  	; ds = cs
 32287 000027BD 3B06[601E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 32288                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 32289                                  spcinumb2:
 32290 000027C1 C3                      	retn
 32291                                  
 32292                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32293                                  ;
 32294                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 32295                                  ;
 32296                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 32297                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 32298                                  ;
 32299                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32300                                  
 32301                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32302                                  ;
 32303                                  ;PrepareMark:
 32304                                  ;	push	ds
 32305                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 32306                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32307                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32308                                  ;	pop	ds
 32309                                  ;
 32310                                  ;	inc	ax
 32311                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32312                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32313                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32314                                  ;	retn
 32315                                  
 32316                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32317                                  ;
 32318                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 32319                                  ;
 32320                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 32321                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 32322                                  ;		 the device.
 32323                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 32324                                  ;
 32325                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 32326                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 32327                                  ;	UMB.
 32328                                  ;
 32329                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 32330                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 32331                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 32332                                  ;
 32333                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32334                                  
 32335                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32336                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 32337                                  
 32338                                  GetUMBForDev:
 32339                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32340                                  	; ds = cs
 32341 000027C2 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 32342 000027C5 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32343 000027C8 CD21                    	int	21h
 32344                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 32345                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 32346                                  
 32347 000027CA 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32348                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 32349                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32350 000027CC 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 32351                                  
 32352 000027CE 4B                      	dec	bx
 32353                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32354                                  	; ds = cs
 32355 000027CF 391E[601E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 32356                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 32357 000027D3 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 32358                                  
 32359 000027D5 43                      	inc	bx
 32360                                  
 32361 000027D6 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32362 000027D9 CD21                    	int	21h
 32363 000027DB 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 32364                                  
 32365                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32366                                  	;dec	ax
 32367                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 32368                                  	;
 32369                                  PrepareMark:
 32370 000027DD 1E                      	push	ds
 32371 000027DE 48                      	dec	ax
 32372 000027DF 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32373 000027E1 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32374 000027E7 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32375 000027ED 40                      	inc	ax
 32376 000027EE 1F                      	pop	ds
 32377                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32378                                  	; ds = cs
 32379                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32380                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32381                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32382                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 32383 000027EF 891E[711E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 32384 000027F3 A3[6F1E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32385 000027F6 A3[731E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32386                                  	;
 32387                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32388                                  	; cf=0
 32389                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 32390 000027F9 C3                      	retn
 32391                                  
 32392                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32393                                  %if 1
 32394                                  gufd_err:
 32395 000027FA 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 32396                                  gufd_error:
 32397 000027FC 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 32398 000027FE F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 32399 000027FF EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 32400                                  %endif
 32401                                  
 32402                                  ; 09/09/2023
 32403                                  %if 0
 32404                                  gufd_err:
 32405                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 32406                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32407                                  	; ds = cs
 32408                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 32409                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32410                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32411                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 32412                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32413                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32414                                  	stc
 32415                                  	retn
 32416                                  %endif

 32418                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32419                                  ;
 32420                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 32421                                  ;
 32422                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 32423                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 32424                                  ;
 32425                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 32426                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 32427                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 32428                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 32429                                  ;
 32430                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 32431                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 32432                                  ;
 32433                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32434                                  
 32435                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32436                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 32437                                  
 32438                                  DevSetMark:
 32439 00002801 06                      	push	es
 32440 00002802 57                      	push	di
 32441 00002803 1E                      	push	ds
 32442 00002804 56                      	push	si
 32443 00002805 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32444 00002807 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 32445 0000280D 40                      	inc	ax
 32446 0000280E 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 32447                                  
 32448                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 32449                                  
 32450 00002812 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 32451                                  	
 32452                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32453                                  	; ds = cs
 32454                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 32455 00002813 C536[F803]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 32456                                  
 32457 00002817 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32458 00002819 FC                      	cld
 32459                                  dsm_again:
 32460 0000281A AC                      	lodsb
 32461 0000281B 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32462 0000281D 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 32463 0000281F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32464 00002821 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32465                                  isit_slash:
 32466 00002823 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 32467 00002825 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 32468 00002827 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32469 00002829 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32470                                  isit_null:
 32471 0000282B 08C0                    	or	al,al
 32472 0000282D 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 32473 0000282F 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 32474                                  
 32475 00002831 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 32476 00002834 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 32477                                  dsm_next_char:
 32478 00002837 AC                      	lodsb
 32479 00002838 08C0                    	or	al, al
 32480 0000283A 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 32481 0000283C 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 32482 0000283E 7403                    	je	short blankout
 32483 00002840 AA                      	stosb
 32484 00002841 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 32485                                  blankout:
 32486 00002843 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 32487 00002845 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 32488 00002847 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 32489                                  dsm_exit:
 32490 00002849 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 32491 0000284A 5E                      	pop	si
 32492 0000284B 1F                      	pop	ds
 32493 0000284C 5F                      	pop	di
 32494 0000284D 07                      	pop	es
 32495 0000284E C3                      	retn
 32496                                  
 32497                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32498                                  ;
 32499                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 32500                                  ;
 32501                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 32502                                  ;
 32503                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 32504                                  ;
 32505                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 32506                                  ;	in DevSize
 32507                                  ;
 32508                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32509                                  
 32510                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32511                                  SizeDevice:
 32512                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32513                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32514 0000284F 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 32515 00002850 06                      	push	es
 32516 00002851 1F                      	pop	ds
 32517 00002852 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 32518 00002854 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 32519 00002857 CD21                    	int	21h
 32520 00002859 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 32521                                  
 32522 0000285B 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 32523 0000285D B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 32524 00002860 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 32525 00002862 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 32526 00002864 CD21                    	int	21h
 32527 00002866 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 32528 00002868 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 32529 0000286B 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32530 0000286E F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 32531 00002872 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 32532 00002874 2EC706[601E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 32533                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 32534 0000287B EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 32535                                  szdev1:
 32536 0000287D B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 32537 0000287F D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 32538 00002881 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 32539 00002883 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 32540 00002885 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 32541                                  	;
 32542                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32543 00002887 2E3B06[7E1E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32544                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 32545                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32546 0000288C 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 32547                                  
 32548 0000288E 2EA1[7E1E]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32549                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32550 00002892 F8                      	clc
 32551                                  szdev2:
 32552 00002893 2EA3[601E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 32553                                  
 32554                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32555                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32556                                  	; cf=0
 32557                                  	;clc
 32558                                  sd_close:
 32559 00002897 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 32560                                  					;  carry flag
 32561 00002898 B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 32562 0000289B CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 32563 0000289D 9D                      	popf
 32564                                  sd_err:
 32565                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32566                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32567 0000289E 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 32568 0000289F C3                      	retn
 32569                                  
 32570                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32571                                  ;
 32572                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 32573                                  ;
 32574                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 32575                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 32576                                  ;
 32577                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 32578                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 32579                                  ;
 32580                                  ;	Loads a device driver using the 4b03h function call
 32581                                  ;
 32582                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32583                                  
 32584                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32585                                  ExecDev:
 32586 000028A0 2E8B1E[621E]            	mov	bx,[cs:DevLoadAddr]
 32587 000028A5 2E891E[791E]            	mov	[cs:DevExecAddr],bx	; Load the parameter block
 32588                                  					;  block for exec with
 32589                                  					;  Load address
 32590 000028AA 2E891E[7B1E]            	mov	[cs:DevExecReloc],bx
