 32930                                  ;
 32931                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 32932                                  ;
 32933                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 32934                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 32935                                  ;
 32936                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 32937                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 32938                                  ;
 32939                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 32940                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 32941                                  ;
 32942                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32943                                  
 32944                                  ; 13/05/2019
 32945                                  
 32946                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32947                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 32948                                  GetHexNum:
 32949 00002982 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32950 00002984 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32951                                  ghn_next:
 32952 00002986 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32953 00002989 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 32954 0000298C 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 32955 0000298E 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 32956 00002991 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 32957 00002993 50                      	push	ax
 32958 00002994 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 32959 00002996 E82006                  	call	delim
 32960 00002999 58                      	pop	ax
 32961                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32962 0000299A B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 32963 0000299D 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 32964 0000299F E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 32965                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 32966                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32967 000029A2 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 32968                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32969                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32970                                  ghn_shift1:
 32971 000029A4 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 32972 000029A6 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 32973 000029A8 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 32974 000029AA 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 32975 000029AC 46                      	inc	si
 32976 000029AD EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 32977                                  ghn_into_paras:
 32978 000029AF 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 32979 000029B2 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32980 000029B5 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 32981 000029B9 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 32982                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32983                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32984                                  ghn_shift2:
 32985 000029BB F8                      	clc
 32986 000029BC D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 32987 000029BE D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 32988 000029C0 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 32989 000029C2 F8                      	clc
 32990 000029C3 C3                      	retn
 32991                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32992                                  ghn_err:
 32993                                  gnib_err:
 32994 000029C4 F9                      	stc
 32995                                  ghn_ret:
 32996                                  gnib_ret:
 32997 000029C5 C3                      	retn

 33000                                  ;
 33001                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 33002                                  ;
 33003                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 33004                                  ;
 33005                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 33006                                  ;
 33007                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 33008                                  ;
 33009                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33010                                  
 33011                                  GetNibble:
 33012 000029C6 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 33013                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 33014                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33015 000029C9 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 33016 000029CB 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 33017 000029CE 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 33018 000029D0 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 33019 000029D3 C3                      	retn
 33020                                  is_it_hex:
 33021 000029D4 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 33022                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 33023                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33024 000029D7 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 33025 000029D9 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 33026 000029DC 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 33027 000029DE 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 33028 000029E1 C3                      	retn
 33029                                  
 33030                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33031                                  ;gnib_err:
 33032                                  ;	stc
 33033                                  ;gnib_ret:
 33034                                  ;	retn

 33040                                  ; umb.inc (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 33041                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 33042                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data
 33043

 33047                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33048                                  
 33049                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33050                                  ;
 33051                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 33052                                  ;
 33053                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 33054                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 33055                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 33056                                  ;			; DS = data
 33057                                  ;
 33058                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 33059                                  ;
 33060                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 33061                                  ;
 33062                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33063                                  
 33064                                  umb_insert:
 33065 000029E2 1E                      	push	ds
 33066                                  
 33067                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33068                                  	; ds = cs
 33069                                  
 33070                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33071 000029E3 8E1E[8C1E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 33072                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 33073 000029E7 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 33074 000029EB 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 33075 000029ED 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33076                                  ui_next:
 33077 000029EF 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 33078                                  					;    new block
 33079 000029F1 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 33080                                  					; Q: is current block the
 33081                                  					;    last
 33082 000029F3 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33083 000029F9 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 33084                                  					; N: get next block
 33085 000029FB 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 33086                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 33087 000029FD E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33088 00002A00 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 33089                                  
 33090                                  ui_insert:
 33091 00002A02 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 33092 00002A04 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 33093                                  
 33094 00002A05 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 33095 00002A07 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 33096                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 33097 00002A09 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33098                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 33099 00002A0E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33100                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 33101 00002A14 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 33102                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 33103 00002A18 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33104                                  
 33105                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33106                                  
 33107 00002A1E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33108 00002A20 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33109 00002A26 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 33110                                  					; mark as free
 33111 00002A2D 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 33112                                  					; start & end of new block
 33113 00002A30 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 33114                                  
 33115                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 33116

 33123                                  					; this block

 33137                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this

 33145                                  					;    seg. address of new block

 33196                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33197                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce

 33199                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33200                                  
 33201                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33202                                  ;
 33203                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 33204                                  ;
 33205                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 33206                                  ;	iff it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 33207                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 33208                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 33209                                  ;
 33210                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 33211                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 33212                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 33213                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 33214                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 33215                                  ;
 33216                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33217                                  
 33218                                  umb_coalesce:
 33219                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33220                                  	; ds = cs
 33221 00002AAF 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 33222                                  
 33223 00002AB0 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 33224                                  
 33225                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33226                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33227 00002AB2 8E06[8C1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33228 00002AB6 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 33229                                  uc_nextfree:
 33230 00002ABB 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33231 00002ABD 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33232                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 33233 00002ABF 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 33234 00002AC4 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 33235                                  					; N: get next arena
 33236 00002AC6 E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 33237 00002AC9 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33238 00002ACB EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 33239                                  uc_again:
 33240 00002ACD E86400                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 33241 00002AD0 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33242                                  uc_check:
 33243 00002AD2 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 33244 00002AD7 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 33245                                  					; Y: coalesce
 33246 00002AD9 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 33247 00002ADE 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 33248                                  	;add	[3],cx
 33249 00002ADF 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 33250 00002AE3 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 33251 00002AE6 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 33252 00002AE8 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 33253                                  
 33254                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33255                                  ;uc_done:
 33256                                  	;retn

 33329                                  					;   possible

 33333                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 33334                                  					; the largest UMB

 33407                                  	; ds = cs

 33410

 33413

 33416

 33420

 33423

 33430

 33433

 33442                                  					; mark as free

 33453                                  					;  data segment with the arena

 33500                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 33501                                  ;
 33502                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 33503                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 33504                                  ;
 33505                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33506                                  
 33507                                  ShrinkUMB:
 33508                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33509                                  	; ds = cs
 33510 00002BB6 833E[6F1E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 33511                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 33512 00002BBB 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 33513 00002BBD 06                      	push	es
 33514 00002BBE 53                      	push	bx
 33515                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33516                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 33517                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33518                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33519 00002BBF 8B1E[731E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 33520 00002BC3 2B1E[6F1E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33521 00002BC7 8E06[6F1E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 33522                                  	
 33523 00002BCB B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 33524 00002BCE CD21                    	int	21h
 33525                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 33526                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 33527                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 33528 00002BD0 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33529 00002BD2 48                      	dec	ax
 33530 00002BD3 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33531 00002BD5 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 33532 00002BDC 5B                      	pop	bx
 33533 00002BDD 07                      	pop	es
 33534                                  su_exit:
 33535 00002BDE C3                      	retn

 33540                                  ;

 33542                                  ;
 33543                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33544                                  
 33545                                  UnlinkUMB:

 33547                                  	; ds = cs
 33548 00002BDF 1E                      	push	ds
 33549 00002BE0 06                      	push	es
 33550                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33551 00002BE1 803E[8B1E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 33552                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 33553 00002BE6 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 33554                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33555 00002BE8 8E06[8C1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33556                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 33557 00002BEC 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 33558 00002BF1 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 33559                                  ulu_next:
 33560 00002BF6 E83BFF                  	call	get_next
 33561 00002BF9 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 33562 00002BFB 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 33563 00002BFD 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 33564 00002BFF 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33565 00002C01 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 33566                                  ulu_found:
 33567                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 33568 00002C03 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33569                                  ulu_x:
 33570 00002C08 07                      	pop	es
 33571 00002C09 1F                      	pop	ds
 33572 00002C0A C3                      	retn

 33574                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33575                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 33576                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33577                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33578                                  
 33579                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33580                                  ;
 33581                                  ; Summary:
 33582                                  ;
 33583                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 33584                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 33585                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 33586                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 33587                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 33588                                  ;
 33589                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 33590                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 33591                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 33592                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 33593                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 33594                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 33595                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 33596                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 33597                                  ;
 33598                                  ; Example:
 33599                                  ;
 33600                                  ;   [menu]
 33601                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous

 33610                                  ;   device=bar
 33611                                  ;   include alternate

 33614                                  ;   device=tar
 33615                                  ;
 33616                                  ;
 33617                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 33618                                  ;
 33619                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 33620                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 33621                                  ;
 33622                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 33623                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 33624                                  ;   following order:
 33625                                  ;
 33626                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 33627                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 33628                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 33629                                  ;
 33630                                  
 33631                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 33632

 33636

 33639                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16

 33767                                  ;
 33768                                  ; procedure : parseline
 33769                                  ;
 33770                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 33771                                  ;
 33772                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33773                                  
 33774                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33775                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 33776                                  
 33777                                  parseline:
 33778                                  	push	ds
 33779                                  
 33780                                  	push	cs
 33781                                  	pop	ds
 33782                                  
 33783                                  nextswtch:
 33784                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 33785                                  	je	short done_line
 33786                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 33787                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 33788                                  
 33789                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 33790                                  
 33791                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 33792                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 33793                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 33794                                  	je	short getparm
 33795                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 33796                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 33797                                  
 33798                                  getparm:
 33799                                  	call	check_switch
 33800                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 33801                                  	jc	short swterr
 33802                                  getnext:
 33803                                  	call	getchr
 33804                                  	jc	short done_line
 33805                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 33806                                  swterr:
 33807                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 33808                                  
 33809                                  done_line:
 33810                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33811                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 33812                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 33813                                  	jnz	short okay
 33814                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 33815                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 33816                                  
 33817                                  okay:
 33818                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 33819                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 33820                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 33821                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 33822                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 33823                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33824                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33825                                  	; cf=0
 33826                                  	;clc
 33827                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 33828                                  exitpl:
 33829                                  	pop	ds
 33830                                  	retn
 33831                                  put_back:
 33832                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 33833                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 33834                                  	jmp	short done_line

 33840                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 33841                                  ;
 33842                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 33843                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 33844                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 33845                                  ; error.
 33846                                  ;
 33847                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33848                                  
 33849                                  ; 09/09/2023
 33850                                  
 33851                                  err_swtch:
 33852 00002C5F 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 33853                                  err_check:
 33854 00002C61 F9                      	stc
 33855                                  err_chk:
 33856                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 33857 00002C62 C3                      	retn
 33858                                  
 33859                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33860                                  
 33861                                  check_switch:

 33866 00002C6A 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 33867                                  	;jb	short err_check
 33868 00002C6C 72F4                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 33870 00002C70 77EF                    	ja	short err_check

 33882 00002C78 8A0D                    	mov	cl,[di]
 33883 00002C7A B500                    	mov	ch,0

 33885

 33887                                  
 33888 00002C7F 07                      	pop	es
 33889 00002C80 75DF                    	jnz	short err_check

 33906

 33919                                  
 33920                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 33921                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 33922                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 33923                                  
 33924                                  	; 09/09/2023

 33938                                  ; procedure : process_num
 33939                                  ;
 33940                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 33941                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 33942                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 33943                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 33944                                  ;

 33946

 33953 00002CB4 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 33954                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 33955 00002CB7 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 33956 00002CB9 A2[9535]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 33957                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33958                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 33959                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33960                                  	; cf=0

 33963                                  	; 12/12/2022

 33965                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 33966 00002CC0 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 33967                                  
 33968                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 33969                                  
 33970                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 33971 00002CC2 A2[6E34]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 33972                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33973                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 33974                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33975                                  	; cf=0
 33976 00002CC5 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 33977                                  try_t:
 33978 00002CC6 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 33979 00002CC8 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 33980                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33981 00002CCA F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 33982                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 33983 00002CCD 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 33984

 33986 00002CCF A3[7134]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax
 33987                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33988                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 33989                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33990                                  	; cf=0
 33991 00002CD2 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 33992                                  try_s:
 33993                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33994 00002CD3 F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h
 33995                                  	;test	cx,flagseclim ; 20h
 33996 00002CD6 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 33997 00002CD8 A3[9335]                	mov	[slim],ax
 33998                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33999                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 34000                                  	; 12/12/2022

 34003

 34110                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34111                                  ;
 34112                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 34113                                  ;
 34114                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 34115                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 34116                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 34117                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 34118                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 34119                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 34120                                  ;
 34121                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 34122                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 34123                                  ;

 34208                                  
 34209                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 34210                                  
 34211 00002D74 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 34212                                  
 34213                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 34214                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 34215                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 34216                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 34217                                  
 34218                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 34219                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 34220                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 34221                                  
 34222 00002D76 833E[8134]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 34223 00002D7B 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 34224 00002D7D 833E[7134]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 34225 00002D82 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 34226                                  
 34227                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 34228                                  
 34229 00002D84 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34230                                  
 34231                                  ;	check for 320K
 34232                                  
 34233                                  not_144m:
 34234 00002D86 833E[7134]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 34235 00002D8B 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 34236 00002D8D 833E[8134]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34237 00002D92 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 34238                                  
 34239 00002D94 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 34240 00002D96 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 34241                                  
 34242                                  only_one_head:
 34243                                  
 34244                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 34245                                  
 34246 00002D98 803E[6E34]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 34247 00002D9D 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34248                                  
 34249                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 34250                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 34251                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 34252                                  
 34253 00002D9F B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 34254 00002DA1 833E[8134]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34255                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34256 00002DA6 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 34257                                  
 34258 00002DA8 B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 34259                                  
 34260                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 34261                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 34262                                  
 34263                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 34264                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34265                                  	; ax = 2
 34266 00002DAA 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 34267 00002DAB A2[7634]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 34268                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 34269                                  
 34270                                  got_correct_mediad:
 34271 00002DAE 881E[7E34]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 34272                                  
 34273                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 34274                                  
 34275 00002DB2 A1[7134]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]

 34278 00002DBD A3[7C34]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax

 34582 00002E8D E8F300                  	call	skip_comment	; comment char in the filename?
 34583 00002E90 7456                    	jz	short org_put_zero ; then stop copying filename at that point
 34584                                  
 34585 00002E92 E8D800                  	call	get2
 34586 00002E95 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; a switch char? (device=filename/xxx)
 34587 00002E97 7457                    	je	short end_file_slash ; this will be the special case.
 34588                                  
 34589 00002E99 AA                      	stosb			; save the char. in buffer
 34590 00002E9A E81C01                  	call	delim
 34591 00002E9D 7459                    	jz	short end_copy_file
 34592                                  
 34593 00002E9F 3C20                    	cmp	al, ' '
 34594 00002EA1 77EA                    	ja	short org_copy_file ; keep copying
 34595 00002EA3 EB53                    	jmp	short end_copy_file ; otherwise, assume end of the filename.
 34596                                  
 34597                                  get_cmt_token:			; get the token. just max. 2 char.
 34598 00002EA5 E8C500                  	call	get2
 34599 00002EA8 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '		; skip white spaces or "=" char.
 34600 00002EAA 74F9                    	je	short get_cmt_token ; (we are allowing the other special
 34601 00002EAC 3C09                    	cmp	al,tab ; 9 	;  characters can used for comment id.
 34602 00002EAE 74F5                    	je	short get_cmt_token ;  character.)
 34603 00002EB0 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='		; = is special in this case.
 34604 00002EB2 74F1                    	je	short get_cmt_token
 34605 00002EB4 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 34606 00002EB6 7426                    	je	short get_cmt_end ; cannot accept the carriage return
 34607 00002EB8 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 34608 00002EBA 7422                    	je	short get_cmt_end
 34609                                  
 34610                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34611                                  	; ds = cs
 34612                                  	;mov	[cs:cmmt1],al	; store it
 34613                                  	;mov	byte [cs:cmmt],1 ; 1 char. so far.
 34614 00002EBC A2[CE03]                	mov	[cmmt1],al	; store it
 34615 00002EBF C606[CD03]01            	mov	byte [cmmt],1 ; 1 char. so far.
 34616 00002EC4 E8A600                  	call	get2
 34617 00002EC7 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' ; 20h
 34618 00002EC9 7413                    	je	short get_cmt_end
 34619 00002ECB 3C09                    	cmp	al,tab ; 9
 34620 00002ECD 740F                    	je	short get_cmt_end
 34621 00002ECF 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr  ; 0Dh
 34622 00002ED1 740B                    	je	short get_cmt_end
 34623 00002ED3 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf  ; 0Ah
 34624 00002ED5 740E                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 34625                                  
 34626                                  	;mov	[cs:cmmt2],al
 34627                                  	;inc	byte [cs:cmmt]
 34628                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34629 00002ED7 A2[CF03]                	mov	[cmmt2],al
 34630 00002EDA FE06[CD03]              	inc	byte [cmmt]
 34631                                  
 34632                                  get_cmt_end:
 34633 00002EDE E88C00                  	call	get2
 34634 00002EE1 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 34635 00002EE3 75F9                    	jne	short get_cmt_end	; skip it.
 34636                                  end_commd_line_brdg: 
 34637 00002EE5 E9DAFE                  	jmp	end_commd_line		; else jmp to end_commd_line
 34638                                  
 34639                                  org_put_zero:				; make the filename in front of
 34640 00002EE8 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		;  the comment string to be an asciiz.
 34641 00002EEC 47                      	inc	di
 34642 00002EED E9D2FE                  	jmp	end_commd_line		;  (maybe null if device=/*)
 34643                                  
 34644                                  end_file_slash: 			; al = "/" option char.
 34645 00002EF0 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		; make a filename an asciiz
 34646 00002EF4 47                      	inc	di			; and
 34647 00002EF5 AA                      	stosb				; store "/" after that.
 34648 00002EF6 EB1A                    	jmp	short org5		; continue with the rest of the line
 34649                                  
 34650                                  end_copy_file:
 34651 00002EF8 26C645FF00              	mov	byte [es:di-1],0	; make it an asciiz and handle the next char.
 34652 00002EFD 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 34653 00002EFF 74E4                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 34654 00002F01 EB0F                    	jmp	short org5
 34655                                  
 34656                                  org4:					; org4 skips all delimiters after the command name except for '/'
 34657 00002F03 E87D00                  	call	skip_comment
 34658 00002F06 74DD                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 34659                                  
 34660 00002F08 E86200                  	call	get2
 34661 00002F0B E8B300                  	call	org_delim		; skip delimiters except '/' (mrw 4/88)
 34662 00002F0E 74F3                    	jz	short org4
 34663 00002F10 EB08                    	jmp	short org51
 34664                                  
 34665                                  org5:					; rest of the line
 34666 00002F12 E86E00                  	call	skip_comment		; comment?
 34667 00002F15 74CE                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 34668 00002F17 E85300                  	call	get2			; not a comment.
 34669                                  
 34670                                  org51:
 34671 00002F1A AA                      	stosb				; copy the character
 34672 00002F1B 3C22                    	cmp	al,'"' 	; 22h		; a quote ?
 34673 00002F1D 743A                    	je	short at_quote
 34674 00002F1F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '  ; 20h
 34675 00002F21 77EF                    	ja	short org5
 34676                                  					; M051 - Start
 34677                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34678                                  	; ds = cs
 34679 00002F23 803E[D003]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH
 34680                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH ; Q: is this devicehigh
 34681 00002F28 7514                    	jne	short not_dh		; N: 
 34682 00002F2A 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; Q: is this line feed
 34683 00002F2C 7416                    	je	short org_dhlf		; Y: stuff a blank before the lf
 34684 00002F2E 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; Q: is this a cr
 34685 00002F30 75E0                    	jne	short org5		; N: 
 34686 00002F32 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite cr with blank
 34687 00002F37 AA                      	stosb				; put cr after blank
 34688 00002F38 FE06[0B2C]              	inc	byte [insert_blank]
 34689                                  	;inc	byte [cs:insert_blank]	; indicate that blank has been 
 34690                                  					; inserted
 34691 00002F3C EBD4                    	jmp	short org5
 34692                                  not_dh:					; M051 - End
 34693                                  
 34694 00002F3E 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 34695 00002F40 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 34696 00002F42 EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 34697                                  
 34698                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 34699                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34700                                  	; ds = cs
 34701 00002F44 803E[0B2C]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 34702                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 34703 00002F49 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 34704 00002F4B 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 34705 00002F50 AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 34706                                  					; M051 - End
 34707                                  org1_brdg:
 34708 00002F51 C606[0B2C]00            	mov	byte [insert_blank],0 
 34709                                  	;mov	byte [cs:insert_blank],0 ; M051: clear blank indicator for 
 34710                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 34711 00002F56 E982FE                  	jmp	org1
 34712                                  
 34713                                  at_quote:
 34714 00002F59 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34715                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0
 34716 00002F5E 7407                    	je	short up_level
 34717                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset it.
 34718 00002F60 C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 34719 00002F65 EBAB                    	jmp	short org5
 34720                                  
 34721                                  up_level:
 34722                                  	;inc	byte [cs:com_level]	; set it.
 34723 00002F67 FE06[CC03]              	inc	byte [com_level]
 34724 00002F6B EBA5                    	jmp	short org5
 34725                                  
 34726                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34727                                  ;
 34728                                  ; procedure : get2
 34729                                  ;
 34730                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34731                                  
 34732                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34733                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 34734                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34735                                  get2:
 34736 00002F6D E304                    	jcxz	noget
 34737                                  	;
 34738                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34739                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 34740                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34741 00002F6F 26                      	es	
 34742 00002F70 AC                      	lodsb
 34743                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 34744                                  	;inc	si
 34745                                  	;
 34746 00002F71 49                      	dec	cx
 34747 00002F72 C3                      	retn
 34748                                  noget:
 34749 00002F73 59                      	pop	cx
 34750                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34751                                  	; ds = cs
 34752                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 34753                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 34754 00002F74 893E[D203]              	mov	[count],di
 34755 00002F78 893E[D403]              	mov	[org_count],di
 34756 00002F7C 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 34757                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 34758 00002F7E 8936[D603]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 34759                                  
 34760                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34761                                  ;;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 34762                                  ;;	retn
 34763                                  ;;else
 34764                                  ;
 34765                                  ;;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 34766                                  ;;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 34767                                  ;;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 34768                                  ;
 34769                                  ;	mov     cx,di
 34770                                  ;	jmp     menu_check
 34771                                  ;;endif
 34772                                  
 34773                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34774 00002F82 C3                      	retn

 34776                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34777                                  ;
 34778                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 34779                                  ;
 34780                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 34781                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 34782                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 34783                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 34784                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 34785                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 34786                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 34787                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 34788                                  ;
 34789                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34790                                  
 34791                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34792                                  
 34793                                  skip_comment:
 34794 00002F83 E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 34795                                  
 34796                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34797                                  	; ds = cs	
 34798                                  
 34799 00002F85 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34800                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 34801 00002F8A 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 34802                                  
 34803 00002F8C 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 34804                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 34805 00002F91 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 34806                                  
 34807 00002F93 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34808                                  	
 34809 00002F96 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 34810                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 34811 00002F9A 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 34812                                  
 34813 00002F9C 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 34814                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 34815 00002FA1 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34816                                  
 34817 00002FA3 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 34818                                  	
 34819 00002FA7 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 34820                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 34821 00002FAB 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 34822                                  skip_cmmt:
 34823 00002FAD E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 34824 00002FAF 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34825 00002FB2 46                      	inc	si
 34826 00002FB3 49                      	dec	cx
 34827 00002FB4 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 34828 00002FB6 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34829                                  no_commt:
 34830 00002FB8 C3                      	retn
 34831                                  
 34832                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34833                                  %if 0
 34834                                  
 34835                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 34836                                  
 34837                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34838                                  ;
 34839                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 34840                                  ;
 34841                                  ;   INPUT
 34842                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34843                                  ;
 34844                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34845                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 34846                                  ;
 34847                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34848                                  ;       All
 34849                                  ;
 34850                                  ;   HISTORY
 34851                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34852                                  ;
 34853                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34854                                  
 34855                                  kbd_read:
 34856                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 34857                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 34858                                  
 34859                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 34860                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 34861                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 34862                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 34863                                  kbd_loop:
 34864                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 34865                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 34866                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 34867                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34868                                          int     16h             ;
 34869                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34870                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 34871                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 34872                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 34873                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34874                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 34875                                  
 34876                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 34877                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 34878                                  kbd_loopdone:
 34879                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 34880                                  kbd_nodelay:
 34881                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 34882                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34883                                          int     16h             ;
 34884                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34885                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 34886                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 34887                                          inc     bx
 34888                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 34889                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 34890                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 34891                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 34892                                          int     16h             ;
 34893                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 34894                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 34895                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 34896                                  
 34897                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 34898                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 34899                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 34900                                  	
 34901                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 34902                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 34903                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 34904                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 34905                                          call    print
 34906                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 34907                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 34908                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 34909                                  kbd_notf5:
 34910                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 34911                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 34912                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 34913                                  
 34914                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 34915                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 34916                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 34917                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 34918                                          call    print           ;
 34919                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 34920                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 34921                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 34922                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 34923                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 34924                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 34925                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 34926                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 34927                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 34928                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 34929                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 34930                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 34931                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 34932                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 34933                                          retn			;
 34934                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 34935                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 34936                                          retn			;
 34937                                  
 34938                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34939                                  ;
 34940                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 34941                                  ;
 34942                                  ;   INPUT
 34943                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 34944                                  ;
 34945                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34946                                  ;       None
 34947                                  ;
 34948                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34949                                  ;       None
 34950                                  ;
 34951                                  ;   HISTORY
 34952                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34953                                  ;
 34954                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34955                                  
 34956                                  set_numlock:
 34957                                          push    ax
 34958                                          push    ds
 34959                                          sub     ax,ax
 34960                                          mov     ds,ax
 34961                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 34962                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 34963                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 34964                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 34965                                          jmp     short set_done
 34966                                  not_off:
 34967                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 34968                                          stc
 34969                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 34970                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 34971                                  set_done:
 34972                                          pop     ds
 34973                                          pop     ax
 34974                                          retn
 34975                                  
 34976                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34977                                  
 34978                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34979                                  ;
 34980                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 34981                                  ;
 34982                                  ;   INPUT
 34983                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 34984                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 34985                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34986                                  ;
 34987                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34988                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 34989                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 34990                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 34991                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 34992                                  ;
 34993                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34994                                  ;       All
 34995                                  ;
 34996                                  ;   NOTES
 34997                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 34998                                  ;
 34999                                  ;   HISTORY
 35000                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35001                                  ;
 35002                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35003                                  
 35004                                  menu_check:
 35005                                  
 35006                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 35007                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 35008                                  
 35009                                          push    cx              ;
 35010                                          push    si              ;
 35011                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 35012                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 35013                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35014                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 35015                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 35016                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 35017                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 35018                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35019                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 35020                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35021                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 35022                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 35023                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 35024                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 35025                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 35026                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35027                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 35028                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 35029                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 35030                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 35031                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 35032                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 35033                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 35034                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 35035                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 35036                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 35037                                          call    get_char        ;
 35038                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 35039                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 35040                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 35041                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35042                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35043                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 35044                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 35045                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 35046                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 35047                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35048                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 35049                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35050                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 35051                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 35052                                          pop     si              ;
 35053                                          pop     cx              ;
 35054                                  
 35055                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 35056                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 35057                                  
 35058                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35059                                          jnz	short menu_search
 35060                                  ;
 35061                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 35062                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 35063                                  ;
 35064                                          call    kbd_read
 35065                                          jnc	short menu_search
 35066                                          jmp	menu_abort
 35067                                  
 35068                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 35069                                  
 35070                                  menu_search:
 35071                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 35072                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 35073                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 35074                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 35075                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 35076                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 35077                                  
 35078                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 35079                                  
 35080                                  menu_color:
 35081                                          push    cx              ;
 35082                                          push    dx              ;
 35083                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 35084                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 35085                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 35086                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 35087                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 35088                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 35089                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 35090                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 35091                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 35092                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 35093                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 35094                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 35095                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 35096                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 35097                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 35098                                  check_color:                    ;
 35099                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 35100                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 35101                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35102                                  set_color:
 35103                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 35104                                          pop     dx              ;
 35105                                          pop     cx              ;
 35106                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 35107                                  
 35108                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 35109                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 35110                                  
 35111                                  menu_found:
 35112                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 35113                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 35114                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35115                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 35116                                  
 35117                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 35118                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 35119                                  
 35120                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 35121                                  
 35122                                  menu_process:
 35123                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35124                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 35125                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35126                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 35127                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 35128                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35129                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 35130                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 35131                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 35132                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 35133                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 35134                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 35135                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 35136                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35137                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 35138                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 35139                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
