 36172                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 36173                                  
 36174                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 36175                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 36176                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 36177                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 36178                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36179                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36180                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 36181                                          jmp     short print1
 36182                                  not_up:
 36183                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 36184                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 36185                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 36186                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 36187                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36188                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36189                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 36190                                  print1: 
 36191                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 36192                                  print2: 
 36193                                  	call    print_item      ;
 36194                                          call    disp_num        ;
 36195                                  to_input_key:
 36196                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 36197                                  not_down:
 36198                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36199                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 36200                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36201                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 36202                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36203                                          call    show_status     ;
 36204                                          jmp     input_key	;
 36205                                  not_f8:
 36206                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36207                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 36208                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 36209                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 36210                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 36211                                  
 36212                                  normal_key:
 36213                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 36214                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 36215                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 36216                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 36217                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 36218                                          retn			;
 36219                                  not_backspace:
 36220                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 36221                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 36222                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 36223                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 36224                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 36225                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 36226                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 36227                                          jmp	short print2
 36228                                  
 36229                                  select_done:
 36230                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 36231                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 36232                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 36233                                  
 36234                                  	; fall into disp_input
 36235                                  
 36236                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36237                                  
 36238                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36239                                  ;
 36240                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 36241                                  ;
 36242                                  ;   INPUT
 36243                                  ;       AL == character to display
 36244                                  ;
 36245                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36246                                  ;       None
 36247                                  ;
 36248                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36249                                  ;       None
 36250                                  ;
 36251                                  ;   NOTES
 36252                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 36253                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 36254                                  ;
 36255                                  ;   HISTORY
 36256                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36257                                  ;
 36258                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36259                                  
 36260                                  disp_input:
 36261                                          push    ax
 36262                                          cmp     al,' '
 36263                                          jae	short disp_ok
 36264                                          mov     al,' '
 36265                                  disp_ok:
 36266                                          mov     dl,al
 36267                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36268                                          int     21h
 36269                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 36270                                          call    print
 36271                                          pop     ax
 36272                                          retn
 36273                                  
 36274                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36275                                  
 36276                                  disp_num:
 36277                                          push    bx
 36278                                          add     al,'0'
 36279                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 36280                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36281                                          mov     cx,1
 36282                                          int     10h
 36283                                          pop     bx
 36284                                          retn
 36285                                  
 36286                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36287                                  ;
 36288                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 36289                                  ;
 36290                                  ;   INPUT
 36291                                  ;       None
 36292                                  ;
 36293                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36294                                  ;       None
 36295                                  ;
 36296                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36297                                  ;       None
 36298                                  ;
 36299                                  ;   NOTES
 36300                                  ;       None
 36301                                  ;
 36302                                  ;   HISTORY
 36303                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36304                                  ;
 36305                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36306                                  
 36307                                  show_status:
 36308                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 36309                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36310                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36311                                          int     10h             ;
 36312                                          push    dx              ; save it
 36313                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36314                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 36315                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36316                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 36317                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 36318                                          int     10h             ;
 36319                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36320                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 36321                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 36322                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 36323                                  show_onoff: 
 36324                                          int     10h
 36325                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 36326                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 36327                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 36328                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 36329                                  
 36330                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 36331                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 36332                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 36333                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 36334                                  show_noton:                     ;
 36335                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 36336                                          int     10h             ;
 36337                                  show_done:                      ;
 36338                                          pop     dx              ;
 36339                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36340                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 36341                                          pop     bx              ;
 36342                                          retn			;
 36343                                  
 36344                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36345                                  
 36346                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36347                                  ;
 36348                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 36349                                  ;
 36350                                  ;   INPUT
 36351                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36352                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36353                                  ;
 36354                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36355                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 36356                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 36357                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 36358                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36359                                  ;
 36360                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36361                                  ;       AX
 36362                                  ;
 36363                                  ;   NOTES
 36364                                  ;       None
 36365                                  ;
 36366                                  ;   HISTORY
 36367                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36368                                  ;
 36369                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36370                                  
 36371                                  skip_token:
 36372                                          call    get_char
 36373                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 36374                                          call    any_delim
 36375                                          jne	short skip_token
 36376                                  skip_check_eol:
 36377                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 36378                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36379                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36380                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36381                                          clc
 36382                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 36383                                  	retn
 36384                                  skip_token_eol:
 36385                                          stc
 36386                                  skip_token_done:
 36387                                          retn
 36388                                  
 36389                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36390                                  ;
 36391                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 36392                                  ;
 36393                                  ;   INPUT
 36394                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36395                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36396                                  ;
 36397                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36398                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36399                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 36400                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 36401                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36402                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 36403                                  ;
 36404                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36405                                  ;       AX
 36406                                  ;
 36407                                  ;   NOTES
 36408                                  ;       None
 36409                                  ;
 36410                                  ;   HISTORY
 36411                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36412                                  ;
 36413                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36414                                  
 36415                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 36416                                          call    get_char        ;
 36417                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 36418                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 36419                                          call    delim           ;
 36420                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 36421                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 36422                                  
 36423                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36424                                  ;
 36425                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 36426                                  ;
 36427                                  ;   INPUT
 36428                                  ;       AL == last character read
 36429                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36430                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36431                                  ;
 36432                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36433                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36434                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 36435                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36436                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36437                                  ;
 36438                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36439                                  ;       AX
 36440                                  ;
 36441                                  ;   NOTES
 36442                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 36443                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 36444                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 36445                                  ;
 36446                                  ;   HISTORY
 36447                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36448                                  ;
 36449                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36450                                  
 36451                                  skip_opt_line:
 36452                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36453                                          je	short skip_line_done
 36454                                       
 36455                                  	; fall into skip_line
 36456                                  
 36457                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36458                                  ;
 36459                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 36460                                  ;
 36461                                  ;   INPUT
 36462                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36463                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36464                                  ;
 36465                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36466                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36467                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36468                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36469                                  ;
 36470                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36471                                  ;       AX
 36472                                  ;
 36473                                  ;   NOTES
 36474                                  ;       None
 36475                                  ;
 36476                                  ;   HISTORY
 36477                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36478                                  ;
 36479                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36480                                  
 36481                                  skip_line:
 36482                                          call    get_char
 36483                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 36484                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36485                                          jne	short skip_line
 36486                                  skip_line_done:
 36487                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36488                                          retn
 36489                                  
 36490                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36491                                  ;
 36492                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 36493                                  ;
 36494                                  ;   INPUT
 36495                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36496                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36497                                  ;
 36498                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36499                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 36500                                  ;       BX == binary #
 36501                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 36502                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36503                                  ;
 36504                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36505                                  ;       AX
 36506                                  ;
 36507                                  ;   NOTES
 36508                                  ;       None
 36509                                  ;
 36510                                  ;   HISTORY
 36511                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36512                                  ;
 36513                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36514                                  
 36515                                  ; 13/05/2019
 36516                                  
 36517                                  get_number:
 36518                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 36519                                  num_loop:
 36520                                          call    get_char        ;
 36521                                          jc	short num_done	;
 36522                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 36523                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 36524                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 36525                                          ja	short num_done	;
 36526                                          push    ax              ;
 36527                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 36528                                          push    dx              ;
 36529                                          mul     bx              ;
 36530                                          pop     dx              ;
 36531                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 36532                                          pop     ax              ;
 36533                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 36534                                          cbw                     ;
 36535                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 36536                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 36537                                  
 36538                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36539                                  ;num_done:
 36540                                          ;retn
 36541                                  
 36542                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36543                                  ;
 36544                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 36545                                  ;
 36546                                  ;   INPUT
 36547                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36548                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36549                                  ;
 36550                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36551                                  ;       AL == next character
 36552                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36553                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36554                                  ;
 36555                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36556                                  ;       AX
 36557                                  ;
 36558                                  ;   NOTES
 36559                                  ;       None
 36560                                  ;
 36561                                  ;   HISTORY
 36562                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36563                                  ;
 36564                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36565                                  
 36566                                  get_char:
 36567                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36568                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36569                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36570                                  	es	
 36571                                  	lodsb
 36572                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 36573                                          retn			;
 36574                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36575                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36576                                  nearby_ret:
 36577                                          retn
 36578                                  
 36579                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36580                                  ;
 36581                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36582                                  ;
 36583                                  ;   INPUT
 36584                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36585                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36586                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36587                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36588                                  ;
 36589                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36590                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36591                                  ;
 36592                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36593                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36594                                  ;
 36595                                  ;   NOTES
 36596                                  ;       None
 36597                                  ;
 36598                                  ;   HISTORY
 36599                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36600                                  ;
 36601                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36602                                  
 36603                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36604                                  query_user:
 36605                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 36606                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 36607                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36608                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 36609                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 36610                                  qu_1:
 36611                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 36612                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 36613                                          push    ax                      ;
 36614                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 36615                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 36616                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 36617                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 36618                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 36619                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36620                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 36621                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 36622                                  query_all:
 36623                                  
 36624                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 36625                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 36626                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 36627                                  
 36628                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36629                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 36630                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36631                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 36632                                  
 36633                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 36634                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 36635                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 36636                                  find_match:                             ;
 36637                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 36638                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 36639                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 36640                                          inc     di                      ;
 36641                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 36642                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 36643                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 36644                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 36645                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 36646                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 36647                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 36648                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 36649                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36650                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 36651                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 36652                                          inc     di                      ;
 36653                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36654                                          int     21h                     ;
 36655                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 36656                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 36657                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 36658                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 36659                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 36660                                  cmd_notset:
 36661                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 36662                                  line_print:                             ;
 36663                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 36664                                          es
 36665                                  	lodsb
 36666                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 36667                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 36668                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 36669                                  non_null:                               ;
 36670                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 36671                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 36672                                          jne	short non_space		;
 36673                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 36674                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 36675                                  non_space:                              ;
 36676                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36677                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 36678                                          int     21h                     ;
 36679                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 36680                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 36681                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 36682                                  
 36683                                  generic_prompt:
 36684                                          call    print                   ;
 36685                                  input_loop:                             ;
 36686                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 36687                                          int     16h                     ;
 36688                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 36689                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 36690                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 36691                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 36692                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 36693                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 36694                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 36695                                  not_func:
 36696                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 36697                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 36698                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36699                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 36700                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36701                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 36702                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 36703                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 36704                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 36705                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 36706                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 36707                                  legal_char:                             ;
 36708                                          call    disp_input              ;
 36709                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36710                                  
 36711                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 36712                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 36713                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36714                                  	clc
 36715                                  do_cmd:
 36716                                  	pop     ax			;
 36717                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36718                                  	; cf=0
 36719                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 36720                                  	retn
 36721                                  
 36722                                  skip_cmd:
 36723                                  	pop     ax			;
 36724                                  skip_all:
 36725                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 36726                                  	stc
 36727                                  	retn
 36728                                  
 36729                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36730                                  ;
 36731                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 36732                                  ;
 36733                                  ;   INPUT
 36734                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 36735                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36736                                  ;
 36737                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36738                                  ;       None
 36739                                  ;
 36740                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36741                                  ;       None
 36742                                  ;
 36743                                  ;   NOTES
 36744                                  ;       None
 36745                                  ;
 36746                                  ;   HISTORY
 36747                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36748                                  ;
 36749                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36750                                  
 36751                                  print_error:
 36752                                          push    ax
 36753                                          push    bx
 36754                                          push    cx
 36755                                          push    dx
 36756                                          push    ds
 36757                                          push    cs
 36758                                          pop     ds
 36759                                          pushf
 36760                                          call    get_linenum
 36761                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 36762                                          call    error_line
 36763                                          popf
 36764                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 36765                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 36766                                          call    print
 36767                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 36768                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 36769                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 36770                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 36771                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 36772                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 36773                                  pe_1:     
 36774                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 36775                                          call    print
 36776                                  pe_ret: 
 36777                                  	pop     ds
 36778                                          pop     dx
 36779                                          pop     cx
 36780                                          pop     bx
 36781                                          pop     ax
 36782                                  	retn
 36783                                  
 36784                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36785                                  
 36786                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 36787                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 36788                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 36789                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 36790                                  
 36791                                  disable_autoexec:
 36792                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 36793                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36794                                  
 36795                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36796                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 36797                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 36798                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 36799                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 36800                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 36801                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 36802                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 36803                                  dae_1:
 36804                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 36805                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 36806                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 36807                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 36808                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 36809                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 36810                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 36811                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 36812                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 36813                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 36814                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 36815                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 36816                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 36817                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 36818                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 36819                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 36820                                          dec     bx                      ;
 36821                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 36822                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 36823                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 36824                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 36825                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 36826                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 36827                                          retn
 36828                                  
 36829                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 36830                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36831                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36832                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 36833                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36834                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 36835                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 36836                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 36837                                  
 36838                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36839                                  
 36840                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 36841                                  
 36842                                  
 36843                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36844                                  
 36845                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36846                                  ;
 36847                                  ; procedure : delim
 36848                                  ;
 36849                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36850                                  
 36851                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36852                                  ;
 36853                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36854                                  ;
 36855                                  ;any_delim:
 36856                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36857                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36858                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36859                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36860                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 36861                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36862                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 36863                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36864                                  ;
 36865                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36866                                  
 36867                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36868                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 36869                                  delim:
 36870 00002FB9 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 36871 00002FBB 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 36872                                  
 36873 00002FBD 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 36874 00002FBF 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 36875                                  
 36876                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 36877 00002FC1 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 36878 00002FC3 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 36879 00002FC5 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 36880 00002FC7 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 36881 00002FC9 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 36882 00002FCB 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 36883 00002FCD 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 36884 00002FCF 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 36885 00002FD1 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 36886                                  
 36887                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36888                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36889                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 36890 00002FD3 F8                      	clc	; 09/09/2023 ('SkipDelim' must not be return with cf=1)
 36891                                  ;endif
 36892                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36893                                  delim_ret:
 36894                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 36895 00002FD4 C3                      	retn

 36958                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 36959                                  ;
 36960                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36961                                  
 36962                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36963                                  mapcase:
 36964 00002FF5 51                      	push	cx
 36965 00002FF6 56                      	push	si
 36966 00002FF7 1E                      	push	ds
 36967                                  
 36968 00002FF8 06                      	push	es
 36969 00002FF9 1F                      	pop	ds
 36970                                  
 36971                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36972                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36973                                  ;
 36974                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 36975                                  ;;else
 36976                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 36977                                  ;;endif
 36978                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36979 00002FFA 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 36980                                  
 36981                                  convloop:
 36982 00002FFC AC                      	lodsb
 36983 00002FFD 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36984 00002FFF 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36985 00003001 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36986 00003003 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36987 00003005 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36988 00003007 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36989                                  noconv:
 36990                                  
 36991                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36992                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36993                                  ;;
 36994                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36995                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36996                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36997                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36998                                  ;;
 36999                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 37000                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 37001                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 37002                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 37003                                  ;check_eol:
 37004                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 37005                                  ;       je	short convdone
 37006                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 37007                                  ;       je	short convdone
 37008                                  ;;endif
 37009                                  	
 37010                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37011 0000300A E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 37012                                  convdone:
 37013 0000300C 1F                      	pop	ds
 37014 0000300D 5E                      	pop	si
 37015 0000300E 59                      	pop	cx
 37016 0000300F C3                      	retn

 37020                                  ; procedure : round
 37021                                  ;
 37022                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 37023                                  ; perform bounds check.
 37024                                  ;
 37025                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37026                                  
 37027                                  round:
 37028                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37029 00003010 1E                      	push	ds
 37030 00003011 0E                      	push	cs
 37031 00003012 1F                      	pop	ds
 37032                                  
 37033 00003013 50                      	push	ax
 37034                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 37035 00003014 A1[DE03]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 37036                                  
 37037 00003017 E88AE0                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 37038                                  
 37039                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 37040 0000301A 0106[E003]              	add	[memhi],ax
 37041                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 37042 0000301E C706[DE03]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0
 37043                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 37044 00003024 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 37045                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 37046 00003027 3B06[A302]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]
 37047                                  	;jae	short mem_err
 37048                                  	; 17/09/2023
 37049 0000302B 7322                    	jae	short mem_err2 ; ds = cs
 37050                                  	;test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 37051 0000302D F606[1014]02            	test	byte [setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 37052 00003032 7416                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 37053 00003034 06                      	push	es
 37054 00003035 56                      	push	si
 37055                                  	;mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 37056 00003036 8B36[0E14]              	mov	si,[devmark_addr]
 37057 0000303A 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 37058 0000303C 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 37059 0000303E 48                      	dec	ax
 37060                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 37061 0000303F 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 37062                                  	;and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 37063 00003043 8026[1014]FD            	and	byte [setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 37064 00003048 5E                      	pop	si

 37066                                  skip_set_devmarksize:

 37068

 37071                                  
 37072                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37073                                  	; cf = 0
 37074                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37075                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 37076 0000304C C3                      	retn

 37134                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37135                                  ;
 37136                                  ; procedure : getnum
 37137                                  ;
 37138                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 37139                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 37140                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 37141                                  ;
 37142                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37143                                  
 37144                                  getnum:
 37145 00003083 53                      	push	bx
 37146 00003084 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 37147                                  b2:
 37148 00003086 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 37149 00003089 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 37150                                  
 37151 0000308B 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 37152 0000308C 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 37153                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 37154                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37155 0000308D B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 37156 0000308F F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 37157 00003091 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 37158 00003092 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 37159 00003094 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 37160 00003097 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 37161                                  
 37162 00003099 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 37163                                  
 37164 0000309A E841FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 37165 0000309D 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 37166 0000309F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 37167 000030A1 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 37168 000030A3 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 37169 000030A5 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 37170 000030A7 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 37171 000030A9 7417                    	je	short b15
 37172 000030AB 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 37173 000030B0 7410                    	je	short b15
 37174 000030B2 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 37175                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 37176                                  	;nop
 37177                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37178                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37179                                  	;nop
 37180                                  	;nop
 37181 000030B4 740C                    	je	short b15
 37182 000030B6 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 37183 000030B8 7408                    	je	short b15
 37184 000030BA 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 37185 000030BC 7404                    	je	short b15
 37186 000030BE 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 37187 000030C0 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 37188                                  b15:
 37189 000030C2 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 37190 000030C7 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 37191                                  b1:
 37192 000030CC 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 37193 000030CE 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 37194 000030D0 5B                      	pop	bx
 37195 000030D1 C3                      	retn
 37196                                  badnum:
 37197                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37198                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 37199 000030D2 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 37200                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 37201 000030D4 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 37202 000030D8 5B                      	pop	bx
 37203 000030D9 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 37204 000030DA C3                      	retn
 37205                                  
 37206                                  ;****************************************************************************
 37207                                  
 37208                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 37209                                  
 37210                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37211                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 37212                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 37213                                  ;	si = 0
 37214                                  ;	ax = country id
 37215                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 37216                                  ;	bx = file handle
 37217                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 37218                                  ;
 37219                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 37220                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 37221                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 37222                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 37223                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37224                                  
 37225                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37226                                  
 37227 000030DB 57                      	push	di
 37228 000030DC 50                      	push	ax
 37229 000030DD 52                      	push	dx
 37230                                  
 37231 000030DE 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 37232 000030E0 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 37233 000030E2 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 37234 000030E5 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 37235 000030E8 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37236                                  
 37237 000030EA 06                      	push	es
 37238 000030EB 56                      	push	si
 37239                                  
 37240 000030EC 0E                      	push	cs
 37241 000030ED 07                      	pop	es
 37242                                  
 37243 000030EE BF[5233]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 37244 000030F1 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 37245 000030F4 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 37246                                  
 37247 000030F6 5E                      	pop	si
 37248 000030F7 07                      	pop	es
 37249 000030F8 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 37250                                  
 37251 000030FA 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 37252 000030FD 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 37253 00003100 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 37254                                  
 37255 00003102 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 37256 00003103 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 37257 00003105 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 37258 00003108 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 37259 0000310B E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 37260 0000310E 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37261                                  
 37262 00003110 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 37263 00003112 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 37264 00003116 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37265                                  
 37266 00003118 46                      	inc	si
 37267 00003119 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 37268 0000311A 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 37269 0000311B 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 37270 0000311C 5F                      	pop	di
 37271                                  
 37272                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 37273 0000311D 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 37274 00003120 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 37275                                  
 37276                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 37277                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 37278                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37279 00003122 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 37280 00003124 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 37281 00003126 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 37282 00003129 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 37283                                  
 37284                                  setdoscntry_next:
 37285 0000312B 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 37286 0000312D 46                      	inc	si
 37287 0000312E 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 37288 0000312F E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 37289                                  
 37290                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 37291                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37292 00003131 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 37293                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 37294 00003132 F9                      	stc
 37295 00003133 C3                      	retn
 37296                                  
 37297                                  setdosdata_fail:
 37298 00003134 5E                      	pop	si
 37299 00003135 59                      	pop	cx
 37300 00003136 5F                      	pop	di
 37301 00003137 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 37302                                  
 37303                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 37304 00003139 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 37305                                  
 37306                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 37307 0000313C 2E8916[5A33]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 37308 00003141 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 37309 00003144 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 37310 00003147 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 37311 0000314A E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 37312 0000314D 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 37313                                  
 37314 0000314F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 37315 00003151 46                      	inc	si
 37316 00003152 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 37317                                  
 37318                                  setdoscntry_data:
 37319 00003153 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 37320 00003154 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 37321 00003155 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 37322                                  
 37323 00003156 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 37324 00003159 E8A400                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 37325 0000315C 727C                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 37326                                  
 37327 0000315E 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 37328 00003161 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 37329 00003164 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37330 00003167 F9                      	stc
 37331 00003168 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37332 0000316A 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37333                                  
 37334 0000316C BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 37335 0000316F B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 37336 00003172 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 37337 00003174 F9                      	stc
 37338 00003175 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 37339 00003177 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 37340                                  
 37341 00003179 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 37342 0000317B 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 37343                                  
 37344 0000317D 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 37345 00003180 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 37346 00003183 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37347 00003186 F9                      	stc
 37348 00003187 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 37349 00003189 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37350                                  
 37351 0000318B 56                      	push	si
 37352 0000318C BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file

 37467                                  getcountrydestination:
 37468                                  
 37469                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37470                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 37471                                  ;
 37472                                  ;input: al - data id
 37473                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 37474                                  ;on return:
 37475                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 37476                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 37477                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37478                                  
 37479                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37480                                  
 37481 00003200 51                      	push	cx
 37482                                  	;add	di,74
 37483 00003201 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 37484                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 37485 00003204 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 37486 00003207 47                      	inc	di
 37487 00003208 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 37488                                  
 37489                                  getcntrydest:
 37490 00003209 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 37491 0000320C 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 37492

 37494 00003212 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 37495

 37497 00003217 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 37498

 37534                                  
 37535                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 37536                                  
 37537                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37538                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 37539                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 37540                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 37541                                  ;
 37542                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 37543                                  ;	 be moved.
 37544                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 37545                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 37546                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 37547                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 37548                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 37549                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 37550                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37551                                  
 37552 0000322B 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 37553 0000322C B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37554 0000322F F9                      	stc
 37555 00003230 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37556 00003232 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37557 00003233 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37558                                  
 37559 00003235 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37560 00003237 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37561 00003239 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37562 0000323B F9                      	stc
 37563 0000323C CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37564                                  ricb_exit:
 37565 0000323E C3                      	retn
