 37571                                  %if 0
 37572                                  
 37573                                  set_country_path:
 37574                                  
 37575                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37576                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37577                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37578                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37579                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37580                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37581                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37582                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37583                                  
 37584                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37585                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37586                                  
 37587                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37588                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:36DDh)
 37589                                  
 37590                                  	push	si
 37591                                  
 37592                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37593                                  	push	es
 37594                                  	pop	ds
 37595                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37596                                  
 37597                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37598                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37599                                  
 37600                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37601                                  	inc	si
 37602                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37603                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37604                                  
 37605                                  scp_default_drv:
 37606                                  	mov	ah,19h
 37607                                  	int	21h
 37608                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37609                                  
 37610                                  scp_setdrv:
 37611                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37612                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 37613                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37614                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 37615                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 37616                                  
 37617                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37618                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37619                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37620                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37621                                  	jne	short scp_path
 37622                                  
 37623                                  scp_root_dir:
 37624                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37625                                  scp_path:
 37626                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37627                                  
 37628                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37629                                  scpath_exit:
 37630                                  
 37631                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37632                                  	push	es
 37633                                  	pop	ds
 37634                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37635                                  
 37636                                  	pop	si
 37637                                  	retn
 37638                                  
 37639                                  %endif
 37640
